[\[1a\]]
[\[1a.1\]]@#/_/'bum da pa bzhugs so/_/
[\[1b\]]
[\[1b.1\]]@#/_/shes rab kyi pha [{]rold [,]rol [}]tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa stong phrag brgya pa/_glegs bam bcu gcig pa/_bam po dang po/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub 
[\[1b.2\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa la gnas shing /_sbyin pa'i pha [{]rold [,]rol [}]tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa yongs su 'dzin pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal 
[\[1b.3\]]pa/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'dod pas dben sdig to [{]myi [,]mi [}]dge pa'i chos kyis dben pa/_rtog pa dang bcas pa dpyod pa dang bcas pa/_dben pa 
[\[1b.4\]]las skyes pa'i dga' pa dang bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/de rnam par rtog pa dang rnam par dpyod pa nye bar zhi nas nad yongs su dang ste/_sems kyi rgyud 
[\[1b.5\]]gcig tu gyur pas/_rtog pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dpyod pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang /_bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/de dga' ba 
[\[2a\]]
[\[2a.1\]]las 'dod chags dang bral bas dran pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin du btang snyoms la gnas te/_bde ba lus kyis myong la 'phags pa rnams kyis de la dran pa dang ldan pa bde ba la rnam par dpyod pa btang snyoms 
[\[2a.2\]]pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/_dga' ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/de bde ba yang spangs/_sdug bsngal yang spangs shing yid bde ba dang yid [{]myi [,]mi [}]bde ba snga nas kyang nub pas bde ba yang [{]myed[,]med[}]/_sdug 
[\[2a.3\]]bsngal yang [{]myed [,]med [}]pa btang snyoms dang dran pas yongs su dag pa bsam gtan bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te/_thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur 
[\[2a.4\]]cing /_sna tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la mi byed pas/_nam mkha' mtha' yas so zhes/_nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 
[\[2a.5\]]'das te/_rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so zhes rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/_chud zad ma yod do zhes [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]
[\[2a.6\]{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/de rnam pa thams cad du [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/_'du shes [{]myed [,]med [}]'du shes med min skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/de bsam gtan gyi 
[\[2b\]]
[\[2b.1\]]pha rol tu phyin pa de la gnas nas/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]g.yeng ba'i yid kyis sems can de dag la zang zing gi sbyin pa dang /_chos kyi sbyin pa yongs su gtong zhing /_gzhan yang zang zing gi sbyin pa dang /_chos kyi sbyin pa la yang dag par skul lo/_/zang zing gi 
[\[2b.2\]]sbyin pa dang /_chos kyi sbyin pa'i legs pa yang rjod do/_/gzhan yang zang zing gi sbyin pa dang /_chos kyi sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba de dag gi legs pa yang brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar byed pa yin te/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang nyan thos kyi 
[\[2b.3\]]sa'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]sngo'i/_gzhan du na sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ste/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_
[\[2b.4\]]bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin to/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 
[\[2b.5\]]gnas shing /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas 
[\[2b.6\]]pa'i sems 'dod chags dang ldan pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]skyed/_sems zhe sdang dang ldan pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]skyed/_sems gti mug dang ldan pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]skyed/_sems 'tshe ba dang ldan pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]skyed de gzhan du na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pas/_
[\[2b.7\]]rnam par spyod de/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang nyan thos kyi sa'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]sngo'i/_gzhan du na sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing /_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ste/_
[\[3a\]]
[\[3a.1\]]rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin to/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na 
[\[3a.2\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems 
[\[3a.3\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /_gzugs la dbu ba lta bur rab tu rtog_/tshor ba la chu bur lta bur rab tu rtog_/'du shes la smyig rgyu lta bur rab tu rtog_/'du byed la chu shing lta bur rab tu rtog/_
[\[3a.4\]]rnam par shes pa la sgyu ma lta bur rab tu rtog ste/_de de ltar nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la so sor rtog cing snying po [{]myed [,]med [}]par 'du shes nye bar gnas pa yin te/_de de ltar so sor rtog pas de 'di snyam ste/_yan lag dang nying lag bcad gtubs kyang su la 
[\[3a.5\]]gcod/_su la gcad/_lus ni su'i lus/_tshor ba ni su'i tshor ba/_'du shes ni su'i 'du shes/_'du byed ni su'i 'du byed/_rnam par shes pa ni su'i rnam par shes pa snyam ste/_de de ltar so sor rtog pa'i tshe/_'di snyam ste/_gang la spyo ba dang /_
[\[3a.6\]]bkyal ba byas na/_gnod sems skye ba de lta bu'i gshe ba yang gang zhig yod/_'khyal pa yang gang zhig yod snyam ste/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /_bzod pa'i 
[\[3a.7\]]pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin to/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa lags/_
[\[3b\]]
[\[3b.1\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /_'dod pas dben sdig to [{]myi [,]mi [}]dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa/_rtog pa dang bcas/_dpyod 
[\[3b.2\]]pa dang bcas pa/_dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/de rnam par rtog pa dang rnam par dpyod pa nye bar zhi nas/_nang yongs su dang ste/_sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas/_rtog pa [{]myed [,]med [}]
[\[3b.3\]]pa dpyod pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can/_bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/de dga' ba las 'dod chags dang bral bas dran pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin du btang snyoms la gnas te/_bde ba 
[\[3b.4\]]lus kyis myong la 'phags pa rnams kyis de la dran pa dang ldan pa/_bde ba la rnam par dpyod pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/_dga' ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/de bde ba yang spangs/_
[\[3b.5\]]sdug bsngal yang spangs shing /_yid bde ba dang yid [{]myi [,]mi [}]bde ba snga nas kyang nub pas/_bde ba yang [{]myed[,]med[}]/_sdug bsngal yang [{]myed [,]med [}]pa btang snyoms dang dran pas yongs su dag pa'i bsam gtan bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs shing gnas te/_de bsam 
[\[3b.6\]]gtan dang bsam gtan gyi yan lag de dag la yang mtshan mar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dzin to/_/de de ltar mnyam par gzhag pa'i sems dang ldan pas/_rdzu 'phrul rnam pa du ma nyams su myong bar byed do/_sa chen po 'di yang rab tu g.yo bar byed do/_/gcig tu gyur 
[\[3b.7\]]cing mang por 'gyur ro/_/mang por gyur cing gcig tu 'gyur ro/_/snang ba dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]snang ba yang nyams su myong bar byed do/_/rtsig pa las thal ba dang /_ra ba las thal ba dang /_ri las thal bar thogs pa med par 'gro ste/_dper na nam mkha' la bya 
[\[4a\]]
[\[4a.1\]]ba bzhin no/_/nam mkha' la yang 'gro ste/_dper na 'dab chags bya bzhin no/_/sa la yang gyen du 'byung ba dang /_'og tu 'dzul ba byed de/_dper na chu la bya ba bzhin no/_/chu la yang 'bying ba med par 'gro ste/_dper 
[\[4a.2\]]na sa la bya ba bzhin no/_/du bar 'thul zhing myer 'bar te/_dper na [{]mye'i [,]me'i [}]phung po chen po bzhin no/_/nyi ma dang zla ba 'di dag 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che la/_'di ltar mthu che zhing dbang che ba dag kyang lag pas byugs shing /_tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar 
[\[4a.3\]]du lus kyis dbang sgyur ro/_/de lha'i rna ba rnam par dag pa mi las 'das pas lha dang mi'i sgra nye ba 'am/_ring yang rung ste/_thos so/_/des sems can pha rol dang /_gang zag pha rol gyi sems sems kyis yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes 
[\[4a.4\]]te/_'dod chags dang ldan pa'i sems la/_'dod chags dang ldan pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/'dod chags dang bral ba'i sems la/_'dod chags dang bral ba'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba 
[\[4a.5\]]bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/zhe sdang dang ldan pa'i sems la/_zhe sdang dang ldan pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/zhe sdang dang bral ba'i sems la/_zhe sdang dang bral ba'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab 
[\[4a.6\]]tu shes so/_/gti mug dang ldan pa'i sems la/_gti mug dang ldan pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/gti mug dang bral ba'i sems la/_gti mug dang bral ba'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin 
[\[4a.7\]]du rab tu shes so/_/sred pa dang ldan pa'i sems la/_sred pa dang ldan pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/sred pa dang bral ba'i sems la/_sred pa dang bral ba'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du 
[\[4b\]]
[\[4b.1\]]rab tu shes so/_/nye bar len pa dang bcas pa'i sems la/_nye bar len pa dang bcas pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/nye bar len pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i sems la/_nye bar len pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i sems zhes bya bar 
[\[4b.2\]]yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/kun nas 'dus pa'i sems la kun nas 'dus pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/rnam par 'phros pa'i sems la rnam par 'phros pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa 
[\[4b.3\]]ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/rgya chung ba'i sems la/_rgya chung ba'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/rgya che ba'i sems la/_rgya che ba'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/yangs 
[\[4b.4\]]pa'i sems la yangs pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/tshad med pa'i sems la tshad med pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/mnyam par bzhag pa'i sems la mnyam par bzhag 
[\[4b.5\]]pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i sems la/_mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/rnam par grol ba'i sems la/_rnam par 
[\[4b.6\]]grol ba'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/rnam par ma grol ba'i sems la/_rnam par ma grol ba'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/zag pa dang bcas pa'i sems la/_zag pa 
[\[4b.7\]]dang bcas pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/zag pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i sems la/_zag pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa'i sems la/_nyon mongs 
[\[5a\]]
[\[5a.1\]]pa dang bcas pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/nyon mongs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i sems la/_nyon mongs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/bla na yod pa'i 
[\[5a.2\]]sems la/_bla na yod pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/bla na med pa'i sems la/_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/de ni sngon gyi gnas rnam pa du ma rjes su dran 
[\[5a.3\]]te/_sems gcig kyang rjes su dran pa nas/_sems brgya'i bar du yang rjes su dran no/_/nyi ma gcig kyang rjes su dran pa nas/_nyi ma brgya'i bar du yang rjes su dran no/_/zla ba gcig rjes su dran pa nas/_zla ba brgya'i bar du yang 
[\[5a.4\]]rjes su dran no/_/lo gcig rjes su dran pa nas/_lo brgya'i bar du yang rjes su dran no/_/bskal pa gcig rjes su dran pa nas/_bskal pa brgya'i bar du yang rjes su dran no/_/bskal pa brgya phrag du ma yang rjes su dran no/_/bskal pa stong 
[\[5a.5\]]phrag du ma yang rjes su dran no/_/bskal pa brgya stong phrag du ma yang rjes su dran no/_/bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma yang rjes su dran te/_/bdag ni de lta bu zhig na 'dug 'dug ste/[ {]mying [,]ming [}]ni 'di zhes bya/_rus ni 'di zhes bya/_rigs ni 'di 
[\[5a.6\]]zhes bya/_kha zas ni 'di lta bu zhig za za/_yun ni 'di srid cig tu 'dug 'dug_/tshe'i mtha' ni 'di tsam cig tu gyur te/_de ltar bdag de nas shi 'phos nas/_che ge mo zhig tu skyes so zhes bya ba nas/_de nas shi 'phos nas ni 'dir skyes so 
[\[5a.7\]]zhes bya ba'i bar du rnam pa dang bcas/_gtan tshigs dang bcas/_de na rtags dang bcas par bdag dang gzhan gyi sngon gyi gnas rnam pa du mar rjes su dran no/_/de ni lha'i [{]myig [,]mig [}]rnam par dag pa/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]las 'das pas sems can 'chi 'pho ba dang /_
[\[5b\]]
[\[5b.1\]]skye ba dang kha dog sdug pa dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]sdug pa dang /_bzang ba dang /_ngan pa dang /_ngan song na gnas pa dang /_bde 'gro na gnas pa dag kyang rab tu shes te/_sems can 'di dag ni lus kyis ngan du spyod pa dang ldan pa/_ngag gis ngan du spyod 
[\[5b.2\]]pa dang ldan pa/_yid kyis ngan du spyod pa dang ldan pa 'phags pa rnams la skur pa 'debs pa/_log par lta ba rnams te/_de'i rgyu de'i rkyen kyis lus zhig nas ngan song dang ngan 'gro log par ltung ba sems can dmyal ba dag du skye'o/_/
[\[5b.3\]]sems can 'di dag ni lus kyis legs par spyod pa dang ldan pa/_ngag gis legs par spyod pa dang ldan pa/_yid kyis legs par spyod pa dang ldan pa/_'phags pa la skur pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]'debs pa/_yang dag par lta ba rnams te/_de'i rgyu 
[\[5b.4\]]de'i rkyen kyis lus zhig nas/_bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du lha'i nang du skye bar 'gyur ro zhes bya bar rab tu shes te/_de ltar phyogs bcu kun kyi 'jig rten gyi khams chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/_nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa dag gi 
[\[5b.5\]]'gro ba drug tu gtogs pa rnams kyi skye ba dang /_'chi 'pho ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te/_de mngon par shes pa lnga po de dag la rab tu gnas nas/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur bya ba dang /_yongs 
[\[5b.6\]]su dri ba dang /_yongs su zhu ba dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba bstsags pa dang /_sems can yongs su smyin par bya ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ste/_dge ba'i rtsa ba 
[\[5b.7\]]de dag kyang nyan thos kyi sa'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]sngo'o/_gzhan du na sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo zhing /_ci nas kyang gang yongs su 
[\[6a\]]
[\[6a.1\]]sngo ba dang /_ci yongs su sngo ba dang /_gang la yongs su bsngo ba'i blo rnam pa gsum du [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ba de ltar yongs su sngo ste/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]
[\[6a.2\]]pa la gnas shing /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin to/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_bsam gtan gyi pha [{]rold [,]rol [}]tu phyin pa la gnas shing /_shes rab kyi 
[\[6a.3\]]pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pas/_gzugs [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/
[\[6a.4\]]tshor ba [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/'du shes [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/'du byed [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/rnam par shes pa [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/[{]myig [,]mig [}{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/rna ba [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/sna [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/lce [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/lus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/yid 
[\[6a.5\]{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/gzugs [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/sgra [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/dri [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/ro [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/reg [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/chos [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]gi rnam par shes pa [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/rna ba'i rnam par shes pa [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/
[\[6a.6\]]sna'i rnam par shes pa [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/lce'i rnam par shes pa [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/lus kyi rnam par shes pa mi dmigs so/_/yid kyi rnam par shes pa [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]
[\[6a.7\]]so/_/sna'i 'dus te reg pa [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/lce'i 'dus te reg pa [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/rna ba'i 
[\[6b\]]
[\[6b.1\]]'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/yid kyi 'dus 
[\[6b.2\]]te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/sa'i khams [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/chu'i khams [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/[{]mye'i [,]me'i [}]khams mi dmigs so/_/rlung gi khams [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/nam mkha'i khams [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/rnam par shes pa'i khams [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/
[\[6b.3\]]ma rig pa [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/'du byed [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/rnam par shes pa [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/[{]mying [,]ming [}]dang gzugs [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/skye mched drug [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/reg pa [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/tshor ba mi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/sred pa [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/len pa [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]
[\[6b.4\]]so/_/srid pa [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/skye ba [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/rga shi [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu 
[\[6b.5\]]phyin pa [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/nang stong pa nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/phyi stong pa nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/phyi nang stong pa nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid 
[\[6b.6\]{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/chen po stong pa nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/don dam pa stong pa nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/'dus byas stong pa nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/'dus ma byas stong pa nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/thog ma dang tha 
[\[6b.7\]]ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/chos thams cad stong pa nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[7a\]]
[\[7a.1\]{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/yang dag par spong ba 
[\[7a.2\]]bzhi [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/dbang po lnga [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/stobs lnga [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/byang chub kyi yan lag bdun [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/'phags pa'i bden

[\[7a.4\]{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/mngon par shes pa rnams [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/ting nge 'dzin rnams [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/gzungs kyi sgo rnams [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/de bzhin gshegs

[\[7b\]]
[\[7b.1\]]de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung ma byung yang rung ste/_chos rnams kyi chos kyi gnas nyid de ni gnas pa ste/_chos kyi dbyings de bzhin gnas pa'i phyir/_de [{]myi [,]mi [}]skye [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gag pas/_de 
[\[7b.2\]]g.yeng ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i sems dang ldan par rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang ma bral ba yin te/_rab 'byor de ltar na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /_
[\[7b.3\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin to/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa 
[\[7b.4\]]lags/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_chos thams cad stong pa'o zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mthong ngo /_/gsol pa/_
[\[7b.5\]]bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_chos thams cad stong pa'o zhes bgyi bar yang dag par rjes su mthong ba lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[7b.6\]]rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_nang stong pa nyid la nang stong pa nyid ces bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/phyi stong pa nyid la phyi stong pa nyid ces bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/phyi

[\[9a.5\]{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/[{]mying [,]ming [}]dang gzugs stong zhes bya ba 'am/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]stong zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/skye mched drug stong zhes bya ba 'am/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]stong zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/reg pa stong zhes bya ba 'am/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]stong zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/tshor ba stong zhes

[\[9b\]]
[\[9b.1\]]tu phyin pa stong zhes bya ba 'am/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]stong zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong zhes bya ba 'am/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]stong zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong zhes bya ba 'am/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]stong zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]
[\[9b.2\]]so/_/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong zhes bya ba 'am/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]stong zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong zhes bya ba 'am/_mi stong zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/nang stong pa nyid stong zhes bya ba 'am/_mi stong zhes bya bar 
[\[9b.3\]{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/phyi stong pa nyid stong zhes bya ba 'am/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]stong zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/phyi nang stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya ba 'am/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]stong zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong zhes bya ba 'am/_mi stong zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]
[\[9b.4\]]so/_/chen po stong pa nyid stong zhes bya ba 'am/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]stong zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/don dam pa stong pa nyid stong zhes bya ba 'am/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]stong zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/'dus byas stong pa nyid stong zhes bya ba 'am/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]stong zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/
[\[9b.5\]]'dus ma byas stong pa nyid stong zhes bya ba 'am/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]stong zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid stong zhes bya ba 'am/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]stong zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid stong zhes bya ba 'am/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]stong zhes bya 
[\[9b.6\]]bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs so/_/dor ba med pa stong pa nyid stong zhes bya ba 'am/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]stong zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid stong zhes bya ba 'am/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]stong zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/chos thams cad stong pa nyid stong zhes bya ba 'am/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[9b.7\]]stong zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid stong zhes bya ba'am/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]stong zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid stong zhes bya ba 'am/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]stong zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid stong zhes bya ba 
[\[10a\]]
[\[10a.1\]]'am/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]stong zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong zhes bya ba 'am/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]stong zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong zhes bya ba 'am/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]stong zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/
[\[10a.2\]]dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi stong zhes bya ba 'am/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]stong zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/yang dag par spong ba bzhi stong zhes bya ba'am/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]stong zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi stong zhes bya ba'am/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]stong zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]
[\[10a.3\]]so/_/dbang po lnga stong zhes bya ba 'am/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]stong zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/stobs lnga stong zhes bya ba'am/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]stong zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/byang chub kyi yan lag bdun stong zhes bya ba 'am/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]stong zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/
[\[10a.4\]]'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa stong zhes bya ba 'am/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]stong zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi stong zhes bya ba 'am/_mi stong zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/bsam gtan bzhi stong zhes bya ba'am/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]stong

[\[10a.7\]{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong zhes bya ba 'am/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]stong zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/mngon par shes pa rnams stong zhes bya ba 'am/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]stong zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/ting nge 'dzin rnams stong zhes bya ba 'am/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]stong zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/gzungs kyi 
[\[10b\]]
[\[10b.1\]]sgo rnams stong zhes bya ba 'am/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]stong zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu stong zhes bya ba 'am/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]stong zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhi stong zhes bya ba 'am/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]stong zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/
[\[10b.2\]]so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi stong zhes bya ba 'am/_mi stong zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/snying rje chen po stong zhes bya ba 'am/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]stong zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad stong zhes bya ba 'am/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]stong zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]

[\[10b.4\]]zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/dgra bcom pa nyid stong zhes bya ba'am/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]stong zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/rang byang chub stong zhes bya ba'am/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]stong zhes bya bar mi dmigs so/_/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub stong zhes bya ba 'am/_
[\[10b.5\]{]myi [,]mi [}]stong zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/'dus byas kyi khams stong zhes bya ba 'am/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]stong zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/'dus ma byas kyi khams stong zhes bya ba 'am/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]stong zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[10b.6\]]chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la spyod cing zas sam/_skom mam/_bzhon pa'am/_gos sam/_me tog gam/_phreng ba'am/_spos sam/_byug pa'am/_mal cha'am/_gnas sam/_'tsho ba'am/_yo byad dam/[ {]myi'i [,]mi'i [}]yo byad gzhan gang 
[\[10b.7\]]yang rung ba sbyin pa gang dang gang gtong yang des sbyin pa de stong pa zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mthong ngo /_/gang yongs su gtong ba dang /_gang la yongs su gtong ba de yang stong pa zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mthong ste/_de la 'jungs pa'i sems sam/_yongs su 
[\[11a\]]
[\[11a.1\]]'dzin pa'i sems kyi skabs [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la/_sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/_snying po byang chub la 'dug gi bar du rnam 
[\[11a.2\]]par rtog pa de dag thams cad med de/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa la ji ltar 'jungs pa'i thugs sam/_yongs su 'dzin pa'i 
[\[11a.3\]]thugs mi mnga' ba de bzhin du/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa la yang 'jungs pa'i sems sam/_yongs su 'dzin pa'i sems skye ba [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid/_byang 
[\[11a.4\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ston pa'o/_/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin to/_/gsol pa/_bcom 
[\[11a.5\]]ldan 'das ji ltar na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di la 
[\[11a.6\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi sems kyi go skabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]'byed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar des nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sa gang du 
[\[11a.7\]]yongs su sngo ba de lta bu'i nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sa yang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_sems de yang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_de sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/_snying po byang chub la 'dug gi bar du bdag gis kyang srog gcod pa spangs pa yin/_
[\[11b\]]
[\[11b.1\]]gzhan yang srog gcod pa spong ba la yang dag par skul ba yin/_srog gcod pa spong ba'i legs pa rjod pa yin/_gzhan gang gis srog gcod pa spangs pa de dag gi legs pa rjod cing mthun pas dga' bar byed pa yin/_bdag gis kyang ma byin par len pa 
[\[11b.2\]]spangs pa yin/_gzhan yang ma byin par len pa spong ba la yang dag par skul ba yin/_ma byin par len pa spong ba'i legs pa rjod pa yin/_gzhan gang gis ma byin par len pa spangs pa de dag gi legs pa rjod cing mthun pas dga' bar byed pa yin/_
[\[11b.3\]]bdag gis kyang 'dod pas log par g.yem pa spangs pa yin/_gzhan yang 'dod pas log par g.yem pa spong ba la yang dag par skul ba yin/_'dod pas log par g.yem pa spong ba'i legs pa rjod pa yin/_gzhan gang gis 'dod pas log 
[\[11b.4\]]par g.yem pa spangs pa de dag gi legs pa rjod cing mthun pas dga' bar byed pa yin/_bdag gis kyang [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba spangs pa yin/_gzhan yang [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba spong ba la yang dag par skul ba yin/[ {]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba spong ba'i legs pa rjod pa yin/_
[\[11b.5\]]gzhan gang gis [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba spangs pa de dag gi legs pa rjod cing mthun pas dga' bar byed pa yin/_bdag gis kyang phra ma spangs pa yin/_gzhan yang phra ma spong ba la yang dag par skul ba yin/_phra ma spong ba'i legs pa rjod pa yin/_gzhan gang gis 
[\[11b.6\]]phra ma spangs pa de dag gi legs pa rjod cing mthun pas dga' bar byed pa yin/_bdag gis kyang zhe gcod pa'i tshig spangs pa yin/_gzhan yang zhe gcod pa'i tshig spong ba la yang dag par skul ba yin/_zhe gcod pa'i tshig spong ba'i legs pa rjod pa yin/_
[\[11b.7\]]gzhan gang gis zhe gcod pa'i tshig spangs pa de dag gi legs pa rjod cing mthun pas dga' bar byed pa yin/_bdag gis kyang tshig kyal pa spangs pa yin/_gzhan yang tshig kyal pa spong ba la yang dag par skul ba yin/_tshig kyal pa spong ba'i legs pa rjod pa 
[\[12a\]]
[\[12a.1\]]yin/_gzhan gang gis tshig kyal pa spangs pa de dag gi legs pa rjod cing mthun pas dga' bar byed pa yin/_bdag gis kyang chags sems spangs pa yin/_gzhan yang chags sems spong ba la yang dag par skul ba yin/_
[\[12a.2\]]chags sems spong ba'i legs pa rjod pa yin/_gzhan gang gis chags sems spangs pa de dag gi legs pa rjod cing mthun pas dga' bar byed pa yin/_bdag gis kyang gnod sems spangs pa yin/_gzhan yang gnod sems spong ba la yang dag par skul ba 
[\[12a.3\]]yin/_gnod sems spong ba'i legs pa rjod pa yin/_gzhan gang gis gnod sems spangs pa de dag gi legs pa rjod cing mthun pas dga' bar byed pa yin/_bdag gis kyang log par lta ba spangs pa yin/_gzhan yang log par lta ba spong ba la yang 
[\[12a.4\]]dag par skul ba yin/_log par lta ba spong ba'i legs pa rjod pa yin/_gzhan gang gis log par lta ba spangs pa de dag gi legs pa rjod cing mthun pas dga' bar byed pa yin te/_tshul khrims des nyan thos sam/_rang sangs rgyas kyi chos 
[\[12a.5\]]gang la yang chags par mi 'gyur na/_gzhan man chad lta ci smos te/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin to/_/gsol pa/_
[\[12a.6\]]bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub 
[\[12a.7\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /_rjes su mthun pa'i bzod pa skyes te/_de 'di snyam du 'di la chos gang yang skye ba'am/_'gag pa'am/_'byung ba'am/_'jig pa'am/_'chi ba'am/_gshe ba'am/_
[\[12b\]]
[\[12b.1\]]'khyal ba'am/_gcad pa'am/_gtub pa'am/_brdeg pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do snyam pas de la sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/_snying po byang chub la 'dug gi bar du gal te sems can thams cad drung du lhags nas spyos te/_bkyal tam/_rdo 
[\[12b.2\]]dbyug gis brdegs sam/_mtshon gyis btab ste bcad gtubs kyang de la 'di snyam ste/_kye ma chos rnams kyi chos nyid 'di ni ngo mtshar che ste/_'di la chos gang la yang spyo ba'am/_bkyal ba'am/_bcad pa'am/_gtub pa'am/_brdeg 
[\[12b.3\]]pa'am/_bcing ba [{]myed [,]med [}]do snyam ste/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin to/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na/_
[\[12b.4\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[12b.5\]]sems dpa' chen po/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la gnas te/_thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pas/_lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus bskyed de/_'jig rten gyi khams gcig gam/_'jig rten 
[\[12b.6\]]gyi khams brgya 'am/_'jig rten gyi khams stong ngam/_'jig rten gyi khams brgya phrag stong ngam/_'jig rten gyi khams bye ba'am/_'jig rten gyi khams bye ba brgya'am/_'jig rten gyi khams bye ba stong ngam/_'jig rten gyi khams bye ba brgya 
[\[12b.7\]]phrag stong ngam/_'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong dag du song ste/_sems can rnams la chos ston cing /_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la rab tu 'god do/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rab tu 'god do/_/bzod pa'i pha rol tu 
[\[13a\]]
[\[13a.1\]]phyin pa la rab tu 'god do/_/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rab tu 'god do/_/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rab tu 'god do/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rab tu 'god do/_/byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad la rab 
[\[13a.2\]]tu 'god do/_/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la rab tu 'god do/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rab tu 'god do/_/phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rab tu 'god do/_/dgra bcom pa nyid la rab tu 'god do/_/rang byang chub la rab tu 'god do/_/bla na med pa 
[\[13a.3\]]yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la rab tu 'god do/_/de yang ci nas kyang 'dus byas kyi khams la rab tu bkod pa yang ma yin/_'dus ma byas kyi khams la rab tu bkod pa yang ma yin pa de ltar rab tu 'god do/_/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems 
[\[13a.4\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin to/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_/shes rab 
[\[13a.5\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 
[\[13a.6\]]gnas shing /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi ting nge 'dzin tam/_rang sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin tam/_byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin kyang rung ste/_ting nge 'dzin gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad la snyoms par 
[\[13a.7\]]'jug ste/_ting nge 'dzin de dag la gnas shing /_rnam par thar pa brgyad la lugs dang mthun pa dang /_lugs dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthun par snyoms par 'jug cing rnam par ldang ngo /_/brgyad gang zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[13b\]]
[\[13b.1\]]dpa' chen po gzugs can gyis gzugs rnams mthong ba 'di ni rnam par thar pa dang po'o/_/nang gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i 'du shes dang ldan pas phyi rol gyi gzugs rnams mthong ba 'di ni rnam par thar pa gnyis pa'o/_/bzang bar mos pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa 
[\[13b.2\]]gsum pa'o/_/de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te/_thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing /_sna tshogs kyi 'du shes rnams yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed pas/_nam mkha' mtha' yas so zhes te/_nam mkha' 
[\[13b.3\]]mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa bzhi pa'o/_/de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/_rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so zhes te/_rnam shes mtha' yas skye 
[\[13b.4\]]mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa lnga pa'o/_/de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/[ {]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]ma yod do zhes [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]med pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di 
[\[13b.5\]]ni rnam par thar pa drug pa'o/_/de rnam pa thams cad du [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/_'du shes [{]myed [,]med [}]'du shes [{]myed [,]med [}{]myin [,]min [}]skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa bdun pa'o/_/de rnam pa thams 
[\[13b.6\]]cad du 'du shes [{]myed [,]med [}]'du shes [{]myed [,]med [}{]myin [,]min [}]skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/_'du shes dang /_tshor ba 'gog pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa brgyad pa ste/_de ltar na rnam par thar pa brgyad po 'di dag la lugs dang mthun pa 
[\[13b.7\]]dang /_/lugs dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthun par snyoms par 'jug cing rnam par ldang ngo /_/mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la lugs dang mthun pa dang /_lugs dang mi mthun par snyoms par 'jug cing rnam par ldang ste/_dgu gang zhe na/_rab 'byor 
[\[14a\]]
[\[14a.1\]]'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_'dod pas dben sdig to [{]myi [,]mi [}]dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa rtog pa dang bcas pa/_dpyod pa dang bcas pa dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam 
[\[14a.2\]]gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/de rnam par rtog pa dang /_rnam par dpyod pa nye bar zhi nas nang yongs su dang ste/_sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas/_rtog pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_dpyod pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba 
[\[14a.3\]]dang /_bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/de dga' ba las 'dod chags dang bral bas dran pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin du btang snyoms su gnas te/_bde ba lus kyis myong la 'phags pa rnams kyis de la dran pa 
[\[14a.4\]]dang ldan pa bde ba la rnam par spyod pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/_dga' ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/de bde ba yang spangs/_sdug bsngal yang spangs shing yid bde ba dang /_yid mi bde ba snga nas kyang 
[\[14a.5\]]nub pas bde ba yang [{]myed [,]med [}]sdug bsngal ba yang [{]myed [,]med [}]pa btang snyoms dang dran pas yongs su dag pa bsam gtan bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te/_thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub 
[\[14a.6\]]par gyur cing /_sna tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed pas/_nam mkha' mtha' yas so zhes te/_nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/_
[\[14a.7\]]rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so zhes rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/[ {]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]ma yod do zhes [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs 
[\[14b\]]
[\[14b.1\]]te gnas so/_/de rnam pa thams cad du [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/_'du shes [{]myed [,]med [}]'du shes [{]myed [,]med [}{]myin [,]min [}]skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/de rnam pa thams cad du 'du shes med 'du shes [{]myed [,]med [}{]myin [,]min [}]skye mched las yang dag par 
[\[14b.2\]]'das te/_/'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/de ltar mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu po de dag la lugs dang mthun pa dang /_lugs dang mi mthun par snyoms par 'jug cing rnam par ldang ngo /_/de rnam par thar pa 
[\[14b.3\]]brgyad po de dag dang /_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu po de dag rnam par phye zhing seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di la snyoms par 'jug go/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas nas/_rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i yan lag bcu gnyis 
[\[14b.4\]]lugs dang mthun pa dang /_lugs dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthun pa la so sor rtog go_/de la yan lag bcu gnyis gang dag ce na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ma rig pa'i rkyen kyis 'du byed ces so sor rtog go_/'du byad kyi rkyen gyis rnam par 
[\[14b.5\]]shes pa zhes so sor rtog go_/rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis [{]mying [,]ming [}]dang gzugs zhes so sor rtog go_/[{]mying [,]ming [}]dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis skye mched drug ces so sor rtog go_/skye mched drug gi rkyen kyis reg pa zhes so sor rtog go_/reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba zhes so sor rtog 
[\[14b.6\]]go_/tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sred pa zhes so sor rtog go_/sred pa'i rkyen kyis len pa zhes so sor rtog go_/len pa'i rkyen gyis srid pa zhes so sor rtog go_/srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba zhes so sor rtog go_/skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi zhes so sor rtog go_/rga shi'i rkyen 
[\[14b.7\]]gyis mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid [{]myi [,]mi [}]bde ba dang /_'khrug pa la so sor rtog par byed cing /_'di ltar sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' shig po 'di 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes so sor rtog go_/rga shi [{]myed [,]med [}]na 
[\[15a\]]
[\[15a.1\]]mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid [{]myi [,]mi [}]bde ba dang /_'khrug pa dang /_sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' shig po rnams 'byung bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro zhes so sor rtog cing /_skye ba med na rga shi 'byung bar

[\[15a.3\]]pa 'byung bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro zhes so sor rtog go_/reg pa [{]myed [,]med [}]na tshor ba 'byung bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro zhes so sor rtog go_/skye mched drug [{]myed [,]med [}]na reg pa 'byung bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro zhes so sor rtog go_/[{]mying [,]ming [}]dang gzugs med na skye mched drug 'byung bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro zhes so 
[\[15a.4\]]sor rtog go_/rnam par shes pa [{]myed [,]med [}]na [{]mying [,]ming [}]dang gzugs 'byung bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro zhes so sor rtog go_/'du byed med na rnam par shes pa 'byung bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro zhes so sor rtog go_/ma rig pa med na 'du byed 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro zhes so sor rtog cing /_
[\[15a.5\]]de ltar na sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' shig po 'di 'gag par 'gyur ro zhes so sor rtog go_/de ltar na rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i yan lag bcu gnyis po lugs dang mthun pa dang /_lugs dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthun pa la so sor rtog cing /_dge ba'i

[\[15b\]]
[\[15b.1\]]'dzin seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa de gang zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_/'dod pas dben sdig to [{]myi [,]mi [}]dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa/_rtog pa dang bcas pa dpyod pa dang bcas pa dben pa las skyes

[\[16b\]]

[\[17a\]]
[\[17a.1\]]mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa las langs nas/_'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug go_/'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa las langs nas/_'du shes med 'du shes med [{]myin [,]min [}]skye mched kyi snyoms par

[\[17b\]]
[\[17b.1\]]las langs nas/_mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i sems su byed do/_/mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i sems las/_bsam gtan gsum pa la snyoms par 'jug go_/bsam gtan gsum pa las langs nas/_mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i sems su byed
