[\[17b.4\]]de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin to/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las/_
[\[17b.5\]]le'u lnga bcu gnyis so//_//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/_/bam po gnyis pa/_/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub 
[\[17b.6\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_gang thabs mkhas pa de lta bu dang ldan pa de/_yun ring po ji srid cig nas yang dag par zhugs pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor thabs mkhas pa de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang 
[\[17b.7\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_de ni bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig grangs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa nas yang dag par zhugs pa yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_gang thabs mkhas pa de lta bu dang ldan pa 
[\[18a\]]
[\[18a.1\]]des/_sangs rgyas ji snyed cig bsnyen bkur ba lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor thabs mkhas pa de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des ni sangs rgyas gang gA'i klung 
[\[18a.2\]]gi bye ma snyed bsnyen bkur bar rig par bya'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang thabs mkhas pa de lta bu dang ldan pa des/_dge ba'i rtsa ba ci zhig bskrun pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal 
[\[18a.3\]]pa/_sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pa des/_yongs su rdzogs par ma byas pa'i/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i bya ba de lta bu gang yang med do/_/byang chub 
[\[18a.4\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des yongs su rdzogs par ma byas pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bya ba de lta bu gang yang [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des yongs su rdzogs par ma byas pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu 
[\[18a.5\]]phyin pa'i bya ba de lta bu gang yang [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des yongs su rdzogs par ma byas pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bya ba de lta bu gang yang [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des 
[\[18a.6\]]yongs su rdzogs par ma byas pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bya ba de lta bu gang yang [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des yongs su rdzogs par ma byas pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bya ba de lta bu gang yang med do/_/gsol 
[\[18a.7\]]pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs mkhas pa de lta bu dang ldan pa de dag ni ngo mtshar che'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[18b\]]
[\[18b.1\]]dpa' chen po thabs mkhas pa de lta bu dang ldan pa de dag ni ngo mtshar che'o/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ni gling bzhir/_las byed cing gling bzhi'i rjes su 'gro'o/_/gling bzhi'i rjes su 'brang ngo /_/
[\[18b.2\]]rab 'byor de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang pha rol tu phyin pa lngar las byed cing /_pha rol tu phyin pa lnga'i rjes su 'gro'o/_/pha rol tu phyin pa lnga'i rjes su 'brang ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral na/_pha rol tu phyin pa lnga pha 
[\[18b.3\]]rol tu phyin pa'i [{]mying [,]ming [}]'thob bo/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral na/_pha rol tu phyin pa lnga pha rol tu phyin pa'i [{]mying [,]ming [}{]myi [,]mi [}]'thob bo/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po dang bral na/_rin po che sna bdun gyis 'khor 
[\[18b.4\]]los sgyur ba'i ming mi 'thob bo/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du pha rol tu phyin pa lnga yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral na/_pha rol tu phyin pa'i [{]mying [,]ming [}{]myi [,]mi [}]'thob bo/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_khyim thab [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i bud [{]myed [,]med [}]rnams ni/_
[\[18b.5\]]'phyon ma rnams kyis tshugs par sla ba yin no/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du pha rol tu phyin pa lnga yang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral na/_bdud dam bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams kyis tshugs par sla ba yin no/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_
[\[18b.6\]]khyim thab dpa' bos shin tu bsrungs pa'i bud [{]myed [,]med [}]shin tu phun sum tshogs pa'i khyim na 'dug pa ni/_'phyon ma rnams kyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]tshugs pa yin no/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du pha rol tu phyin pa lnga yang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral na/_
[\[18b.7\]]bdud dam bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams kyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]tshugs pa yin no/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_g.yul du 'gro ba'i skyes bu go cha tshang bar gyon pa mtshon cha thams cad thogs pa ni g.yul ngo na 'dug pa'i tshe/_rgyal po zla 'am/_phyir rgol ba dang /_
[\[19a\]]
[\[19a.1\]]dgra rnams kyis thub par dka'o/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du pha rol tu phyin pa lnga yang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral na/_bdud dam bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams dang /_gang zag lhag pa'i nga rgyal can nam/_byang 
[\[19a.2\]]chub sems dpa' gdol pa rnams kyis kyang thub par dka'o/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po la khams kyi rgyal po yod pa rnams ni nang nub nang nub cing rim gro bya ba'i don du drung du 'ong ngo /_/rab 'byor de bzhin 
[\[19a.3\]]du pha rol tu phyin pa lnga yang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin na/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gang na ba der 'dong ngo /_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_chu klung gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad ni chu klung chen po 
[\[19a.4\]]gang gA gang na ba der 'dong ngo /_/de dag chu klung gang gA dang 'grogs shing rgya mtsho chen po'i nang du 'dong do/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du pha rol tu phyin pa lnga yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin na/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 
[\[19a.5\]]gang na ba der 'dong ngo /_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_skyes bu'i lag pa g.yas pa ni dgos pa thams cad byed do/_/rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang de bzhin du blta ste/_pha rol tu phyin pa lnga ni lag pa g.yon pa ji lta ba bzhin 
[\[19a.6\]]du blta'o/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_chu klung phra mo rnams kyi chu dang chu klung chen po rnams kyi chu gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyang /_rgya mtsho chen por phyin na 'di lta ste/_lan tsha'i ror ro gcig par 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor de bzhin 
[\[19a.7\]]du pha rol tu phyin pa lnga yang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin na/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du phyin pa'i tshe/_'di lta ste/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ngor ro gcig par 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_
[\[19b\]]
[\[19b.1\]]'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi dang ldan pa'i mdun du ni/_'khor lo rin po che 'gro zhing 'dug ste/_gang du 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po zas kyi don du 'dug par gyur pa der 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i dpung gi tshogs 
[\[19b.2\]]thams cad yongs su tshim par byed cing 'khor lo rin po che de dag gnas nas g.yo ba [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du pha rol tu phyin pa lnga po 'di dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bkri ba yin te/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gang na ba der 
[\[19b.3\]]'dong ste/_/der gnas so/_/der gnas par gyur nas kyang gnas de las [{]myi [,]mi [}]'da' 'o/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i 'khor lo rin po che de dang /_blon po rin po che de dang /_khyim bdag rin po che de dang /_bud [{]myed [,]med [}]
[\[19b.4\]]rin po che de dang /_nor bu rin po che de dang /_glang po rin po che de dang /_rta rin po che de dag ni dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi dang ldan pa'i mdun du 'dong ngo /_/rab 'byor de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang pha rol tu phyin pa lnga po 'di dag gi mdun du 
[\[19b.5\]]'gro ste/_mdun du song nas kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gang na ba der gnas par 'gyur te/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'di snyam du bdag gi phyi bzhin du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'brang ngo snyam du [{]myi [,]mi [}]sems so/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu 
[\[19b.6\]]phyin pa ni 'di snyam du bdag gi phyi bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'brang ngo snyam du [{]myi [,]mi [}]sems so/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'di snyam du bdag gi phyi bzhin du bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'brang ngo snyam du [{]myi [,]mi [}]sems so/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu 
[\[19b.7\]]phyin pa ni 'di snyam du bdag gi phyi bzhin du brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'brang ngo snyam du [{]myi [,]mi [}]sems so/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'di snyam du bdag gi phyi bzhin du bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'brang ngo snyam du [{]myi [,]mi [}]sems so/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu 
[\[20a\]]
[\[20a.1\]]phyin pa yang 'di snyam du bdag ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rjes su 'brang ngo snyam du mi sems so/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang 'di snyam du bdag ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rjes su 'brang ngo snyam du mi sems so/_/
[\[20a.2\]]bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang 'di snyam du bdag ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rjes su 'brang ngo snyam du [{]myi [,]mi [}]sems so/_/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang 'di snyam du bdag ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rjes su 'brang ngo snyam du mi sems so/_/
[\[20a.3\]]bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang 'di snyam du bdag ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rjes su 'brang ngo snyam du [{]myi [,]mi [}]sems so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de dag gi rang bzhin ni de yin te/_ci'ang nus pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ngo bo nyid kyis stong zhing gso ba ste/_smyig 
[\[20a.4\]]rgyu lta bu'o/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong pa lags na/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_
[\[20a.5\]]sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang /_shes rab kyi 
[\[20a.6\]]pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_pha rol tu phyin pa drug 
[\[20a.7\]]la spyod pa'i tshe/_'di snyam du kye ma 'jig rten gnas pa 'di ni/_sems phyin ci log tu gyur pa ste/_de dag ni thabs la mi mkhas pas/_'khor ba nas yongs su gdon par [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus kyis/_ma la bdag gis sems can de dag gi don du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la 
[\[20b\]]
[\[20b.1\]]spyad par bya'o/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bya'o/_/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bya'o/_/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bya'o/_/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bya'o/_/shes rab kyi pha rol 
[\[20b.2\]]tu phyin pa la spyad par bya'o snyam nas/_de sems can de dag gi don du phyi nang gi dngos po rnams yongs su gtong ste/_de yongs su gtong ba'i tshe 'di snyam ste/_bdag gis gang yang yongs su ma gtang ba [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar dngos po 'di dag 
[\[20b.3\]]ni bdag nyid 'jig pa'o snyam ste/_rab 'byor de ltar yongs su rtog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/de sems can de dag nyid kyi don du tshul khrims ngan pa'i skabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]'byed de/_
[\[20b.4\]]de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar da 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs la srog gcod pa byed pa dang /_ma byin par len pa dang /_'dod pas log par g.yem pa dang /[ {]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]gyi tshig 
[\[20b.5\]]smra ba dang /_phra ma can du 'gyur ba dang /_zhe gcod pa'i tshig smra ba dang /_tshig kyal pa can du 'gyur ba dang /_chags sems can du 'gyur ba dang /_gnod sems su byed pa dang /_log par lta ba can du 'gyur ba dang /_yul la smon pa dang /_lhar 
[\[20b.6\]]smon pa dang /_tshangs par smon pa dang /_nyan thos kyi sar smon pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar smon pa 'di ni bdag tshul dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dra'o snyam ste/_rab 'byor de ltar yongs su rtog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/_tshul khrims kyi pha 
[\[20b.7\]]rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no/_/de sems can de dag nyid kyi don du tshig rtsub pa dang /_brlang bas rtag tu spyos shing /_brgyad kyang 'khrug pa'i sems [{]myi [,]mi [}]skyed/_rdo dbyug dang /_bong ba dang /_mtshon gyis btab cing bsnun pa dang /_lus kyi yan 
[\[21a\]]
[\[21a.1\]]lag gshags sam/_yan lag dang nying lag bcad kyang zhe sdang gi sems mi skyed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar de ni sgra thams cad sgra brnyan lta bur yongs su rtog go_/gzugs thams cad dbu ba lta bur yongs su rtog go_/rab 
[\[21a.2\]]'byor de ltar yongs su rtog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no/_/de sems can de dag nyid kyi don du dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yongs su btsal ba'i phyir/_le lo'i sems mi skyed de/_
[\[21a.3\]]de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar de ni 'di snyam du sems te/_mtho ris su skye ba'ang le lo can gyis rnyed par dka' na/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub lta ci smos kyis/_de bas na bdag gis nam bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[21a.4\]]byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du brtson 'grus brtsam par bya'o/_/rtag tu brtson pa mi 'dor bar bya'o snyam ste/_rab 'byor de ltar yongs su rtog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod 
[\[21a.5\]]pa yin no/_/de sems can de dag nyid kyi don du sems [{]myi [,]mi [}]'khrugs pa yin te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar de ni 'di snyam du sems te/_'jig rten pa'i bsam gtan du skye ba'ang sems 'khrugs pas rnyed par dka' na/_bla na med pa yang dag par 
[\[21a.6\]]rdzogs pa'i byang chub lta ci smos kyis/_de bas na bdag gis nam bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du bdag gis sems ma 'khrugs par bya'o snyam ste/_rab 'byor de ltar yongs su rtog pa'i 
[\[21a.7\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no/_/de sems can de dag nyid kyi don du nam bla na myid pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du/_nam yang shes rab 
[\[21b\]]
[\[21b.1\]]dang bral bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar de ni 'di snyam du sems te/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ma zhugs par rnam pa gzhan gyis sems can yongs su smyin par bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus kyis/_de bas na bdag gis shes rab 'chal pa dang 
[\[21b.2\]]ldan pa'i sems 'ga' tsam yang bskyed par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bya'o snyam ste/_rab 'byor de ltar yongs su rtog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can rnams kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gal 
[\[21b.3\]]te pha rol tu phyin pa rnams la tha dad pa ma mchis na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ji skad du pha rol tu phyin pa lnga'i rab ces bgyi/_gtso bo zhes bgyi/_mchog ces bgyi/_dam pa zhes bgyi/_phul zhes bgyi/_gya nom pa zhes bgyi/_bla na med pa zhes bgyi 
[\[21b.4\]]gong na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa zhes bgyi/_mnyam pa med pa zhes bgyi/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]mnyam pa dang mnyam pa zhes bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_rab 'byor pha rol tu phyin pa rnams la ni/_rnam pa tha dad pa gang yang 
[\[21b.5\]{]myed [,]med [}]de/_gal te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa [{]myed [,]med [}]na ni/_pha rol tu phyin pa lnga po 'di dag gis kyang pha rol tu phyin pa'i [{]mying [,]ming [}]'thob par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur te/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brten na/_pha rol tu phyin pa lnga po 'di dag gis kyang pha rol tu phyin 
[\[21b.6\]]pa'i [{]mying [,]ming [}]'thob par 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_lus rnam pa tha dad pa rnams ni ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyi drung du phyin na/_kha dog gcig tu 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brten na yang /_pha rol tu phyin 
[\[21b.7\]]pa lnga po 'di dag gis pha rol tu phyin pa'i [{]mying [,]ming [}]'thob par 'gyur te/_de dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du phyin na 'di lta ste/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi kha dog tu kha dog gcig par 'gyur te/_'di ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/
[\[22a\]]
[\[22a.1\]]'di ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/'di ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/'di ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/'di ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/zhes bya 
[\[22a.2\]]ba'i khyad par gang yang [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar de dag la ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pas/_de'i phyir khyad par [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ltar chos gang la yang khyad par ma mchis la bye brag ma mchis na/_rjes su thob par 'gyur ba ni 
[\[22a.3\]]gang zhig mchis/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni ci'i slad du pha rol tu phyin pa lnga po de dag gi rab ces bgyi/_gtso bo zhes bgyi/_mchog ces bgyi/_dam pa zhes bgyi/_phul zhes bgyi/_gya nom pa zhes bgyi/_bla na med pa zhes bgyi/_gong na med pa 
[\[22a.4\]]zhes bgyi/_mnyam pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa zhes bgyi/_mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa zhes bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_don rjes su thob par bya ba la/_chos gang la yang bye brag dang khyad par [{]myed [,]med [}]de/_'on 
[\[22a.5\]]kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad dang brdar bya na/_sems can rnams 'khor ba las yongs su gdon pa'i don du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang yod do/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang yod do/_/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang yod do/_/brtson 'grus kyi pha 
[\[22a.6\]]rol tu phyin pa yang yod do/_/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang yod do/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang yod do/_/sems can de dag la yang skye ba [{]myed[,]med[}]/_'chi ba [{]myed [,]med [}]'pho ba [{]myed [,]med [}]'byung ba [{]myed [,]med [}]de/_sems can med pas/_chos thams cad [{]myed [,]med [}]par 
[\[22a.7\]]rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor rnam grangs des na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/_pha rol tu phyin pa lnga po 'di dag gi rab ces bya/_gtso bo zhes bya/_mchog ces bya/_dam pa zhes bya/_phul zhes bya/_gya nom pa zhes bya/_bla na med pa zhes bya/_gong 
[\[22b\]]
[\[22b.1\]]na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa zhes bya/_mnyam pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa zhes bya/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]mnyam pa dang mnyam pa zhes bya ste/_rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_'dzam bu'i gling gi bud med gang ji snyed pa de dag gi nang na bud med rin po che ni rab ces bya/_gtso bo zhes bya/_mchog ces bya/_
[\[22b.2\]]dam pa zhes bya/_phul zhes bya/_gya nom pa zhes bya/_bla na med pa zhes bya/_gong na med pa zhes bya/_mnyam pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa zhes bya/_mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa zhes bya ba bzhin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rab ces 
[\[22b.3\]]bgyi ba dang /_gtso bo zhes bgyi ba dang /_mchog ces bgyi ba dang /_dam pa zhes bgyi ba dang /_phul zhes bgyi ba dang /_gya nom pa zhes bgyi ba dang /_bla na med pa zhes bgyi ba dang /_gong na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa zhes bgyi ba dang /_mnyam pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa zhes bgyi ba dang /_
[\[22b.4\]{]myi [,]mi [}]mnyam pa dang mnyam pa zhes bgyi ba de ci las dgongs/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/_dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su bzung zhing [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas pa'i tshul gyis/_rnam pa 
[\[22b.5\]]thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gang na ba der gnas par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa chos gang yang yongs su 'dzin pa 'am/_gtong ba mchis sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 
[\[22b.6\]]'byor de ni ma yin te/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni chos gang yang yongs su 'dzin pa'am/_gtong ba [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar chos thams cad yongs su bzung ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_btang ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir ro/_/gsol pa/_
[\[22b.7\]]bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa chos thams cad [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dzin [{]myi [,]mi [}]gtong ba lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gzugs yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dzin [{]myi [,]mi [}]gtong ngo /_/rab 'byor shes 
[\[23a\]]
[\[23a.1\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni tshor ba yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dzin [{]myi [,]mi [}]gtong ngo /_/rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'du shes yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dzin [{]myi [,]mi [}]gtong ngo /_/rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'du byed yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dzin [{]myi [,]mi [}]gtong 
[\[23a.2\]]ngo /_/rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rnam par shes pa yongs su mi 'dzin mi gtong ngo /_/rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni [{]myig [,]mig [}]yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dzin mi gtong ngo /_/rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rna ba yongs su mi 'dzin mi gtong 
[\[23a.3\]]ngo /_/rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni sna yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dzin mi gtong ngo /_/rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni lce yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dzin [{]myi [,]mi [}]gtong ngo /_/rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni lus yongs su mi 'dzin mi gtong ngo /_/
[\[23a.4\]]rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni yid yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dzin [{]myi [,]mi [}]gtong ngo /_/rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gzugs yongs su mi 'dzin mi gtong ngo /_/rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni sgra yongs su mi 'dzin mi gtong ngo /_/rab 
[\[23a.5\]]'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni dri yongs su mi 'dzin mi gtong ngo /_/rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni ro yongs su mi 'dzin mi gtong ngo /_/rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni reg yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dzin [{]myi [,]mi [}]gtong ngo /_/rab 'byor shes 
[\[23a.6\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni chos yongs su mi 'dzin [{]myi [,]mi [}]gtong ngo /_/rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni [{]myig [,]mig [}]gi rnam par shes pa yongs su mi 'dzin mi gtong ngo /_/rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rna ba'i rnam par shes pa yongs su mi 'dzin 
[\[23a.7\]{]myi [,]mi [}]gtong ngo /_/rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni sna'i rnam par shes pa yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dzin mi gtong ngo /_/rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni lce'i rnam par shes pa yongs su mi 'dzin mi gtong ngo /_/rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu 
[\[23b\]]
[\[23b.1\]]phyin pa ni lus kyi rnam par shes pa yongs su mi 'dzin [{]myi [,]mi [}]gtong ngo /_/rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dzin [{]myi [,]mi [}]gtong ngo /_/rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni [{]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa yongs su mi 'dzin [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[23b.2\]]gtong ngo /_/rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dzin [{]myi [,]mi [}]gtong ngo /_/rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dzin mi gtong ngo /_/rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[23b.3\]]ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dzin mi gtong ngo /_/rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa yongs su mi 'dzin [{]myi [,]mi [}]gtong ngo /_/rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yongs su mi 'dzin [{]myi [,]mi [}]gtong 
[\[23b.4\]]ngo /_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni [{]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba yongs su mi 'dzin [{]myi [,]mi [}]gtong ngo /_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dzin [{]myi [,]mi [}]gtong ngo /_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu 
[\[23b.5\]]phyin pa ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba yongs su mi 'dzin [{]myi [,]mi [}]gtong ngo /_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba yongs su mi 'dzin [{]myi [,]mi [}]gtong ngo /_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las 
[\[23b.6\]]byung ba'i tshor ba yongs su mi 'dzin mi gtong ngo /_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba yongs su mi 'dzin mi gtong ngo /_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni sa'i khams yongs su mi 'dzin [{]myi [,]mi [}]gtong ngo /_/
[\[23b.7\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni chu'i khams yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dzin [{]myi [,]mi [}]gtong ngo /_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni me'i khams yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dzin mi gtong ngo /_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rlung gi khams yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dzin [{]myi [,]mi [}]gtong ngo /_/shes rab 
[\[24a\]]
[\[24a.1\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni nam mkha'i khams yongs su mi 'dzin mi gtong ngo /_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rnam par shes pa'i khams yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dzin [{]myi [,]mi [}]gtong ngo /_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni ma rig pa yongs 
[\[24a.2\]]su mi 'dzin mi gtong ngo /_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'du byed yongs su mi 'dzin [{]myi [,]mi [}]gtong ngo /_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rnam par shes pa yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dzin mi gtong ngo /_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni [{]mying [,]ming [}]dang gzugs yongs su 
[\[24a.3\]{]myi [,]mi [}]'dzin mi gtong ngo /_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni skye mched drug yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dzin mi gtong ngo /_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni reg pa yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dzin [{]myi [,]mi [}]gtong ngo /_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni tshor ba yongs su mi 'dzin [{]myi [,]mi [}]gtong ngo /_/
[\[24a.4\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni sred pa yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dzin [{]myi [,]mi [}]gtong ngo /_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni len pa yongs su mi 'dzin [{]myi [,]mi [}]gtong ngo /_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni srid pa yongs su mi 'dzin mi gtong ngo /_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu 
[\[24a.5\]]phyin pa ni skye ba yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dzin mi gtong ngo /_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rga shi yongs su mi 'dzin [{]myi [,]mi [}]gtong ngo /_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dzin [{]myi [,]mi [}]gtong ngo /_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[24a.6\]]ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dzin [{]myi [,]mi [}]gtong ngo /_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dzin [{]myi [,]mi [}]gtong ngo /_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[24a.7\]]'dzin [{]myi [,]mi [}]gtong ngo /_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su mi 'dzin [{]myi [,]mi [}]gtong ngo /_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dzin [{]myi [,]mi [}]gtong ngo /_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[24b\]]
[\[24b.1\]]ni nang stong pa nyid yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dzin [{]myi [,]mi [}]gtong ngo /_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni phyi stong pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin mi gtong ngo /_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin mi gtong ngo /_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[24b.2\]]ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dzin [{]myi [,]mi [}]gtong ngo /_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni chen po stong pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin [{]myi [,]mi [}]gtong ngo /_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dzin [{]myi [,]mi [}]gtong ngo /_/shes 
[\[24b.3\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dzin [{]myi [,]mi [}]gtong ngo /_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin mi gtong ngo /_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid 
[\[24b.4\]]yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dzin mi gtong ngo /_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dzin [{]myi [,]mi [}]gtong ngo /_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dzin [{]myi [,]mi [}]gtong ngo /_/shes rab kyi 
[\[24b.5\]]pha rol tu phyin pa ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dzin [{]myi [,]mi [}]gtong ngo /_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dzin [{]myi [,]mi [}]gtong ngo /_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dzin [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[24b.6\]]gtong ngo /_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dzin [{]myi [,]mi [}]gtong ngo /_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dzin [{]myi [,]mi [}]gtong ngo /_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs 
[\[24b.7\]]su [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dzin [{]myi [,]mi [}]gtong ngo /_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin [{]myi [,]mi [}]gtong ngo /_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dzin [{]myi [,]mi [}]gtong ngo /_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[25a\]]
[\[25a.1\]]ni yang dag par spong ba bzhi yongs su mi 'dzin [{]myi [,]mi [}]gtong ngo /_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi yongs su mi 'dzin [{]myi [,]mi [}]gtong ngo /_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni dbang po lnga yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dzin [{]myi [,]mi [}]gtong ngo /_/
[\[25a.2\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni stobs lnga yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dzin [{]myi [,]mi [}]gtong ngo /_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni byang chub kyi yan lag bdun yongs su mi 'dzin [{]myi [,]mi [}]gtong ngo /_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su mi 'dzin 
[\[25a.3\]]mi gtong ngo /_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi yongs su mi 'dzin mi gtong ngo /_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bsam gtan bzhi yongs su mi 'dzin [{]myi [,]mi [}]gtong ngo /_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa bzhi yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[25a.4\]]'dzin [{]myi [,]mi [}]gtong ngo /_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dzin mi gtong ngo /_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rnam par thar pa brgyad yongs su mi 'dzin [{]myi [,]mi [}]gtong ngo /_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mthar kyis 
[\[25a.5\]]gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dzin [{]myi [,]mi [}]gtong ngo /_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dzin [{]myi [,]mi [}]gtong ngo /_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mngon 
[\[25a.6\]]par shes pa rnams yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dzin [{]myi [,]mi [}]gtong ngo /_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni ting nge 'dzin rnams yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dzin [{]myi [,]mi [}]gtong ngo /_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dzin [{]myi [,]mi [}]gtong ngo /_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin 
[\[25a.7\]]pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dzin [{]myi [,]mi [}]gtong ngo /_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhi yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dzin [{]myi [,]mi [}]gtong ngo /_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dzin [{]myi [,]mi [}]gtong ngo /_/
[\[25b\]]
[\[25b.1\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni snying rje chen po yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dzin [{]myi [,]mi [}]gtong ngo /_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dzin [{]myi [,]mi [}]gtong ngo /_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yongs 
[\[25b.2\]]su [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dzin [{]myi [,]mi [}]gtong ngo /_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yongs su mi 'dzin [{]myi [,]mi [}]gtong ngo /_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dzin [{]myi [,]mi [}]gtong ngo /_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni dgra bcom 
[\[25b.3\]]pa nyid yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dzin [{]myi [,]mi [}]gtong ngo /_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rang byang chub yongs su mi 'dzin [{]myi [,]mi [}]gtong ngo /_/rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dzin [{]myi [,]mi [}]gtong ngo /_/gsol pa/_
[\[25b.4\]]bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na gzugs yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/_ji ltar na tshor ba yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/_ji ltar na 'du shes yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/_ji ltar na 'du byed yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/_
[\[25b.5\]]ji ltar na rnam par shes pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/_ji ltar na [{]myig [,]mig [}]yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/_ji ltar na rna ba yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/_ji ltar na sna yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/_ji ltar na lce yongs su ma 
[\[25b.6\]]bzung ma btang ba lags/_ji ltar na lus yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/_ji ltar na yid yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/_ji ltar na gzugs yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/_ji ltar na sgra yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/_
[\[25b.7\]]ji ltar na dri yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/_ji ltar na ro yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/_ji ltar na reg yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/_ji ltar na chos yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/_ji ltar na [{]myig [,]mig [}]gi rnam par shes pa 
[\[26a\]]
[\[26a.1\]]yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/_ji ltar na rna ba'i rnam par shes pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/_ji ltar na sna'i rnam par shes pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/_ji ltar na lce'i rnam par shes pa yongs su 
[\[26a.2\]]ma bzung ma btang ba lags/_ji ltar na lus kyi rnam par shes pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/_ji ltar na yid kyi rnam par shes pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/_ji ltar na [{]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba 
[\[26a.3\]]lags/_ji ltar na rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/_ji ltar na sna'i 'dus te reg pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/_ji ltar na lce'i 'dus te reg pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/_ji ltar 
[\[26a.4\]]na lus kyi 'dus te reg pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/_ji ltar na yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/_ji ltar na [{]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/_
[\[26a.5\]]ji ltar na rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/_ji ltar na sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/_ji ltar na lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba 
[\[26a.6\]]yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/_ji ltar na lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/_ji ltar na yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/_ji ltar 
[\[26a.7\]]na sa'i khams yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/_ji ltar na chu'i khams yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/_ji ltar na me'i khams yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/_ji ltar na rlung gi khams yongs su ma bzung ma btang 
[\[26b\]]
[\[26b.1\]]ba lags/_ji ltar na nam mkha'i khams yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/_ji ltar na rnam par shes pa'i khams yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/_ji ltar na ma rig pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/_ji ltar na 'du byed 
[\[26b.2\]]yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/_ji ltar na rnam par shes pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/_ji ltar na [{]mying [,]ming [}]dang gzugs yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/_ji ltar na skye mched drug yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/_
[\[26b.3\]]ji ltar na reg pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/_ji ltar na tshor ba yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/_ji ltar na sred pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/_ji ltar na lan pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/_ji ltar na 
[\[26b.4\]]srid pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/_ji ltar na skye ba yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/_ji ltar na rga shi yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/_ji ltar na sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/_ji ltar 
[\[26b.5\]]na tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/_ji ltar na bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/_ji ltar na brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/_ji ltar 
[\[26b.6\]]na bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/_ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/_ji ltar na nang stong pa nyid yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/_ji ltar na phyi stong pa nyid yongs su 
[\[26b.7\]]ma bzung ma btang ba lags/_ji ltar na phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/_ji ltar na stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/_ji ltar na chen po stong pa nyid yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/_ji ltar 
[\[27a\]]
[\[27a.1\]]na don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/_ji ltar na 'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/_ji ltar na 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/_ji ltar na mtha' las 
[\[27a.2\]]'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/_ji ltar na thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/_ji ltar na dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/_ji ltar na rang bzhin stong 
[\[27a.3\]]pa nyid yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/_ji ltar na chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/_ji ltar na rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/_ji ltar na [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa 
[\[27a.4\]]nyid yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/_ji ltar na dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/_ji ltar na ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/_ji ltar na dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid 
[\[27a.5\]]stong pa nyid yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/_ji ltar na dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/_ji ltar na yang dag par spong ba bzhi yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/_ji ltar na rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi 
[\[27a.6\]]yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/_ji ltar na dbang po lnga yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/_ji ltar na stobs lnga yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/_ji ltar na byang chub kyi yan lag bdun yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/_
[\[27a.7\]]ji ltar na 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/_ji ltar na 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/_ji ltar na bsam gtan bzhi yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/_ji ltar 
[\[27b\]]
[\[27b.1\]]na tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa bzhi yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/_ji ltar na gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/_ji ltar na rnam par thar pa brgyad yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/_ji ltar na mthar kyis 
[\[27b.2\]]gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/_ji ltar na rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/_ji ltar na mngon par shes pa rnams 
[\[27b.3\]]yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/_ji ltar na ting nge 'dzin rnams yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/_ji ltar na gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/_ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su ma bzung ma btang 
[\[27b.4\]]ba lags/_ji ltar na [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhi yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/_ji ltar na so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/_ji ltar na snying rje chen po yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/_ji ltar na sangs rgyas 
[\[27b.5\]]kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/_ji ltar na rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/_ji ltar na lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/_ji ltar na phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong 
[\[27b.6\]]ba'i 'bras bu yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/_ji ltar na dgra bcom pa nyid yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/_ji ltar na rang byang chub yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/_ji ltar na lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/_
[\[27b.7\]]ji ltar na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor gzugs yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed pas/_gzugs yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/_/tshor ba yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed pas/_tshor ba 
[\[28a\]]
[\[28a.1\]]yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/_/'du shes yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed pas/_'du shes yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/_/'du byed 'di la mi byed pas/_'du byed yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/_/rnam par shes pa yid 
[\[28a.2\]]la mi byed pas/_rnam par shes pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed pas/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/_/rna ba yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed pas/_rna ba yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/_/sna yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed pas/_

[\[28b\]]
[\[28b.1\]]bzung ma btang ba yin no/_/yid kyi rnam par shes pa yid la mi byed pas/_yid kyi rnam par shes pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/_/mig gi 'dus te reg pa yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed pas/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin

[\[30a\]]

[\[30b\]]
[\[30b.1\]]pas/_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/_/'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed pas/_'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/_/bsam gtan bzhi yid la mi byed

[\[31a\]]
[\[31a.1\]]yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/_/snying rje chen po yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed pas/_snying rje chen po yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed pas/_sangs rgyas kyi

[\[31a.5\]]bzung ma btang ba yin no/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed pas/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/_/rab 'byor de ltar na/_gzugs yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/_/tshor ba 
[\[31a.6\]]yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/_/'du shes yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/_/'du byed yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/_/rnam par shes pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/_/rna ba 
[\[31a.7\]]yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/_/sna yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/_/lce yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/_/lus yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/_/yid yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/_/gzugs yongs su ma bzung 
[\[31b\]]
[\[31b.1\]]ma btang ba yin no/_/sgra yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/_/dri yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/_/ro yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/_/reg yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/_/chos yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/_/
[\[31b.2\]{]myig [,]mig [}]gi rnam par shes pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/_/rna ba'i rnam par shes pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/_/sna'i rnam par shes pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/_/lce'i rnam par shes pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba 
[\[31b.3\]]yin no/_/lus kyi rnam par shes pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/_/yid kyi rnam par shes pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/_/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa yongs su ma 
[\[31b.4\]]bzung ma btang ba yin no/_/sna'i 'dus te reg pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/_/lce'i 'dus te reg pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/_/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/_/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa 
[\[31b.5\]]yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/_/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/_/sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba 
[\[31b.6\]]yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/_/lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/_/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/_/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis 
[\[31b.7\]]tshor ba yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/_/sa'i khams yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/_/chu'i khams yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/_/[{]mye'i [,]me'i [}]khams yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/_/rlung gi khams yongs su ma bzung 
[\[32a\]]
[\[32a.1\]]ma btang ba yin no/_/nam mkha'i khams yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/_/rnam par shes pa'i khams yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/_/ma rig pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/_/'du byed yongs 
[\[32a.2\]]su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/_/rnam par shes pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/_/[{]mying [,]ming [}]dang gzugs yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/_/skye mched drug yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/_/reg pa yongs su ma bzung 
[\[32a.3\]]ma btang ba yin no/_/tshor ba yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/_/sred pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/_/len pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/_/srid pa yongs su ma zung ma btang ba yin no/_/skye ba yongs su ma bzung 
[\[32a.4\]]ma btang ba yin no/_/rga shi yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/_/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs 
[\[32a.5\]]su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/_/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba 
[\[32a.6\]]yin no/_/nang stong pa nyid yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/_/phyi stong pa nyid yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/_/phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/_/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin 
[\[32a.7\]]no/_/chen po stong pa nyid yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/_/don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/_/'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/_/'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su ma bzung ma 
[\[32b\]]
[\[32b.1\]]btang ba yin no/_/mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/_/thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/_/dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/_/rang bzhin 
[\[32b.2\]]stong pa nyid yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/_/chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/_/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid yongs su ma bzung ma 
[\[32b.3\]]btang ba yin no/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/_/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/_/dran pa nye 
[\[32b.4\]]bar gzhag pa bzhi yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/_/yang dag par spong ba bzhi yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/_/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/_/dbang po lnga yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin 
[\[32b.5\]]no/_/stobs lnga yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/_/byang chub kyi yan lag bdun yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/_/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/_/'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi 
[\[32b.6\]]yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/_/bsam gtan bzhi yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/_/tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa bzhi yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/_/gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/_/
[\[32b.7\]]rnam par thar pa brgyad yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/_/mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/_/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yongs su ma bzung 
[\[33a\]]
[\[33a.1\]]ma btang ba yin no/_/mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/_/ting nge 'dzin rnams yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/_/gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/_/de 
[\[33a.2\]]bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhi yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/_/so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/_/snying rje chen po yongs su ma bzung ma 
[\[33a.3\]]btang ba yin no/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/_/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/_/
[\[33a.4\]]phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/_/dgra bcom pa nyid yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/_/rang byang chub yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/_/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yongs su ma bzung 
[\[33a.5\]]ma btang ba yin no//_//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/_bam po gsum pa/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gal te gzugs yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyi/_tshor ba yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyi 
[\[33a.6\]]'du shes yid la mi bgyi/_'du byed yid la mi bgyi/_rnam par shes pa yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyi/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyi/_rna ba yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyi/_sna yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyi/_lce yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyi/_lus yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyi/_yid yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyi/_gzugs 
[\[33a.7\]]yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyi/_sgra yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyi/_dri yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyi/_ro yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyi/_reg yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyi/_chos yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyi/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi rnam par shes pa yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyi/_rna ba'i rnam par shes pa yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyi/_sna'i rnam par shes pa yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[33b\]]
[\[33b.1\]]bgyi/_lce'i rnam par shes pa yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyi/_lus kyi rnam par shes pa yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyi/_yid kyi rnam par shes pa yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyi/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyi/_rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyi/_sna'i 'dus te 
[\[33b.2\]]reg pa yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyi/_lce'i 'dus te reg pa yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyi/_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyi/_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yid la mi bgyi/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yid la mi bgyi/_rna ba'i 'dus te reg 
[\[33b.3\]]pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyi/_sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyi/_lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yid la mi bgyi/_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyi/_yid kyi 'dus 
[\[33b.4\]]te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyi/_sa'i khams yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyi/_chu'i khams yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyi/[ {]mye'i [,]me'i [}]khams yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyi/_rlung gi khams yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyi/_nam mkha'i khams yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyi/_rnam par shes pa'i 
[\[33b.5\]]khams yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyi/_ma rig pa yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyi/_'du byed yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyi/_rnam par shes pa yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyi/[ {]mying [,]ming [}]dang gzugs yid la mi bgyi/_skye mched drug yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyi/_reg pa yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyi/_tshor ba yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyi/_
[\[33b.6\]]sred pa yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyi/_len pa yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyi/_srid pa yid la mi bgyi/_skye ba yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyi/_rga shi yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyi/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyi/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyi/_bzod pa'i 
[\[33b.7\]]pha rol tu phyin pa yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyi/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyi/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyi/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yid la mi bgyi/_nang stong pa nyid yid la mi bgyi/_phyi stong pa 
[\[34a\]]
[\[34a.1\]]nyid yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyi/_phyi nang stong pa nyid yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyi/_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyi/_chen po stong pa nyid yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyi/_don dam pa stong pa nyid yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyi/_'dus byas stong pa nyid yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[34a.2\]]bgyi/_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yid la mi bgyi/_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyi/_thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyi/_dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyi/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[34a.3\]]bgyi/_chos thams cad stong pa nyid yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyi/_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyi/[ {]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid yid la mi bgyi/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyi/_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyi/_
[\[34a.4\]]dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyi/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyi/_yang dag par spong ba bzhi yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyi/_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyi/_dbang po lnga yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyi/_stobs lnga yid 
[\[34a.5\]]la [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyi/_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyi/_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyi/_'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi yid la mi bgyi/_bsam gtan bzhi yid la mi bgyi/_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa bzhi yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyi/_
[\[34a.6\]]gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi yid la mi bgyi/_rnam par thar pa brgyad yid la mi bgyi/_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yid la mi bgyi/_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_
[\[34a.7\]]smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yid la mi bgyi/_mngon par shes pa rnams yid la mi bgyi/_ting nge 'dzin rnams yid la mi bgyi/_gzungs kyi sgo rnams yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyi/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yid la mi bgyi/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhi yid 
[\[34b\]]
[\[34b.1\]]la mi bgyi/_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyi/_snying rje chen po yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyi/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyi/_rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yid la mi bgyi/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras 
[\[34b.2\]]bu yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyi/_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyi/_dgra bcom pa nyid yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyi/_rang byang chub yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyi/_lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyi/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyi na/_
[\[34b.3\]]'o na bcom ldan 'das gzugs yid la ma bgyis/_tshor ba yid la ma bgyis/_'du shes yid la ma bgyis/_'du byed yid la ma bgyis/_rnam par shes pa yid la ma bgyis/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]yid la ma bgyis/_rna ba yid la ma bgyis/_
[\[34b.4\]]sna yid la ma bgyis/_lce yid la ma bgyis/_lus yid la ma bgyis/_yid yid la ma bgyis/_gzugs yid la ma bgyis/_sgra yid la ma bgyis/_dri yid la ma bgyis/_ro yid la ma bgyis/_reg yid la ma bgyis/_chos yid 
[\[34b.5\]]la ma bgyis/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi rnam par shes pa yid la ma bgyis/_rna ba'i rnam par shes pa yid la ma bgyis/_sna'i rnam par shes pa yid la ma bgyis/_lce'i rnam par shes pa yid la ma bgyis/_lus kyi rnam par shes pa yid la ma 
[\[34b.6\]]bgyis/_yid kyi rnam par shes pa yid la ma bgyis/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa yid la ma bgyis/_rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa yid la ma bgyis/_sna'i 'dus te reg pa yid la ma bgyis/_lce'i 'dus te reg pa yid la ma bgyis/_lus kyi 'dus 
[\[34b.7\]]te reg pa yid la ma bgyis/_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yid la ma bgyis/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yid la ma bgyis/_rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yid la ma bgyis/_sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba 
[\[35a\]]
[\[35a.1\]]yid la ma bgyis/_lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yid la ma bgyis/_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yid la ma bgyis/_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yid la ma bgyis/_sa'i khams 
[\[35a.2\]]yid la ma bgyis/_chu'i khams yid la ma bgyis/[ {]mye'i [,]me'i [}]khams yid la ma bgyis/_rlung gi khams yid la ma bgyis/_nam mkha'i khams yid la ma bgyis/_rnam par shes pa'i khams yid la ma bgyis/_ma rig pa yid la ma bgyis/_
[\[35a.3\]]'du byed yid la ma bgyis/_rnam par shes pa yid la ma bgyis/[ {]mying [,]ming [}]dang gzugs yid la ma bgyis/_skye mched drug yid la ma bgyis/_reg pa yid la ma bgyis/_tshor ba yid la ma bgyis/_sred pa yid la ma bgyis/_len pa yid 
[\[35a.4\]]la ma bgyis/_srid pa yid la ma bgyis/_skye ba yid la ma bgyis/_rga shi yid la ma bgyis/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yid la ma bgyis/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yid la ma bgyis/_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yid la ma bgyis/_
[\[35a.5\]]brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yid la ma bgyis/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yid la ma bgyis/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yid la ma bgyis/_nang stong pa nyid yid la ma bgyis/_phyi stong pa nyid yid la ma bgyis/_phyi nang 
[\[35a.6\]]stong pa nyid yid la ma bgyis/_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yid la ma bgyis/_chen po stong pa nyid yid la ma bgyis/_don dam pa stong pa nyid yid la ma bgyis/_'dus byas stong pa nyid yid la ma bgyis/_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yid la ma 
[\[35a.7\]]bgyis/_mtha' yas 'das pa stong pa nyid yid la ma bgyis/_thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yid la ma bgyis/_dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid yid la ma bgyis/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid yid la ma bgyis/_chos thams cad stong pa nyid yid 
[\[35b\]]
[\[35b.1\]]la ma bgyis/_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yid la ma bgyis/[ {]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid yid la ma bgyis/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid yid la ma bgyis/_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yid la ma bgyis/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yid la ma bgyis/_
[\[35b.2\]]dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi yid la ma bgyis/_yang dag par spong ba bzhi yid la ma bgyis/_rdzu 'phrul kyi rkang pa bzhi yid la ma bgyis/_dbang po lnga yid la ma bgyis/_stobs lnga yid la ma bgyis/_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun yid la ma 
[\[35b.3\]]bgyis/_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yid la ma bgyis/_'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi yid la ma bgyis/_bsam gtan bzhi yid la ma bgyis/_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa bzhi yid la ma bgyis/_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi 
[\[35b.4\]]yid la ma bgyis/_rnam par thar pa brgyad yid la ma bgyis/_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yid la ma bgyis/_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yid la ma bgyis/_
[\[35b.5\]]mngon par shes pa rnams yid la ma bgyis/_ting nge 'dzin rnams yid la ma bgyis/_gzungs kyi sgo rnams yid la ma bgyis/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yid la ma bgyis/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhi yid la ma bgyis/_so so yang 
[\[35b.6\]]dag par rig pa bzhi yid la ma bgyis/_snying rje chen po yid la ma bgyis/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad yid la ma bgyis/_rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yid la ma bgyis/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yid la ma bgyis 
[\[35b.7\]]phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yid la ma bgyis/_dgra bcom pa nyid yid la ma bgyis/_rang byang chub yid la ma bgyis/_lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yid la ma bgyis/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la ma bgyis par/_dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams 
[\[36a\]]
[\[36a.1\]]ji ltar rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur/_dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams rnam par ma 'phel na yang /_ji ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/_pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su ma rdzogs na yang /_ji ltar rnam pa thams 
[\[36a.2\]]cad mkhyen pa nyid 'thob par 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor nam gzugs yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_tshor ba yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_'du shes yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_'du byed yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_rnam par shes pa yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_
[\[36a.3\]{]myig [,]mig [}]yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_rna ba yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_sna yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_lce yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_lus yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_yid yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_gzugs yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_sgra yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_dri yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_ro yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_reg yid la 
[\[36a.4\]{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_chos yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi rnam par shes pa yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_rna ba'i rnam par shes pa yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_sna'i rnam par shes pa yid la mi byed/_lce'i rnam par shes pa yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_lus kyi rnam par shes pa yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_
[\[36a.5\]]yid kyi rnam par shes pa yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_sna'i 'dus te reg pa yid la mi byed/_lce'i 'dus te reg pa yid la mi byed/_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa yid la mi byed/_
[\[36a.6\]]yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba yid la mi byed/_lce'i 'dus te

[\[36b\]]
[\[36b.1\]{]mye'i [,]me'i [}]khams yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_rlung gi khams yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_nam mkha'i khams yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_rnam par shes pa'i khams yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_ma rig pa yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_'du byed yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_rnam par shes pa yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/[ {]mying [,]ming [}]dang 
[\[36b.2\]]gzugs yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_skye mched drug yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_reg pa yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_tshor ba yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_sred pa yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_len pa yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_srid pa yid la mi byed/_skye ba yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_rga shi yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_
[\[36b.3\]]sbyin pa'i pha rol tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_tshul khrims kyi pha [{]rold [,]rol [}]tu phyin pa yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_bzod pa'i pha [{]rold [,]rol [}]tu phyin pa yid la mi byed/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yid

[\[36b.5\]]don dam pa stong pa nyid yid la mi byed/_'dus byas stong pa nyid yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa
