[\[193b\]]
[\[193b.1\]]yang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/_rga shi yang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang 
[\[193b.2\]]dngos po ma mchis pa lags/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/_nang stong 
[\[193b.3\]]pa nyid kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/_phyi stong pa nyid kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/_phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/_chen po stong pa nyid kyang dngos po ma 
[\[193b.4\]]mchis pa lags/_don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/_'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang 
[\[193b.5\]]dngos po ma mchis pa lags/_thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/_dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/_chos thams cad 
[\[193b.6\]]stong pa nyid kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/[ {]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/_dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/_
[\[193b.7\]]ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/_yang dag par spong ba rnams kyang dngos po ma 
[\[194a\]]
[\[194a.1\]]mchis pa lags/_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/_dbang po rnams kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/_stobs rnams kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams 
[\[194a.2\]]kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/_'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/_bsam gtan rnams kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/_
[\[194a.3\]]tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/_rnam par thar pa rnams kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms 
[\[194a.4\]]par 'jug pa rnams kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/_mngon par shes pa rnams kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/_ting nge 
[\[194a.5\]]'dzin rnams kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/_gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa rnams kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/_so 
[\[194a.6\]]so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/_byams pa chen po yang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/_snying rje chen po yang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/_
[\[194a.7\]]dga' ba chen po yang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/_btang snyoms chen po yang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/_'dus byas kyi khams kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/_'dus ma byas kyi khams kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/_bcom ldan 
[\[194b\]]
[\[194b.1\]]'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/gzugs kyang dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/tshor ba yang dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/'du shes kyang dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/'du byed kyang dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/rnam par shes pa 
[\[194b.2\]]yang dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]kyang dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/rna ba yang dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/sna yang dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/lce yang dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/lus kyang dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/yid kyang dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/gzugs kyang dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/

[\[194b.4\]]pa'o/_/sna'i rnam par shes pa yang dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/lce'i rnam par shes pa yang dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/lus kyi rnam par shes pa yang dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/yid kyi rnam par shes pa yang dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa yang dngos 
[\[194b.5\]]po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa yang dngos po med pa'o/_/sna'i 'dus te reg pa yang dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/lce'i 'dus te reg pa yang dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa yang dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yang dngos 
[\[194b.6\]]po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba yang dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba yang dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba yang dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/lce'i 'dus te reg pa las

[\[195a\]]
[\[195a.1\]{]mye'i [,]me'i [}]khams kyang dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/rlung gi khams kyang dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/nam mkha'i khams kyang dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/ma rig pa yang dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/'du byed

[\[195b\]]
[\[195b.1\]]pa'o/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyang dngos po med pa'o/_/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyang dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/yang dag par 
[\[195b.2\]]spong ba rnams kyang dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyang dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/dbang po rnams kyang dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/stobs rnams kyang dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyang dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/'phags pa'i lam

[\[195b.4\]]dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/rnam par thar pa rnams kyang dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dngos po 
[\[195b.5\]{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/mngon par shes pa rnams kyang dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyang dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa rnams 
[\[195b.6\]]kyang dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyang dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyang dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/byams pa chen po yang dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/snying rje chen po yang dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/dga' ba chen 
[\[195b.7\]]po yang dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/btang snyoms chen po yang dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/'dus byas kyi khams kyang dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/'dus ma byas kyi khams kyang dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 
[\[196a\]]
[\[196a.1\]]la ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]de/_rab 'byor gang la ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa de ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la ngo bo nyid ma mchis pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[196a.2\]]bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'dus pa'i ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]de/_gang la 'dus pa'i ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa de ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/rab 'byor rnam grangs des na/_chos thams cad ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid do/_/rab 'byor 'di ltar yang chos thams 
[\[196a.3\]]cad ni stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid do/_/chos thams cad ni mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid do/_/chos thams cad ni smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid do/_/rab 'byor 'di ltar yang chos thams cad ni de bzhin nyid kyi ngo bo nyid do/_/chos thams cad ni yang dag pa'i 
[\[196a.4\]]mtha'i ngo bo nyid do/_/chos thams cad ni chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid do/_/rab 'byor rnam grangs des kyang 'di ltar chos thams cad ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid du rig par bya'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ltar gal te/_chos thams cad 
[\[196a.5\]]dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid lags na/_'o na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_sems dang po bskyed pa thabs gang dang ldan pas/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang /_
[\[196a.6\]]sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang /_sems can rnams yongs su smyin par bgyid pa lags/_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la 
[\[196a.7\]]spyod cing /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang /_sems can rnams yongs su smyin par bgyid pa lags/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang /_sems can rnams yongs su smyin 
[\[196b\]]
[\[196b.1\]]par bgyid pa lags/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang /_sems can rnams yongs su smyin par bgyid pa lags/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs 
[\[196b.2\]]su dag pa dang /_sems can rnams yongs su smyin par bgyid pa lags/_bsam gtan dang po la spyod cing /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang /_sems can rnams yongs su smyin par bgyid pa lags/_bsam gtan gnyis pa 
[\[196b.3\]]la spyod cing /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang /_sems can rnams yongs su smyin par bgyid pa lags/_bsam gtan gsum pa la spyod cing /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang /_sems can rnams yongs su smyin 
[\[196b.4\]]par bgyid pa lags/_bsam gtan bzhi pa la spyod cing /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang /_sems can rnams yongs su smyin par bgyid pa lags/_byams pa la spyod cing /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang /_
[\[196b.5\]]sems can rnams yongs su smyin par bgyid pa lags/_snying rje la spyod cing /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang /_sems can rnams yongs su smyin par bgyid pa lags/_dga' ba la spyod cing /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag 
[\[196b.6\]]pa dang /_sems can rnams yongs su smyin par bgyid pa lags/_btang snyoms la spyod cing /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang /_sems can rnams yongs su smyin par bgyid pa lags/_nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la 
[\[196b.7\]]spyod cing /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang /_sems can rnams yongs su smyin par bgyid pa lags/_rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la spyod cing /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang /_sems can rnams yongs su smyin 
[\[197a\]]
[\[197a.1\]]par bgyid pa lags/[ {]chung zad [,]cung zad [}{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i skye mched la spyod cing /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang /_sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags/_'du shes [{]myed [,]med [}]'du shes [{]myed [,]med [}{]myin [,]min [}]skye mched la spyod 
[\[197a.2\]]cing /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang /_sems can rnams yongs su smyin par bgyid pa lags/_nang stong pa nyid la spyod cing /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang /_sems can rnams yongs su smyin par bgyid pa lags/_phyi stong 
[\[197a.3\]]pa nyid la spyod cing /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang /_sems can rnams yongs su smyin par bgyid pa lags/_phyi nang stong pa nyid la spyod cing /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang /_sems can rnams yongs su smyin par bgyid pa 
[\[197a.4\]]lags/_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la spyod cing /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang /_sems can rnams yongs su smyin par bgyid pa lags/_chen po stong pa nyid la spyod cing /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang /_sems can rnams yongs 
[\[197a.5\]]su smyin par bgyid pa lags/_don dam pa stong pa nyid la spyod cing /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang /_sems can rnams yongs su smyin par bgyid pa lags/_'dus byas stong pa nyid la spyod cing /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang /_
[\[197a.6\]]sems can rnams yongs su smyin par bgyid pa lags/_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la spyod cing /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang /_sems can rnams yongs su smyin par bgyid pa lags/_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la spyod cing /_
[\[197a.7\]]sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang /_sems can rnams yongs su smyin pa bgyid pa lags/_thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid la spyod cing /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang /_sems can rnams yongs su smyin par bgyid pa lags/_
[\[197b\]]
[\[197b.1\]]dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la spyod cing /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang /_sems can rnams yongs su smyin par bgyid pa lags/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid la spyod cing /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang /_sems can rnams yongs su smyin 
[\[197b.2\]]par bgyid pa lags/_chos thams cad stong pa nyid la spyod cing /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang /_sems can rnams yongs su smyin par bgyid pa lags/_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la spyod cing /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang /_
[\[197b.3\]]sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags/[ {]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid la spyod cing /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang /_sems can rnams yongs su smyin par bgyid pa lags/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid la spyod cing /_sangs 
[\[197b.4\]]rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang /_sems can rnams yongs su smyin par bgyid pa lags/_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod cing /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang /_sems can rnams yongs su smyin par bgyid pa lags/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i 
[\[197b.5\]]ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod cing /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang /_sems can rnams yongs su smyin par bgyid pa lags/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la spyod cing /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang /_sems can rnams yongs su 
[\[197b.6\]]smyin par bgyid pa lags/_yang dag par spong ba bzhi la spyod cing /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang /_sems can rnams yongs su smyin par bgyid pa lags/_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la spyod cing /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang /_
[\[197b.7\]]sems can rnams yongs su smyin par bgyid pa lags/_dbang po lnga la spyod cing /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang /_sems can rnams yongs su smyin par bgyid pa lags/_stobs lnga la spyod cing /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang /_
[\[198a\]]
[\[198a.1\]]sems can rnams yongs su smyin par bgyid pa lags/_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la spyod cing /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang /_sems can rnams yongs su smyin par bgyid pa lags/_'phags pa'i lam yan lag 
[\[198a.2\]]brgyad pa la spyod cing /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang /_sems can rnams yongs su smyin par bgyid pa lags/_'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi la spyod cing /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang /_sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa 
[\[198a.3\]]lags/_bsam gtan bzhi la spyod cing /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang /_sems can rnams yongs su smyin par bgyid pa lags/_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa bzhi la spyod cing /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang /_sems can rnams yongs su 
[\[198a.4\]]smin par bgyid pa lags/_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la spyod cing /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang /_sems can rnams yongs su smyin par bgyid pa lags/_rnam par thar pa brgyad la spyod cing /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing 
[\[198a.5\]]yongs su dag pa dang /_sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags/_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la spyod cing /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang /_sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags/_
[\[198a.6\]]stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ting nge 'dzin la spyod cing /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang /_sems can rnams yongs su smyin par bgyid pa lags/_mngon par shes pa rnams la spyod cing /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing 
[\[198a.7\]]yongs su dag pa dang /_sems can rnams yongs su smyin par bgyid pa lags/_ting nge 'dzin rnams la spyod cing /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang /_sems can rnams yongs su smyin par bgyid pa lags/_gzungs kyi sgo rnams la 
[\[198b\]]
[\[198b.1\]]spyod cing /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang /_sems can rnams yongs su smyin par bgyid pa lags/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la spyod cing /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang /_sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid 
[\[198b.2\]]pa lags/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhi la spyod cing /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang /_sems can rnams yongs su smyin par bgyid pa lags/_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la spyod cing /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang /_sems 
[\[198b.3\]]can rnams yongs su smyin par bgyid pa lags/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad la spyod cing /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang /_sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags/_byams pa chen po la spyod cing /_sangs 
[\[198b.4\]]rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang /_sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags/_snying rje chen po la spyod cing /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang /_sems can rnams yongs su smyin par bgyid pa lags/_thams cad shes pa nyid la spyod 
[\[198b.5\]]cing /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang /_sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags/_lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la spyod cing /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang /_sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags/_
[\[198b.6\]]rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la spyod cing /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang /_sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ltar chos thams cad dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid du yongs 
[\[198b.7\]]su 'dris par byed cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang /_sems can rnams yongs su smyin par byed la/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag dang /_sems can de dag kyang dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid du shes pa de nyid byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 
[\[199a\]]
[\[199a.1\]]thabs mkhas pa ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /_byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /_byang 
[\[199a.2\]]chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do/_/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /_byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do/_/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /_byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do/_/bsam 
[\[199a.3\]]gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /_byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /_byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do/_/nang stong pa nyid la spyod cing /_byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 
[\[199a.4\]]'dris par byed do/_/phyi stong pa nyid la spyod cing /_byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do/_/phyi nang stong pa nyid la spyod cing /_byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do/_/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la spyod cing /_byang chub kyi lam la yongs 
[\[199a.5\]]su 'dris par byed do/_/chen po stong pa nyid la spyod cing /_byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do/_/don dam pa stong pa nyid la spyod cing /_byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do/_/'dus byas stong pa nyid la spyod cing /_byang chub kyi 
[\[199a.6\]]lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do/_/'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la spyod cing /_byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do/_/mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la spyod cing /_byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do/_/thog ma dang tha ma 
[\[199a.7\]{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid la spyod cing /_byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do/_/dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid la spyod cing /_byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid la spyod cing /_byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 
[\[199b\]]
[\[199b.1\]]'dris par byed do/_/chos thams cad stong pa nyid la spyod cing /_byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do/_/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la spyod cing /_byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid la spyod cing /_
[\[199b.2\]]byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid la spyod cing /_byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do/_/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod cing /_byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]
[\[199b.3\]]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod cing /_byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la spyod cing /_byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do/_/yang dag par spong ba rnams la spyod cing /_byang chub kyi lam la 
[\[199b.4\]]yongs su 'dris par byed do/_/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la spyod cing /_byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do/_/dbang po rnams la spyod cing /_byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do/_/stobs rnams la spyod cing /_byang chub kyi 
[\[199b.5\]]lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do/_/byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la spyod cing /_byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do/_/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la spyod cing /_byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do/_/'phags 
[\[199b.6\]]pa'i bden pa rnams la spyod cing /_byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do/_/bsam gtan rnams la spyod cing /_byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do/_/tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams la spyod cing /_byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par 
[\[199b.7\]]byed do/_/gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la spyod cing /_byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do/_/rnam par thar pa rnams la spyod cing /_byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do/_/mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 
[\[200a\]]
[\[200a.1\]]'jug pa rnams la spyod cing /_byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do/_/stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa med pa la spyod cing /_byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do/_/mngon par shes pa rnams 
[\[200a.2\]]la spyod cing /_byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do/_/ting nge 'dzin rnams la spyod cing /_byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do/_/gzungs kyi sgo rnams la spyod cing /_byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do/_/de bzhin 
[\[200a.3\]]gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la spyod cing /_byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa rnams la spyod cing /_byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do/_/so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la spyod cing /_byang chub kyi lam la 
[\[200a.4\]]yongs su 'dris par byed do/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la spyod cing /_byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do/_/byams pa chen po la spyod cing /_byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do/_/snying rje chen po la spyod cing /_
[\[200a.5\]]byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do/_/thams cad shes pa nyid la spyod cing /_byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do/_/lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la spyod cing /_byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do/_/rnam pa thams cad 
[\[200a.6\]]mkhyen pa nyid la spyod cing /_byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do/_/byang chub kyi lam de yang dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid du rab tu shes te/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni/_pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod cing /_nam de 
[\[200a.7\]]bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang ldan par ma gyur pa dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhi dang ldan par ma gyur pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang ldan par ma gyur pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad dang ldan par ma gyur pa dang /_byams pa 
[\[200b\]]
[\[200b.1\]]chen po dang ldan par ma gyur pa dang /_snying rje chen po dang ldan par ma gyur pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan par ma gyur pa de'i bar du byang chub kyi lam de la yongs su 'dris par byed de/_rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa'i lam ste/_lam de la 
[\[200b.2\]]gnas shing pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byas nas/_skad cig gcig dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyis/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro/_/de'i tshe de'i bag chags kyi mtshams 
[\[200b.3\]]sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad kyang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]skye bar spang bas yongs su spong bar 'gyur te/_des sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams la rnam par lta na/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]par yang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na/_dngos po yod pa lta 
[\[200b.4\]]smos kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}]smos so//_//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/_bam po bcu gsum pa/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 
[\[200b.5\]]spyod pa'i tshe/_sbyin pa yongs su gtong ste/_de de ltar sbyin pa yongs su gtong yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog_/mtshan mar [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed de/_dngos po yod pa 'am/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]par yang yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed do/_/len pa la yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog_/mtshan mar [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed de/_dngos po yod pa 
[\[200b.6\]]'am/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]par yang yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed do/_/gtong ba la yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog_/mtshan mar [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed de/_dngos po yod pa 'am/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]par yang yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed do/_/byang chub kyi sems de yang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_mtshan mar [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_yul du [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_
[\[200b.7\]]yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ngo /_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_tshul khrims srung ste/_de de ltar tshul khrims srung yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog_/mtshan mar [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed de/_dngos po yod pa'am/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]par yang yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed do/_/byang chub 
[\[201a\]]
[\[201a.1\]]kyi sems de yang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_mtshan mar [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_yul du [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_bzod pa sgom ste/_de de ltar bzod pa sgom yang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]rtog mtshan mar 
[\[201a.2\]{]myi [,]mi [}]byed de/_dngos po yod pa 'am/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]par yang yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed do/_/byang chub kyi sems de yang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_mtshan mar [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_yul du [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ngo /_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe 
[\[201a.3\]]brtson 'grus rtsom ste/_de de ltar brtson 'grus rtsom yang mi rtog_/mtshan mar [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed de/_dngos po yod pa 'am/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]par yang yid la mi byed do/_/byang chub kyi sems de yang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_mtshan mar [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed yul du mi byed/_

[\[201a.5\]]dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]par yang yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed do/_/byang chub kyi sems de yang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_mtshan mar [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed yul du [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_shes rab sgom ste/_de de ltar shes

[\[201a.7\]]byed do/_/sems can gang gi don du shes rab de la sgom pa de dag la yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog_/mtshan mar [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed de/_dngos po yod pa'am/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]par yang yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed do/_/nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/_nang stong pa nyid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog_/mtshan mar [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[201b\]]
[\[201b.1\]]byed de/_dngos po yod pa 'am/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]par yang yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed do/_/gang nang stong pa nyid de la sgom pa de la yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog mtshan mar mi byed de/_dngos po yod pa'am/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]par yang yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed do/_/sems can gang gi 
[\[201b.2\]]don tu nang stong pa nyid de la sgom pa de la yang mi rtog mtshan mar [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed de/_dngos po yod pa 'am/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]par yang yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed do/_/phyi stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/_phyi stong pa nyid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog mtshan mar mi byed de/_dngos po yod pa 'am/_

[\[201b.6\]]'am/_dngos po med par yang yid la mi byed do/_/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog mtshan mar mi byed de/_dngos po yod pa 'am/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]par yang yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed do/_/gang gi don tu stong pa nyid stong pa nyid de la sgom pa de la yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog_/mtshan mar [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[201b.7\]]byed de/_dngos po yod pa 'am/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]par yang yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed do/_/sems can gang gi don tu stong pa nyid stong pa nyid de la sgom pa de la yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog mtshan mar [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed de/_dngos po yod pa 'am/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]par yang yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed do/_/chen po 
[\[202a\]]
[\[202a.1\]]stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/_chen po stong pa nyid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog mtshan mar [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed de/_dngos po yod pa 'am/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]par yang yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed do/_/gang chen po stong pa nyid de la sgom pa de la yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog mtshan mar [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed de/_dngos 
[\[202a.2\]]po yod pa 'am/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]par yang yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed do/_/sems can gang gi don tu chen po stong pa nyid de la sgom pa de la yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog mtshan mar [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed de/_dngos po yod pa 'am/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]par yang yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed do/_/don dam pa stong pa nyid la 
[\[202a.3\]]spyod pa'i tshe/_don dam pa stong pa nyid la mi rtog mtshan mar [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed de/_dngos po yod pa 'am/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]par yang yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed do/_/gang gi don tu don dam pa stong pa nyid de la sgom pa de la yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog_/mtshan mar [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed de/_dngos po yod pa 
[\[202a.4\]]'am/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]par yang yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed do/_/sems can gang gi don tu don dam pa stong pa nyid de la sgom pa de la yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog mtshan mar [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed do/_dngos po yod pa 'am/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]par yang yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed do/_/'dus byas stong pa nyid la

[\[205b\]]
[\[205b.1\]]tu tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa de dag la sgom pa de la yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog mtshan mar [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed de/_dngos po yod pa 'am/_dngos po med par yang yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed do/_/gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i

[\[205b.4\]]'am/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]par yang yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed do/_/rnam par thar pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam par thar pa de dag la [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog mtshan mar [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed de/_dngos po yod pa 'am/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]par yang yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed do/_/
[\[205b.5\]]gang rnam par thar pa de dag la sgom pa de la yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog mtshan mar [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed de/_dngos po yod pa 'am/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]par yang yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed do/_/sems can gang gi don tu rnam par thar pa de dag la sgom pa de la yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog mtshan 
[\[205b.6\]]mar [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed de/_dngos po yod pa 'am/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]par yang yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed do/_/mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag la [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog mtshan mar [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed de/_
[\[205b.7\]]dngos po yod pa 'am/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]par yang yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed do/_/gang mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag la sgom pa de la yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog mtshan mar [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed de/_dngos po yod pa 'am/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]par yang yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed do/_/
[\[206a\]]
[\[206a.1\]]sems can gang gi don tu mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag la sgom pa de la yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog mtshan mar mi byed de/_dngos po yod pa 'am/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]par yang yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed do/_/rnam par thar pa'i 
[\[206a.2\]]sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa de dag la [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog mtshan mar [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed de/_dngos po yod pa 'am/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]par 
[\[206a.3\]]yang yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed do/_/gang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa de dag la sgom pa de la yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog mtshan mar [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed de/_dngos po yod pa 'am/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]par yang yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed do/_/sems can 
[\[206a.4\]]gang gi don tu rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa de dag la sgom pa de la yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog mtshan mar [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed de/_dngos po yod pa 'am/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]par yang yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed do/_/mngon par shes pa rnams la

[\[206a.6\]]dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]par yang yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed do/_/sems can gang gi don tu mngon par shes pa de dag la sgom pa de la yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog mtshan mar [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed de/_dngos po yod pa 'am/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]par yang yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed do/_/ting nge 'dzin rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/_ting nge 
[\[206a.7\]]'dzin de dag la [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog mtshan mar [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed de/_dngos po yod pa 'am/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]par yang yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed do/_/gang ting nge 'dzin de dag la sgom pa de la yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog mtshan mar [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed de/_dngos po yod pa 'am/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]par yang yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed do/_/
[\[206b\]]
[\[206b.1\]]sems can gang gi don tu ting nge 'dzin de dag la sgom pa de la yang mi rtog mtshan mar [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed de/_dngos po yod pa 'am/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]par yang yid la mi byed do/_/gzungs kyi sgo rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/_gzungs kyi sgo 
[\[206b.2\]]de dag la [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog mtshan mar mi byed de/_dngos po yod pa 'am/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]par yang yid la mi byed do/_/gang gzungs kyi sgo de dag la sgom pa de la yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog mtshan mar [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed de/_dngos po yod pa 'am/_dngos po 
[\[206b.3\]{]myed [,]med [}]par yang yid la mi byed do/_/sems can gang gi don tu gzungs kyi sgo de dag la sgom pa de la yang mi rtog mtshan mar [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed de/_dngos po yod pa 'am/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]par yang yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams

[\[207a\]]
[\[207a.1\]]med par yang yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed do/_/so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/_so so yang dag par rig pa de dag la [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog mtshan mar [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed de/_dngos po yod pa'am/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]par yang yid

[\[207a.7\]{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog mtshan mar [{]myi [,]mi [}]byad de/_dngos po yod pa 'am/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]par yang yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed do/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa de dag la [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog mtshan mar [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed de/_dngos po yod pa 'am/_

[\[207b.1\]]dngos po med par yang yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed do/_/gang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa de dag la sgom pa de la yang mi rtog mtshan mar [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed de/_dngos po yod pa 'am/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]par yang yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed do/_/sems can gang gi don tu sangs rgyas kyi

[\[208a\]]
[\[208a.1\]]dngos po med par yang yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed do/_/gang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang /_gang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba dang /_gang gis mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba de la yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[208a.2\]]rtog mtshan mar [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed de/_dngos po yod pa 'am/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]par yang yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar chos thams cad ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid de/_de dag sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang ma mdzad/_rang sangs rgyas 
[\[208a.3\]]dang /_nyan thos rnams kyis kyang ma byas te/_chos thams cad ni byed pa po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_byed pa po dang bral ba'o/_/rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta lags na/_chos rnams chos rnams nyid dang bral ba lags sam/_
[\[208a.4\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_rab 'byor chos rnams ni chos rnams nyid dang bral ba'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar chos rnams chos rnams nyid dang bral ba lags na/_
[\[208a.5\]]ji ltar chos kyis chos la dngos po mchis shes bgyi ba 'am/_dngos po ma mchis shes bgyi bar yongs su 'tshal bar 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das dngos po ma mchis pa'i chos kyis/_dngos po ma mchis pa'i chos yongs su 'tshal bar 
[\[208a.6\]{]myi [,]mi [}]rung ste/_dngos po mchis pa'i chos kyis kyang /_dngos po mchis pa'i chos yongs su 'tshal bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]rung ngo /_/dngos po ma mchis pa'i chos kyis kyang /_dngos po mchis pa'i chos yongs su 'tshal bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]rung ngo /_/dngos po mchis pa'i 
[\[208a.7\]]chos kyis kyang /_dngos po ma mchis pa'i chos 'tshal bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]rung ngo /_/de ltar chos thams cad yongs su 'tshal ba ma mchis pas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lta dngos po mchis pa 'am/_dngos po ma mchis par sems 
[\[208b\]]
[\[208b.1\]]par yang ga la 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_'jig rten gyi kun rdzob nye bar bzung bas/_dngos po yod ces bya ba 'am/_dngos po 
[\[208b.2\]{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya bar ston te/_don dam par ni ma yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci lags/_'jig rten gyi kun rdzob kyang gzhan zhig la/_don dam pa yang gzhan zhig lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 
[\[208b.3\]]'jig rten gyi kun rdzob kyang gzhan zhig la/_don dam par yang gzhan zhig yin zhes bya ba yang [{]myed [,]med [}]de/_'jig rten gyi kun rdzob kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de nyid don dam pa'i de bzhin nyid yin yang /_de la sems can de dag phyin ci log tu gyur pas 
[\[208b.4\]]de bzhin nyid de [{]myi [,]mi [}]shes [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ste/_de dag gi don tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten gyi kun rdzob kyis dngos po yod ces bya ba 'am/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya bar brjod do/_/rab 'byor 'di ltar yang sems can gang ji snyed cig phung 
[\[208b.5\]]po lnga la dngos po yod pa'i 'du shes su gyur te/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]par [{]myi [,]mi [}]shes pa de dag gi don tu chos rnams rab tu dbye ba nye bar bzung ste/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]par ji ltar shes par 'gyur zhes te de skad du brjod do/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[208b.6\]]dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyad par bya'o/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las/_le'u lnga bcu bzhi'o//_//de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab [{]'byord [,]'byor [}]kyis bcom ldan 'das la 
[\[208b.7\]]'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa zhes bgyi na/_de skad du byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa zhes bgyi ba de gang gi tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' 
[\[209a\]]
[\[209a.1\]]stsal pa/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa zhes bya ba ni/_de byang chub kyi don tu spyad pas na/_de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa zhes bya'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[209a.2\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang la spyod pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gzugs stong pa zhes bya bar spyod de/_ci nas kyang blo rnam pa gnyis su [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ba de ltar spyod do/_/tshor ba stong pa zhes bya bar 
[\[209a.3\]]spyod de/_ci nas kyang blo rnam pa gnyis su [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ba de ltar spyod do/_/'du shes stong pa zhes bya bar spyod de/_ci nas kyang blo rnam pa gnyis su [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ba de ltar spyod do/_/'du byed stong pa zhes bya bar spyod de/_ci nas kyang blo rnam pa gnyis su 
[\[209a.4\]{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ba de ltar spyod do/_/rnam par shes pa stong pa zhes bya bar spyod de/_ci nas kyang blo rnam pa gnyis su [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ba de ltar spyod do/_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]stong pa zhes bya ba spyod de/_ci nas kyang blo rnam pa gnyis su [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ba de ltar spyod do/_/rna 
[\[209a.5\]]ba stong pa zhes bya bar spyod de/_ci nas kyang blo rnam pa gnyis su [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ba de ltar spyod do/_/sna stong pa zhes bya bar spyod de/_ci nas kyang blo rnam pa gnyis su [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ba de ltar spyod do/_/lce stong pa zhes bya bar spyod de/_ci nas kyang blo rnam pa gnyis

[\[209b\]]
[\[209b.1\]]ro stong pa zhes bya bar spyod de/_ci nas kyang blo rnam pa gnyis su [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ba de ltar spyod do/_/reg stong pa zhes bya bar spyod de/_ci nas kyang blo rnam pa gnyis su [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ba de ltar spyod do/_/chos stong pa zhes bya bar spyod de/_ci nas kyang blo rnam pa gnyis su

[\[209b.3\]]spyod do/_/sna'i rnam par shes pa stong pa zhes bya bar spyod de/_ci nas kyang blo rnam pa gnyis su [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ba de ltar spyod do/_/lce'i rnam par shes pa stong pa zhes bya bar spyod de/_ci nas kyang blo rnam pa gnyis su [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ba de ltar spyod do/_/lus kyi rnam 
[\[209b.4\]]par shes pa stong pa zhes bya bar spyod de/_ci nas kyang blo rnam pa gnyis su [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ba de ltar spyod do/_/yid kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa zhes bya bar spyod de/_ci nas kyang blo rnam pa gnyis su [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ba de ltar spyod do/_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa stong pa 
[\[209b.5\]]zhes bya bar spyod de/_ci nas kyang blo rnam pa gnyis su [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ba de ltar spyod do/_/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa zhes bya bar spyod de/_ci nas kyang blo rnam pa gnyis su mi 'gyur ba de ltar spyod do/_/sna'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa zhes bya bar spyod de/_ci nas 
[\[209b.6\]]kyang blo rnam pa gnyis su [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ba de ltar spyod do/_/lce'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa zhes bya bar spyod de/_ci nas kyang blo rnam pa gnyis su [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ba de ltar spyod do/_/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa zhes bya bar spyod de/_ci nas kyang blo rnam pa gnyis su [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[209b.7\]]'gyur ba de ltar spyod do/_/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa zhes bya bar spyod de/_ci nas kyang blo rnam pa gnyis su [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ba de ltar spyod do/_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa zhes bya bar spyod de/_ci nas kyang blo rnam pa gnyis su [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur 
[\[210a\]]

[\[213b\]]
[\[213b.1\]]bya'o/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub byang chub ces bgyi na/_byang chub ces bgyi ba de gang gi tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor byang chub ces bya ba de ni/_stong pa nyid

[\[214a\]]
[\[214a.1\]]pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang /_nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /_phyi 
[\[214a.2\]]stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /_phyi nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /_chen po stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /_don dam pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /_'dus byas stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /_'dus ma byas 
[\[214a.3\]]stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /_thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /_dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /_rang bzhin stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /_chos thams cad stong pa 
[\[214a.4\]]nyid la spyod pa dang /_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa 
[\[214a.5\]]dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la spyod pa dang /_yang dag par spong ba rnams la spyod pa dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la spyod pa dang /_dbang po rnams la spyod pa dang /_stobs rnams la spyod pa dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la spyod 
[\[214a.6\]]pa dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la spyod pa dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la spyod pa dang /_bsam gtan rnams la spyod pa dang /_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams la spyod pa dang /_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la 
[\[214a.7\]]spyod pa dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad la spyod pa dang /_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la spyod pa dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa la spyod pa dang /_mngon par shes pa 
[\[214b\]]
[\[214b.1\]]rnams la spyod pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin rnams la spyod pa dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams la spyod pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la spyod pa dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa rnams la spyod pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la spyod pa 
[\[214b.2\]]dang /_byams pa chen po la spyod pa dang /_snying rje chen po la spyod pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la spyod pa dang /_thams cad shes pa nyid la spyod pa dang /_lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la spyod pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad 
[\[214b.3\]]mkhyen pa nyid la spyod pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang dang gang tshogs su 'gyur ba 'am/_'grib pa 'am 'gong pa 'am/_'phel ba 'am/_skye ba 'am/_'gag pa 'am/_kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am/_rnam par byed par 'gyur ba lags/_/bcom ldan 
[\[214b.4\]]'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang byang chub 'di la spyod pa dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la 
[\[214b.5\]]spyod pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang /_nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /_phyi stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /_phyi nang stong pa nyid 
[\[214b.6\]]la spyod pa dang /_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /_chen po stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /_don dam pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /_'dus byas stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /_mtha' las 'das pa stong 
[\[214b.7\]]pa nyid la spyod pa dang /_thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /_dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /_rang bzhin stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /_chos thams cad stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang 
[\[215a\]]
[\[215a.1\]{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la spyod pa 
[\[215a.2\]]dang /_yang dag par spong ba rnams la spyod pa dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la spyod pa dang /_dbang po rnams la spyod pa dang /_stobs rnams la spyod pa dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la spyod pa dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag 
[\[215a.3\]]brgyad pa la spyod pa dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la spyod pa dang /_bsam gtan rnams la spyod pa dang /_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams la spyod pa dang /_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la spyod pa dang /_rnam par thar pa rnams la 
[\[215a.4\]]spyod pa dang /_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la spyod pa dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa la spyod pa dang /_mngon par shes pa rnams la spyod pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin 
[\[215a.5\]]rnams la spyod pa dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams la spyod pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la spyod pa dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa rnams la spyod pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la spyod pa dang /_byams pa chen po la spyod 
[\[215a.6\]]pa dang /_snying rje chen po la spyod pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la spyod pa dang /_thams cad shes pa nyid la spyod pa dang /_lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la spyod pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la spyod pa de la chos 
[\[215a.7\]]gang yang tshogs su 'gyur ba 'am/_'grib pa 'am/_'phel ba 'am/_'gong ba 'am/_skye ba 'am/_'gag pa 'am/_kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am/_rnam par byang bar 'gyur ba gang yang [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor byang chub sems 
[\[215b\]]
[\[215b.1\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub ni chos gang yang tshogs su 'gyur ba 'am/_'grib par bya ba 'am/_'gong bar bya ba 'am/_'phel bar bya ba 'am/_skye bar bya ba 'am/_'gag par bya ba 'am/_kun 
[\[215b.2\]]nas nyon mongs par bya ba dang /_rnam par byang bar bya ba'i phyir de [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis nye bar gnas pa ma yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ltar gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 
[\[215b.3\]]spyod pa'i byang chub chos gang yang tshogs su 'gyur ba 'am/_'grib par bgyi ba 'am/_'gong bar bgyi ba'am/_'phel bar bgyi ba 'am/_skye bar bgyi ba 'am/_'gag par bgyi ba 'am/_kun nas nyon mongs par bgyi ba 'am/_rnam par 
[\[215b.4\]]byang bar bgyi ba'i slad du [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis nye bar gnas pa ma lags na/_bcom ldan 'das 'o na ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_ji ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin 
[\[215b.5\]]pa yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur/_ji ltar tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur/_ji ltar bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur/_ji ltar brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 
[\[215b.6\]]'dzin par 'gyur/_ji ltar bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur/_ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur/_ji ltar nang stong pa nyid la spyod par 'gyur/_ji ltar phyi stong pa nyid la 
[\[215b.7\]]spyod par 'gyur/_ji ltar phyi nang stong pa nyid la spyod par 'gyur/_ji ltar stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la spyod par 'gyur/_ji ltar chen po stong pa nyid la spyod par 'gyur/_ji ltar don dam pa stong pa nyid la spyod par 'gyur/_ji ltar 'dus 
[\[216a\]]
[\[216a.1\]]byas stong pa nyid la spyod par 'gyur/_ji ltar 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la spyod par 'gyur/_ji ltar mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la spyod par 'gyur/_ji ltar thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid la spyod par 
[\[216a.2\]]'gyur/_ji ltar dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid la spyod par 'gyur/_ji ltar rang bzhin stong pa nyid la spyod par 'gyur/_ji ltar chos thams cad stong pa nyid la spyod par 'gyur/_ji ltar rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la spyod par 'gyur/_ji ltar [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[216a.3\]{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid la spyod par 'gyur/_ji ltar dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid la spyod par 'gyur/_ji ltar ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod par 'gyur/_ji ltar dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod par 'gyur/_ji ltar dran pa nye bar gzhag pa 
[\[216a.4\]]rnams la spyod par 'gyur/_ji ltar yang dag par spong ba rnams la spyod par 'gyur/_ji ltar rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la spyod par 'gyur/_ji ltar dbang po rnams la spyod par 'gyur/_ji ltar stobs rnams la spyod par 'gyur/_ji ltar byang chub kyi 
[\[216a.5\]]yan lag rnams la spyod par 'gyur/_ji ltar 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la spyod par 'gyur/_ji ltar 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la spyod par 'gyur/_ji ltar bsam gtan rnams la spyod par 'gyur/_ji ltar tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams la spyod 
[\[216a.6\]]par 'gyur/_ji ltar gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la spyod par 'gyur/_ji ltar rnam par thar pa rnams la spyod par 'gyur/_ji ltar mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la spyod par 'gyur/_ji ltar rnam par thar pa'i 
[\[216a.7\]]sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa la spyod par 'gyur/_ji ltar mngon par shes pa rnams la spyod par 'gyur/_ji ltar ting nge 'dzin rnams la spyod par 'gyur/_ji ltar gzungs kyi sgo rnams la spyod par 'gyur/_ji ltar 
[\[216b\]]
[\[216b.1\]]de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la spyod par 'gyur/_ji ltar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa rnams la spyod par 'gyur/_ji ltar so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la spyod par 'gyur/_ji ltar byams pa chen po la spyod par 'gyur/_ji ltar snying rje chen po la spyod 
[\[216b.2\]]par 'gyur/_ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu la spyod par 'gyur/_ji ltar nyan thos kyi sa las 'da' bar 'gyur/_ji ltar rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'da' bar 'gyur/_ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis pa la 'jug par 'gyur/_
[\[216b.3\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la ni gnyis su spyod pa'i blo med de/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni gnyis kyis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod do/_/gnyis 
[\[216b.4\]]kyis tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod do/_/gnyis kyis bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod do/_/gnyis kyis brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod do/_/gnyis kyis bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod do/_/gnyis 
[\[216b.5\]]kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod do/_/gnyis kyis nang stong pa nyid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod do/_/gnyis kyis phyi stong pa nyid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod do/_/gnyis kyis phyi nang stong pa nyid la mi spyod do/_/gnyis kyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod do/_/gnyis 
[\[216b.6\]]kyis chen po stong pa nyid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod do/_/gnyis kyis don dam pa stong pa nyid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod do/_/gnyis kyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod do/_/gnyis kyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod do/_/gnyis kyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa 
[\[216b.7\]]nyid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod do/_/gnyis kyis thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod do/_/gnyis kyis dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod do/_/gnyis kyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod do/_/gnyis kyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod do/_/
[\[217a\]]
[\[217a.1\]]gnyis kyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod do/_/gnyis kyis mi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod do/_/gnyis kyis dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod do/_/gnyis kyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod do/_/
[\[217a.2\]]gnyis kyis dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod do/_/gnyis kyis dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod do/_/gnyis kyis yang dag par spong ba rnams la [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod do/_/gnyis kyis rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod do/_/gnyis

[\[217b\]]
[\[217b.1\]]la [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod do/_/gnyis kyis lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod do/_/gnyis kyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod do/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gal te/_de ltar gnyis kyis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod/_gnyis 
[\[217b.2\]]kyis tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod/_gnyis kyis bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod/_gnyis kyis brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod/_gnyis kyis bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod/_gnyis kyis shes

[\[217b.6\]]spyod/_gnyis kyis [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod/_gnyis kyis dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod/_gnyis kyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod/_gnyis kyis dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod/_gnyis kyis dran pa

[\[218a\]]
[\[218a.1\]]kyi yan lag rnams la [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod/_gnyis kyis 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod/_gnyis kyis 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod/_gnyis kyis bsam gtan rnams la [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod/_gnyis kyis tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa 
[\[218a.2\]]rnams la [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod/_gnyis kyis gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod/_gnyis kyis rnam par thar pa rnams la [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod/_gnyis kyis mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod/_gnyis kyis rnam 
[\[218a.3\]]par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa la [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod/_gnyis kyis mngon par shes pa rnams la [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod/_gnyis kyis ting nge 'dzin rnams la [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod/_gnyis kyis gzungs kyi sgo rnams la [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod/_
[\[218a.4\]]gnyis kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod/_gnyis kyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa rnams la [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod/_gnyis kyis so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod/_gnyis kyis byams pa chen po la [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod/_gnyis kyis snying rje 
[\[218a.5\]]chen po la [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod/_gnyis kyis sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod/_gnyis kyis thams cad shes pa nyid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod/_gnyis kyis lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod/_gnyis kyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod na/_
[\[218a.6\]]'o na de ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i rtsa ba mang pos rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur bas/_sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/_sems slad ma bskyed pa'i bar du dge ba'i rtsa ba mang pos rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur/_
[\[218a.7\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor su gang gnyis la spyod pa de dag ni dge ba'i rtsa bas rnam par 'phel bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad ni gnyis la rten pa ste/_de dag ni dge ba'i rtsa bas 
[\[218b\]]
[\[218b.1\]]rnam par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'phel lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni gnyis la [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod de/_de ni sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/_sems phyi ma bskyed pa'i bar du dge ba'i rtsa bas rnam par 'phel te/_de ni lha dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]dang /_lha ma 
[\[218b.2\]]yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis nyams smad pas nyan thos kyis 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar ltung bar 'gyur ba 'am/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]dge ba'i chos gzhan gyis yongs su 'phrogs par gyur cing /_de dag gis yongs su 
[\[218b.3\]]'phrogs pas/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod na/_dge ba'i rtsa ba mang pos rnam par mi 'phel ba dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod na/_dge ba'i rtsa ba mang pos rnam par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'phel ba dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod 
[\[218b.4\]]na/_dge ba'i rtsa ba mang pos rnam par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'phel ba dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod na/_dge ba'i rtsa ba mang pos rnam par mi 'phel ba dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod na/_dge ba'i rtsa ba mang pos rnam par [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[218b.5\]]'phel ba dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod na/_dge ba'i rtsa ba mang pos rnam par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'phel ba dang /_nang stong pa nyid la spyod na/_dge ba'i rtsa ba mang pos rnam par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'phel ba dang /_phyi stong pa nyid la spyod na/_dge ba'i rtsa ba mang pos rnam 
[\[218b.6\]]par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'phel ba dang /_phyi nang stong pa nyid la spyod na/_dge ba'i rtsa ba mang pos rnam par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'phel ba dang /_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la spyod na/_dge ba'i rtsa ba mang pos rnam par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'phel ba dang /_chen po stong pa nyid la spyod na/_dge ba'i rtsa ba mang pos 
[\[218b.7\]]rnam par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'phel ba dang /_don dam pa stong pa nyid la spyod na/_dge ba'i rtsa ba mang pos rnam par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'phel ba dang /_'dus byas stong pa nyid la spyod na/_dge ba'i rtsa ba mang pos rnam par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'phel ba dang /_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la spyod na/_dge 
[\[219a\]]
[\[219a.1\]]ba'i rtsa ba mang pos rnam par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'phel ba dang /_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la spyod na/_dge ba'i rtsa ba mang pos rnam par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'phel ba dang /_thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid la spyod na/_dge ba'i rtsa ba mang pos 
[\[219a.2\]]rnam par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'phel ba dang /_dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid la spyod na/_dge ba'i rtsa ba mang pos rnam par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'phel ba dang /_rang bzhin stong pa nyid la spyod na/_dge ba'i rtsa ba mang pos rnam par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'phel ba dang /_chos thams cad stong pa nyid 
[\[219a.3\]]la spyod na/_dge ba'i rtsa ba mang pos rnam par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'phel ba dang /_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la spyod na/_dge ba'i rtsa ba mang pos rnam par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'phel ba dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid la spyod na/_dge ba'i rtsa ba mang pos rnam 
[\[219a.4\]]par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'phel ba dang /_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid la spyod na/_dge ba'i rtsa ba mang pos rnam par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'phel ba dang /_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod na/_dge ba'i rtsa ba mang pos rnam par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'phel ba dang /_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]
[\[219a.5\]]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod na/_dge ba'i rtsa ba mang pos rnam par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'phel ba dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la spyod na/_dge ba'i rtsa ba mang pos rnam par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'phel ba dang /_yang dag par spong ba rnams la spyod na/_dge ba'i 
[\[219a.6\]]rtsa ba mang pos rnam par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'phel ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la spyod na/_dge ba'i rtsa ba mang pos rnam par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'phel ba dang /_dbang po rnams la spyod na/_dge ba'i rtsa ba mang pos rnam par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'phel ba dang /_stobs rnams la spyod na/_dge 
[\[219a.7\]]ba'i rtsa ba mang pos rnam par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'phel ba dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la spyod na/_dge ba'i rtsa ba mang pos rnam par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'phel ba dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la spyod na/_dge ba'i rtsa ba mang pos rnam par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'phel ba dang /_'phags 
[\[219b\]]
[\[219b.1\]]pa'i bden pa rnams la spyod na/_dge ba'i rtsa ba mang pos rnam par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'phel ba dang /_bsam gtan rnams la spyod na/_dge ba'i rtsa ba mang pos rnam par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'phel ba dang /_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams la spyod na/_dge ba'i rtsa ba mang pos rnam par [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[219b.2\]]'phel ba dang /_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la spyod na/_dge ba'i rtsa ba mang pos rnam par mi 'phel ba dang /_rnam par thar pa rnams la spyod na/_dge ba'i rtsa ba mang pos rnam par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'phel ba dang /_mthar kyis gnas pa'i 
[\[219b.3\]]snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la spyod na/_dge ba'i rtsa ba mang pos rnam par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'phel ba dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa la spyod na/_dge ba'i rtsa ba mang pos rnam par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'phel ba dang /_
[\[219b.4\]]mngon par shes pa rnams la spyod na/_dge ba'i rtsa ba mang pos rnam par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'phel ba dang /_ting nge 'dzin rnams la spyod na/_dge ba'i rtsa ba mang pos rnam par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'phel ba dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams la spyod na/_dge ba'i rtsa ba mang pos rnam 
[\[219b.5\]]par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'phel ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la spyod na/_dge ba'i rtsa ba mang pos rnam par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'phel ba dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa rnams la spyod na/_dge ba'i rtsa ba mang pos rnam par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'phel ba dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams 
[\[219b.6\]]la spyod na/_dge ba'i rtsa ba mang pos rnam par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'phel ba dang /_byams pa chen po la spyod na/_dge ba'i rtsa ba mang pos rnam par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'phel ba dang /_snying rje chen po la spyod na/_dge ba'i rtsa ba mang pos rnam par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'phel ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos 
[\[219b.7\]]ma 'dres pa rnams la spyod na/_dge ba'i rtsa ba mang pos rnam par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'phel ba dang /_thams cad shes pa nyid la spyod na/_dge ba'i rtsa ba mang pos rnam par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'phel ba dang /_lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la spyod na/_dge ba'i rtsa ba mang pos rnam 
[\[220a\]]
[\[220a.1\]]par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'phel ba dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la spyod na/_dge ba'i rtsa ba mang pos rnam par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'phel ba de ltar nyams smad par [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus te/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de ltar shes rab kyi 
[\[220a.2\]]pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par bya'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci lags/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyi slad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bgyi 'am/_bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[220a.3\]]bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ni ma yin te/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyi phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod do/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyi phyir yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[220a.4\]]spyod do/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur ma byas/_dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongs su rdzogs par ma byas/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung bar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/_rnam 
[\[220a.5\]]pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus so/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur bgyis pa dang /_dge ba'i rtsa bas yongs su bzung ba dang /_dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su 
[\[220a.6\]]bzung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ba lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa 
[\[220a.7\]]nas nye bar bzung ste/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur byed/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis mdo dang dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa dang /_lung bstan pa dang /_tshigs su bcad pa dang /_ched du brjod pa dang /_gleng gzhi 
[\[220b\]]
[\[220b.1\]]dang /_'di ltar 'das pa dang /_skyes pa'i rabs dang /_shin tu rgyas pa dang /_chos rmad du byung ba dang /_rtogs pa brjod pa dang /_gtan la bab pa bstan pa gang ci gsungs kyang de dag thams cad yongs su 'dzin to/_/yongs su bzung nas kyang tshig 
[\[220b.2\]]gis yongs su 'dris pa dang /_yid kyis shin tu brtags pa dang /_lta bas rab tu khong du chud par byas shing /_gzungs rab tu thob par byed do/_/gzungs rab tu thob nas so so yang dag par rig par skyed do/_/so so yang dag par rig pa skyes 
[\[220b.3\]]pas de tshe rnam par 'phos kyang chos de dag rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur gyi bar du nam yang chud za bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur te/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed cing /_dge 
[\[220b.4\]]ba'i rtsa ba de dag gis yongs su bzung na/_nam yang ngan song dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]khom par skye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag gis kyang lus yongs su dag pa yongs su 'dzin to/_/lus de dag gis kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do/_/sems 
[\[220b.5\]]can rnams yongs su smyin par byed do/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag gis yongs su bzung bas kyang /_dge ba'i bshes gnyen sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs 
[\[220b.6\]]rgyas kyi theg pa'i legs pa ston pa dag dang /_nam du yang 'bral bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur bar 
[\[220b.7\]]bya'o/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed par bya'o/_/dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams la bsten par bya'o//_//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las/_le'u lnga bcu lnga'o//_//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong 
[\[221a\]]
[\[221a.1\]]phrag brgya pa/_/bam po bcu bzhi pa/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang sangs rgyas bcom 
[\[221a.2\]]ldan 'das rnams la yang bsnyen bkur [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyid dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di yongs su rdzogs par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyid la/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis kyang yongs su ma bzung bar gyur na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa 
[\[221a.3\]]nyid thob par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ram/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur ma byas/_dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su rdzogs par ma byas 
[\[221a.4\]]la/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su ma bzung bar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ba [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur yang byas/_dge ba'i rtsa ba yang yongs su rdzogs par 
[\[221a.5\]]byas/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen la yang bsten pa byas kyang /_da dung rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur ma byas/_dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su rdzogs par ma byas/_dge ba'i 
[\[221a.6\]]bshes gnyen la ma bsten pa rnams/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ba lta ci smos te/_de ni gnas med do/_/rab 'byor de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub sems dpa'i [{]mying [,]ming [}]bden pa la gnas par 'dod 
[\[221a.7\]]pa dang /_myur du bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur bar bya'o/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba mang po bskyed par bya'o/_/dge ba'i bshes gnyen 
[\[221b\]]
[\[221b.1\]]la bsten par bya'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur bgyis/_dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bsten par 
[\[221b.2\]]bgyis kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de ni thabs mkhas pa dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldan pa'i phyir te/_des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las thabs de thos par ma gyur pa'i phyir 
[\[221b.3\]]dge ba'i rtsa ba de lta bu yang ma bskyed/_gang de la thabs ston pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen de lta bu dag la yang ma bsten pas de ltar thob par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_thabs 
[\[221b.4\]]mkhas pa gang dang ldan pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ba'i thabs mkhas pa de gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa 
[\[221b.5\]]nas nye bar bzung ste/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod na/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang /_nyan thos dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]ma yin par gyur ba 
[\[221b.6\]]dag la sbyin pa yongs su gtong ste/_de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba de dang ldan pas/_sbyin pa la yang sbyin pa'i 'du shes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur/_len pa la'ang len pa'i 'du shes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur/_gtong ba la yang gtong ba'i 
[\[221b.7\]]'du shes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/de ni 'di ltar chos thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong par shes shing /_chos thams cad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_ma byung ba dang /_yongs su ma rdzogs pa dang /_mngon par ma grub par mthong /_chos rnams kyi chos kyi mtshan 
[\[222a\]]
[\[222a.1\]]nyid la 'jug na yang /_chos thams cad ni nus pa gang yang [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o zhes bya bar 'du byed [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i mtshan nyid kyis 'jug ste/_de thabs mkhas pa de lta bu dang ldan pas na/_dge ba'i rtsa bas rnam par 'phel bar 
[\[222a.2\]]sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod de/_de sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /_sems can rnams yongs su smyin par byed/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed kyang gzhan du na sems can thams cad yongs su bskyab pa dang /_
[\[222a.3\]]sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma gtogs par sbyin pa'i 'bras bu gang 'khor bar yongs su spyod par bya ba de lta bu'i 'bras bu la smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/shes rab kyi pha rol 
[\[222a.4\]]tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las/_le'u lnga bcu drug go/_//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_sems dang po 
[\[222a.5\]]bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/_tshul khrims srung ste/_de la 'dod chags kyi sems sgrib par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur/_zhe sdang sgrib par mi 'gyur/_gti mug sgrib par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur/_bag la 
[\[222a.6\]]nyal ba sgrib par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur/_kun nas ldang ba sgrib par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur te/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]dge ba'i chos gzhan byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba 'di lta ste/_ser sna 'am/_tshul khrims ngan pa 'am/_'khrug pa'i sems sam/_le lo'i sems sam/_
[\[222a.7\]]brtson 'grus chung ba'i sems sam/_g.yeng ba'i sems sam/_shes rab 'chal pa'i sems sam/_nga rgyal lam/_brnyas pa 'am/_che ba'i nga rgyal lam/_nga'i nga rgyal lam/_nyan thos kyi sems sam/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sems 
[\[222b\]]
[\[222b.1\]]dag kyang sgrib par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar chos thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong par shes shing /_chos thams cad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_ma byung ba dang /_yongs su ma rdzogs pa dang /_mngon par ma grub par 
[\[222b.2\]]mthong ste/_chos rnams kyi chos kyi mtshan nyid la 'jug na/_yang chos thams cad ni nus pa gang yang [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o zhes bya bar 'du byed [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i mtshan nyid kyis 'jug ste/_de thabs mkhas pa de lta bu dang ldan pas na/_dge ba'i rtsa bas rnam par 
[\[222b.3\]]'phel bar tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod de/_de tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /_sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed kyang gzhan du na/_sems can thams cad 
[\[222b.4\]]yongs su bskyab pa dang /_sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma gtogs par/_tshul khrims kyi 'bras bu gang 'khor bar yongs su spyad par bya ba de lta bu'i 'bras bu la smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/
[\[222b.5\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las/_le'u lnga bcu bdun no//_//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_
[\[222b.6\]]sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas bzod pa sgom ste/_de la 'dod chags kyi sems sgrib par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur/_zhe sdang sgrib par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur/_gti mug sgrib par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur/_
[\[222b.7\]]bag la nyal ba sgrib par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur/_kun nas ldang ba sgrib par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur te/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]dge ba'i chos gzhan byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba 'di lta ste/_ser sna 'am/_tshul khrims ngan pa 'am/_'khrug pa'i sems sam/_le lo'i sems sam/_
[\[223a\]]
[\[223a.1\]]brtson 'grus chung ba'i sems sam/_g.yeng ba'i sems sam/_shes rab 'chal pa'i sems sam/_nga rgyal lam/_brnyas pa 'am/_che ba'i nga rgyal lam/_nga'i nga rgyal lam/_nyan thos kyi sems sam/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sems dag 
[\[223a.2\]]kyang sgrib par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar chos thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong par shes shing /_chos thams cad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_ma byung ba dang /_yongs su ma rdzogs pa dang /_mngon par ma grub par mthong ste/_chos 
[\[223a.3\]]rnams kyi chos kyi mtshan nyid la 'jug na/_yang chos thams cad ni nus pa gang yang [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o zhes bya bar 'du byed [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i mtshan nyid kyis 'jug ste/_de thabs mkhas pa de lta bu dang ldan pas na/_dge ba'i rtsa bas rnam par 'phel bar bzod pa'i pha 
[\[223a.4\]]rol tu phyin pa la spyod de/_de bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /_sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed kyang gzhan du na sems can thams cad yongs su bskyab pa dang /_sems

[\[223b.1\]]tshul khrims ngan pa 'am/_'khrug pa'i sems sam/_le lo'i sems sam/_brtson 'grus chung ba'i sems sam/_g.yeng ba'i sems sam/_shes rab 'chal pa'i sems sam/_nga rgyal lam/_brnyes pa 'am/_che ba'i nga rgyal lam/_nga'i nga

[\[227a\]]
[\[227a.1\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de lta bu'i chos zab mo dag la spyod kyang /_rnam par smin pa yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dzin pa ni blo dam pa dang ldan pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin

[\[227b.1\]]g.yo'o/_/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i ngo bo nyid las [{]myi [,]mi [}]g.yo'o/_/sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i ngo bo nyid las [{]myi [,]mi [}]g.yo'o/_/lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i ngo bo nyid las [{]myi [,]mi [}]g.yo'o/_/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i ngo bo nyid las [{]myi [,]mi [}]g.yo'o/_/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i ngo 
[\[227b.2\]]bo nyid las [{]myi [,]mi [}]g.yo'o/_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i ngo bo nyid las [{]myi [,]mi [}]g.yo'o/_/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i ngo bo nyid las mi g.yo'o/_/sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i ngo bo nyid las [{]myi [,]mi [}]g.yo'o/_/lce'i 'dus te reg

[\[228a\]]
[\[228a.1\]]pa'i ngo bo nyid las [{]myi [,]mi [}]g.yo'o/_/brtson 'grus kyi pha [{]rold [,]rol [}]tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid las [{]myi [,]mi [}]g.yo'o/_/bsam gtan gyi pha [{]rold [,]rol [}]tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid las [{]myi [,]mi [}]g.yo'o/_/shes rab kyi pha [{]rold [,]rol [}]tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid las

[\[228b\]]
[\[228b.1\]]ngo bo nyid las [{]myi [,]mi [}]g.yo'o/_/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i ngo bo nyid las [{]myi [,]mi [}]g.yo'o/_/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid las [{]myi [,]mi [}]g.yo'o/_/stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin kyi ngo bo nyid las mi g.yo'o/_/mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ting nge
