[\[228b.6\]]pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji lags/_dngos po mchis pas/_dngos po ma mchis pa mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyi bar nus sam/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ni ma yin no/_/gsol pa/_'o na dngos po ma 
[\[228b.7\]]mchis pas/_dngos po mchis pa mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyi bar nus sam/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ni ma yin no/_/gsol pa/_'o na dngos po mchis pas dngos po mchis pa mngon 
[\[229a\]]
[\[229a.1\]]par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyi bar nus sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ni ma yin no/_/gsol pa/_'o na dngos po ma mchis pas/_dngos po ma mchis pa mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyi 
[\[229a.2\]]bar nus sam/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ni ma yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'o na gal te/_de ltar dngos po mchis pas dngos po ma mchis pa mngon par rtogs par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur/_dngos po ma mchis pas kyang dngos po ma 
[\[229a.3\]]mchis pa mngon par rtogs par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur/_dngos po mchis pas kyang dngos po mchis pa mngon par rtogs par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur/_dngos po ma mchis pas kyang dngos po ma mchis pa mngon par rtogs par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur na/_bcom ldan 'das de'i slad du thob pa ma mchis 
[\[229a.4\]]shing /_mngon par rtogs pa ma mchis pa 'am/_gcig du [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ram/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_mngon par rtogs pa ni/_yong [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ma yin te/_bzhi pos mngon par bsgrub pa de lta bus ni ma yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 
[\[229a.5\]]'das 'o na/_mngon par rtogs par 'gyur ba ji lta bu zhig mchis/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gang la dngos po yang [{]myed[,]med[}]/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang ma yin pa de lta bu ni mngon par rtogs pa ste/_de la spros pa de dag [{]myed [,]med [}]pas/_spros pa [{]myed [,]med [}]
[\[229a.6\]]cing /_spros pa dang bral ba ni mngon par rtogs pa'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa gang lags/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gzugs rtag ces bya ba 'am/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bya ba 
[\[229a.7\]]ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o/_/tshor ba rtag ces bya ba'am [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o/_/'du shes rtag ces bya ba 'am [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[229b\]]
[\[229b.1\]]dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o/_/'du byed rtag ces bya ba 'am [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o/_/rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya ba 'am/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o/_/
[\[229b.2\]]gzugs ba de zhes bya ba 'am/_sdug bsngal zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o/_/tshor ba bde zhes bya ba 'am/_sdug bsngal zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o/_/'du shes bde 
[\[229b.3\]]zhes bya ba 'am/_sdug bsngal zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o/_/'du byed bde zhes bya ba 'am/_sdug bsngal zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o/_/rnam par shes pa bde 
[\[229b.4\]]zhes bya ba 'am/_sdug bsngal zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o/_/gzugs bdag ces bya ba 'am/_bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o/_/tshor ba bdag ces bya ba 
[\[229b.5\]]'am/_bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o/_/'du shes bdag ces bya ba 'am/_bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o/_/'du byed bdag ces bya ba 'am/_bdag 
[\[229b.6\]{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o/_/rnam par shes pa bdag ces bya ba 'am/_bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o/_/gzugs zhi zhes bya ba 'am/_ma zhi zhes bya

[\[230a\]]
[\[230a.1\]]dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o/_/'du byed zhi zhes bya ba 'am/_ma zhi zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o/_/rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bya ba 'am/_ma zhi zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems

[\[230a.5\]]sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o/_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]rtag ces bya ba'am/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bya ba ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o/_/rna ba rtag ces bya ba 'am/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros 
[\[230a.6\]]pa'o/_/sna rtag ces bya ba 'am/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o/_/lce rtag ces bya ba 'am/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o/_/lus rtag ces bya ba'am/_

[\[230b\]]
[\[230b.1\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o/_/rna ba bde zhes bya ba 'am/_sdug bsngal zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o/_/sna bde zhes bya ba'am/_sdug bsngal zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'

[\[230b.3\]]yid bde zhes bya ba'am/_sdug bsngal zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o/_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]bdag ces bya ba 'am/_bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o/_/rna ba bdag ces 
[\[230b.4\]]bya ba 'am/_bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o/_/sna bdag ces bya ba'am/_bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o/_/lce bdag ces bya ba 'am/_bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]

[\[230b.6\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o/_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]zhi zhes bya ba 'am/_ma zhi zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o/_/rna ba zhi zhes bya ba 'am/_ma zhi zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i

[\[231a\]]
[\[231a.1\]]ma zhi zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o/_/yid zhi zhes bya ba 'am/_ma zhi zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o/_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]yongs su shes par bya ba dang /_yongs su

[\[231a.3\]]yongs su shes par bya ba dang /_yongs su shes par bya ba ma yin zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o/_/lce yongs su shes par bya ba dang /_yongs su shes par bya ba ma yin zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[231a.4\]]dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o/_/lus yongs su shes par bya ba dang /_yongs su shes par bya ba ma yin zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o/_/yid yongs su shes par bya ba dang /_yongs su shes par bya ba ma yin 
[\[231a.5\]]zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o/_/gzugs rtag ces bya ba 'am/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o/_/sgra rtag ces bya ba 'am/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bya ba ni byang chub sems 
[\[231a.6\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o/_/dri rtag ces bya ba 'am/_mi rtag ces bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o/_/ro rtag ces bya ba 'am/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o/_/reg 
[\[231a.7\]]rtag ces bya ba 'am/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o/_/chos rtag ces bya ba 'am/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o/_/gzugs bde zhes bya ba 'am/_sdug 
[\[231b\]]
[\[231b.1\]]bsngal zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o/_/sgra bde zhes bya ba 'am/_sdug bsngal zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o/_/dri bde zhes bya ba 'am/_sdug bsngal zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems 
[\[231b.2\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o/_/ro bde zhes bya ba 'am/_sdug bsngal zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o/_/reg bde zhes bya ba 'am/_sdug bsngal zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 
[\[231b.3\]]spros pa'o/_/chos bde zhes bya ba 'am/_sdug bsngal zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o/_/gzugs bdag ces bya ba 'am/_bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o/_/

[\[236a.1\]]par bya ba dang /_yongs su shes par bya ba ma yin zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o/_/sa'i khams rtag ces bya ba 'am/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros

[\[241a.1\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o/_/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu shes pa dang /_mthong bas bltas te/_de las 'da' bar bya'o zhes byu ba ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o/_/

[\[251a.1\]]spror [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/'du byed ni spror [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/rnam par shes pa ni spror [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/[{]mying [,]ming [}]dang gzugs ni spror [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/skye mched drug ni spror [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/reg pa ni spror [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/tshor ba ni spror [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/
[\[251a.2\]]sred pa ni spror [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/len pa ni spror [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/srid pa ni spror [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/skye ba ni spror [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/rga shi ni spror [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/sbyin pa'i pha [{]rold [,]rol [}]tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa ni spror [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/tshul khrims kyi pha [{]rold [,]rol [}]tu phyin pa ni spror [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/
[\[251a.3\]]bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni spror med pa'o/_/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni spror [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni spror [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni spror [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/nang stong pa nyid ni spror [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/

[\[255a\]]
[\[255a.1\]]kyi pha [{]rold [,]rol [}]tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_byang chub sems dpa'i skyon [{]myed [,]med [}]pa la 'jug go/_//shes rab kyi pha [{]rold [,]rol [}]tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa stong phrag brgya pa/_bam po bcu drug pa/_

[\[257b.1\]]'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid rnam par dag pa bsgrub par bya ste/_de las lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid rnam par dag pa ni rnam pa gang dang gang dang /_tshul gang dang gang dang /_mtshan ma gang dang gang

[\[258a.1\]]par bya'o/_/gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'i sems can rnams kyi gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi lam shes par bya'o/_/rgyu shes par bya'o/_/'bras bu shes par bya'o/_/des kyang gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi lam bzlog par bya ste/_

[\[258b.1\]]'bras bu shes par bya'o/_/gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams kyi lam shes par bya'o/_/rgyu shes par bya'o/_/'bras bu shes par bya'o/_/'og [{]myin [,]min [}]gyi lha rnams kyi lam shes par bya'o/_/rgyu shes par bya'o/_/'bras bu shes par bya'o/_/nam mkha'

[\[258b.7\]]bya'o/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhi shes par bya'o/_/so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi shes par bya'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad shes par bya'o/_/byams pa chen po shes par bya'o/_/snying rje chen po shes par bya'o/_/
[\[259a\]]
[\[259a.1\]]lam de dag gis kyang sems can gang rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la dgod par bya ba de dag ni/_rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la 'god/_gang lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la dgod par bya ba de dag ni lan cig 
[\[259a.2\]]phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la 'god/_gang phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu la dgod par bya ba de dag ni/_phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu la 'god/_gang dgra bcom pa nyid la dgod par bya ba de dag ni dgra bcom pa nyid la 'god/_gang rang byang chub la 
[\[259a.3\]]dgod par bya ba de dag ni/_rang byang chub la 'god/_gang byang chub la dgod par bya ba de dag ni byang chub la 'god do/_/rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid do/_/de dag la bslabs 
[\[259a.4\]]shing /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can rnams kyi bsam pa la 'jug go_/sems can rnams kyi bsam pa la zhugs nas de bzhin du chos ston to/_/des chos bstan pa de yang 'bras bu [{]myed [,]med [}]par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/de ci'i 
[\[259a.5\]]phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar des gzhan gyi dbang po shin tu shes par byas pa'i phyir te/_de ni sems can rnams kyi lam dang /_lam ma yin pa dang /_'chi 'pho dang /_skye ba yang rab tu shes so/_/rab [{]'byord [,]'byor [}]byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[259a.6\]]dpa' chen pos/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyad par bya ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dir ni/_byang chub kyi phyogs gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bslab par bya ba 'am/_nyan thos kyis bslab 
[\[259a.7\]]par bya ba 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyis bslab par bya ba'i chos thams cad gang yang ma 'dus pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos gang lags pa dang /_byang chub gang lags pa'i chos 
[\[259b\]]
[\[259b.1\]]de dag thams cad ldan pa yang ma lags/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]ldan pa yang ma lags/_gzugs ma mchis pa/_bstan tu ma mchis/_thogs pa ma mchis pa ste/_'di ltar mtshan nyid ma mchis par mtshan nyid gcig na/_ji ltar byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos

[\[259b.3\]]nyid gcig pa ni chos gang la yang bsgrub pa 'am/_'jig par bgyid pa ma mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na/_nam mkha' ni chos gang la yang bsgrub pa 'am/_'jig par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyid do/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du rang gi 
[\[259b.4\]]mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i chos ni/_chos gang la yang bsgrub pa 'am/_'jig par bgyid pa ma mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_rab 'byor rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i 
[\[259b.5\]]chos ni/_chos gang la yang bsgrub pa'am/_'jig par byed pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/rab 'byor sems can gang rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i chos [{]myi [,]mi [}]shes pa de dag gi don du 'di skad du 'di dag ni/_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos byang chub tu thob par byed pa'o 
[\[259b.6\]]zhes bshad kyi/_rab [{]'byord [,]'byor [}]de ni 'di ltar gzugs gang yin pa dang /_tshor ba gang yin pa dang /_'du shes gang yin pa dang /_'du byed gang yin pa dang /_rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang /[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gang yin pa dang /_rna ba gang yin pa dang /_sna 
[\[259b.7\]]gang yin pa dang /_lce gang yin pa dang /_lus gang yin pa dang /_yid gang yin pa dang /_gzugs gang yin pa dang /_sgra gang yin pa dang /_dri gang yin pa dang /_ro gang yin pa dang /_reg gang yin pa dang /_chos gang yin pa dang /[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi rnam 
[\[260a\]]
[\[260a.1\]]par shes pa gang yin pa dang /_rna ba'i rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang /_sna'i rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang /_lce'i rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang /_lus kyi rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang /_yid kyi rnam 
[\[260a.2\]]par shes pa gang yin pa dang /[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa gang yin pa dang /_rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa gang yin pa dang /_sna'i 'dus te reg pa gang yin pa dang /_lce'i 'dus te reg pa gang yin pa dang /_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa gang yin pa dang /_

[\[260a.4\]]te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gang yin pa dang /_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba gang yin pa dang /_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba gang yin pa dang /_sa'i khams gang yin pa dang /_chu'i khams gang yin pa dang /[ {]mye'i [,]me'i [}]

[\[268a\]]
[\[268a.1\]]par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o/_/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o/_/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa rnam 
[\[268a.2\]]par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o/_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o/_/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend 
[\[268a.3\]]kyis tshor ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o/_/sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o/_/lce'i 'dus te

[\[268a.5\]]yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o/_/sa'i khams rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o/_/chu'i 
[\[268a.6\]]khams rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o/_/[{]mye'i [,]me'i [}]khams rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o/_/rlung gi khams rnam par bsgom pa 
[\[268a.7\]]bsgom pa ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o/_/nam mkha'i khams rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o/_/rnam par shes pa'i khams rnam par bsgom pa 
[\[268b\]]
[\[268b.1\]]bsgom pa ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o/_/rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o/_/ma rig pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/_shes rab kyi

[\[269a\]]
[\[269a.1\]]pa bsgom pa ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o/_/bsam gtan gsum pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o/_/bsam gtan bzhi pa rnam par

[\[273a\]]
[\[273a.1\]]bsgom pa bsgom pa/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/_ji ltar na 'du byed rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/_ji ltar na rnam par shes pa rnam par

[\[273b\]]
[\[273b.1\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/_ji ltar na sna'i rnam par shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/_ji ltar na lce'i rnam par shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/_shes rab kyi pha 
[\[273b.2\]]rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/_ji ltar na lus kyi rnam par shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/_ji ltar na yid kyi rnam par shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/_shes rab kyi pha

[\[273b.7\]]reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/_ji ltar na sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]

[\[274a.1\]]pa bsgom pa lags/_ji ltar na lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/_ji ltar na lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba

[\[279a.2\]]lags/_ji ltar na lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/_shes rab kyi pha [{]rold [,]rol [}]tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa bsgom pa lags/_ji ltar na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/_shes rab kyi 
[\[279a.3\]]pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/_ji ltar na bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spong ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags//_//shes 
[\[279a.4\]]rab kyi pha [{]rold [,]rol [}]tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa stong phrag brgya pa/_bam po bcu bdun pa/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab [{]'byord [,]'byor [}]'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la

[\[283a\]]
[\[283a.1\]]can la mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/dngos po'i 'du shes can la thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/dngos po'i 'du shes can la dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa

[\[283a.3\]]pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/dngos po'i 'du shes can la [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/dngos po'i 'du shes can la dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/dngos po'i 'du shes can la ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bsgom pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/

[\[287a.1\]]rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang yongs su shes pa [{]myed[,]med[}]/_bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spang ba yang yongs su shes pa [{]myed [,]med [}]na/_de thar bar 'gyur ba lta ga las 'ong /_gsol pa/_

[\[287b.1\]]'dus te reg pa'i 'du shes ni gnyis so/_/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i 'du shes ni gnyis so/_/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i 'du shes ni gnyis so/_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i 'du shes ni gnyis so/_/rna ba'i 'dus te

[\[292b.1\]]lam yongs su shes par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/_stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin yongs su shes par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ting nge 'dzin yongs su shes par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ting nge

[\[292b.3\]]dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzin yongs su shes par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/_rtog pa [{]myed [,]med [}]la dpyod pa tsam gyi ting nge 'dzin yongs su shes par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/_rtog pa [{]myed [,]med [}]cing dpyod pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ting nge 'dzin yongs su 
[\[292b.4\]]shes par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/_sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa yongs su shes par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/_kun 'byung ba 'phags pa'i bden pa yongs su shes par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/_'gog pa 'phags 
[\[292b.5\]]pa'i bden pa yongs su shes par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/_lam 'phags pa'i bden pa yongs su shes par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/_sdug bsngal shes pa yongs su shes par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/_kun 'byung ba shes

[\[292b.7\]]ga la yod/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]skye ba shes pa yongs su shes par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/_chos shes pa yongs su shes par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/_rjes su 'gro ba shes pa yongs su shes par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/_kun rdzob shes 
[\[293a\]]
[\[293a.1\]]pa yongs su shes par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/_'dris pa shes pa yongs su shes par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/_sgra ji bzhin shes pa yongs su shes par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs

[\[294a\]]
[\[294a.1\]]ba'i 'bras bu yang ga la yod/_phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu yang ga la yod/_dgra bcom pa nyid kyang ga la yod/_rang byang chub kyang ga la yod/_lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang ga la yod/_rnam pa thams cad

[\[296b\]]
[\[296b.1\]]thams cad dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid lags na/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pas/_chos thams cad dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid du mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur te/_/de dag mngon par rdzogs par

[\[297a\]]
[\[297a.1\]]gtan 'di dag dang /_bsam gtan gyi yan lag de dag gi mtshan ma bzung ste/_bsam gtan de dag gis bsnyems par ma gyur/_bsam gtan gyi ro myong bar ma gyur/_bsam gtan du [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]par ma 
[\[297a.2\]]gyur te/_de ltar na ngas bsam gtan de dag rnam pa yongs su dag pa la mnyam par bzhag go_/de ltar na ngas bsam gtan de dag rnam par smin par byas nas/_shes pa rnam pa tha dad pa mngon du bya ba'i phyir sems gzhol bar 
[\[297a.3\]]byas/_lha'i rna ba'i shes pa mngon du bya ba'i phyir sems gzhol bar byas/_pha rol gyi sems shes pa mngon du bya ba'i phyir sems gzhol bar byas/_sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa shes pa mngon du bya ba'i phyir sems gzhol 
[\[297a.4\]]bar byas/_lha'i [{]myig [,]mig [}]gi shes pa mngon du bya ba'i phyir sems gzhol bar byas/_'on kyang ngas mngon par shes pa mngon du bya ba de dag la mtshan mar bzung ste/_mngon par shes pa de dag gis shes par ma gyur/_ro myong bar ma gyur 
[\[297a.5\]{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]par ma gyur te/_mngon par shes pa lnga po de dag nam mkha' lta bur yang dag par rjes su dran pas mnyam par gzhag ste/_de ltar ngas skad cig gcig dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyis bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[297a.6\]]byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/_'di ni sdug bsngal lo/_/'di ni sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba'o/_/'di ni sdug bsngal 'gog pa'o/_/'di ni sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam mo/_/zhes bya bar 
[\[297a.7\]]yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su shes par gyur te/_de ltar nga de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang ldan par gyur/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhi dang ldan par gyur/_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang ldan par gyur/_byams 
[\[297b\]]
[\[297b.1\]]pa chen po dang ldan par gyur/_snying rje chen po dang ldan par gyur/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad dang ldan par gyur nas/_sems can rnams phung po gsum du lung bstan par gyur to/_/rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[297b.2\]]ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/_dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi bsam gtan bzhi bskyed par gyur/_ji ltar dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi mngon par shes pa drug bskyed 
[\[297b.3\]]par gyur/_ji ltar dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu bskyed par gyur/_ji ltar dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhi bskyed par gyur/_ji ltar dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid 
[\[297b.4\]]kyi so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi bskyed par gyur/_ji ltar dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi byams pa chen po bskyed par gyur/_ji ltar dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi snying rje chen po bskyed par gyur/_ji ltar dngos po ma 
[\[297b.5\]]mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad bskyed par gyur/_sems can rnams kyang sems can ma mchis par ji ltar phung po gsum du lung bstan par gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 
[\[297b.6\]]'byor gal te 'dod pa rnams dang sdig to [{]myi [,]mi [}]dge ba'i chos rnams la dngos po zhig yod de/_ngo bo nyid yod pa 'am/_gzhan gyi dngos po zhig yod na ni/_rab 'byor ngas sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/_'dod pa rnams 
[\[297b.7\]]dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid dang /_sdig to [{]myi [,]mi [}]dge ba'i chos rnams dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid du rig nas/_bsam gtan bzhi nye bar bsgrubs te gnas par yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur te/_rab 'byor 'di ltar 'dod pa rnams dang /_sdig 
[\[298a\]]
[\[298a.1\]]to [{]myi [,]mi [}]dge ba'i chos rnams la dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_rang gi dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_gzhan gyi dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/_gzhan du na dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pas/_rab 'byor de'i phyir nga sngon byang 
[\[298a.2\]]chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/_'dod pas dben sdig to [{]myi [,]mi [}]dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa rtog pa dang bcas pa dpyod pa dang bcas pa dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas par 
[\[298a.3\]]gyur to/_/rnam par rtog pa dang /_rnam par dpyod pa nye bar zhi nas/_nang yongs su dang ste/_sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas/_rtog pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dpyod pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang /_bde ba can bsam gtan 
[\[298a.4\]]gnyis pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas par gyur to/_/dga' ba las 'dod chags dang bral bas dran pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin du btang snyoms la gnas te/_bde ba lus kyis myong la 'phags pa rnams kyis dran pa dang ldan pa 
[\[298a.5\]]bde ba la rnam par spyod pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/_dga' ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas par gyur to/_/bde ba yang spangs/_sdug bsngal yang spangs shing /_yid bde ba dang /_
[\[298a.6\]]yid [{]myi [,]mi [}]bde ba snga nas nub pas/_bde ba yang [{]myed[,]med[}]/_sdug bsngal yang [{]myed [,]med [}]pa btang snyoms dang dran pas/_yongs su dag pa'i bsam gtan bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas par gyur to/_/rab 'byor gal te mngon par shes pa 
[\[298a.7\]]rnams la dngos po zhig yod de/_ngo bo nyid yod pa 'am/_rang gi dngos po yod pa 'am/_gzhan gyi dngos po zhig yod na ni/_rab 'byor ngas kyang mngon par shes pa thams cad dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid du rig nas/_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang 
[\[298b\]]
[\[298b.1\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur te/_rab 'byor 'di ltar mngon par shes pa rnams la dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]de/_ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa gzhan gyi dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/_gzhan du na dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i 
[\[298b.2\]]ngo bo nyid yin pas/_de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis mngon par shes pa thams cad dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid du thugs su chud de/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[298b.3\]]byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_chos thams cad dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid la 
[\[298b.4\]]bsam gtan bzhi dang /_mngon par shes pa lngas/_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya na/_bcom ldan 'das de ci'i slad du/_chos thams cad dngos po ma 
[\[298b.5\]]mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid la/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthar kyis spyod pa dang /_mthar kyis slob pa dang /_mthar kyis nan tan du bgyi ba gang gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[298b.6\]]byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba'i mthar kyis spyod pa dang /_mthar kyis slob pa dang /_mthar kyis nan tan du bgyi ba mchis par gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 
[\[298b.7\]]'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/_thog mar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag dang /_sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur ba'i dgra 
[\[299a\]]
[\[299a.1\]]bcom pa dag dang /_phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /_rgyun tu zhugs pa dag las/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po

[\[299b\]]
[\[299b.1\]]sems can dngos po'i 'du shes can la spyod pa thams cad dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa la rab tu dgod par bya'o snyam ste/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba'i phyir/_bla na 
[\[299b.2\]{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'jug ste/_mthar kyis spyod pa dang /_mthar kyis bslab pa dang /_mthar kyis nan tan du bya ba gang la bslabs shing /_sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[299b.3\]]po rnams bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur pa de lta bu'i mthar kyis spyod pa dang /_mthar kyis bslab pa dang /_mthar kyis nan tan du rtsom mo/_/de thog mar sbyin 
[\[299b.4\]]pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_pha rol

[\[299b.6\]]gtong ba de dag gi yang legs pa rjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod do/_/de sbyin pa des skyid pa chen po'i tshogs thob par 'gyur te/_skyon dang /_ser sna [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i sems kyis sbyin pa sbyin par bya ba dang /_sbyin pa yongs su 
[\[299b.7\]]gtong bar byed de/_zas 'dod pa la ni zas/_skom 'dod pa la ni skom/_bzhon pa 'dod pa la ni bzhon pa/_gos 'dod pa la ni gos/_spos 'dod pa la ni spos/_phreng ba 'dod pa la ni phreng ba/_byug pa 'dod pa la ni byug 
[\[300a\]]
[\[300a.1\]]pa/_mal ca 'dod pa la ni mal ca/_gnas 'dod pa la ni gnas/_mar [{]mye [,]me [}]'dod pa la ni mar me/_nor bu dang /_mu tig dang /_bai DUr+ya dang /_dung dang /_man shel dang /_byi ru dang /_gser dang /_dngul 
[\[300a.2\]]'dod pa rnams la ni/_nor bu dang /_mu tig dang /_bai DUr+ya dang /_dung dang /_man shel dang /_byi ru dang /_gser dang /_dngul yongs su gtong ba nas/[ {]myi'i [,]mi'i [}]yo byad gang ci yang rung ba dag kyang /_de dag la gtong ba'i bar du ste/_de 
[\[300a.3\]]sbyin pa de nyid kyis tshul khrims kyi phung po yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/lha'i che ba nyid rab tu thob par byed do/_/[{]myi'i [,]mi'i [}]che ba nyid rab tu thob par byed do/_/de sbyin pa dang tshul khrims de nyid kyis/_ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po rab tu thob 
[\[300a.4\]]par byed do/_/de sbyin pa dang tshul khrims dang /_ting nge 'dzin de nyid kyis/_shes rab kyi phung po rab tu thob par byed do/_/de sbyin pa dang /_tshul khrims dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_shes rab de nyid kyis/_rnam par grol ba'i phung po rab 
[\[300a.5\]]tu thob par byed do/_/de sbyin pa dang /_tshul khrims dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_shes rab dang /_rnam par grol ba de nyid kyis rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po rab tu thob par byed do/_/de sbyin pa dang /_tshul khrims dang /_ting nge 
[\[300a.6\]]'dzin dang /_shes rab dang /_rnam par grol ba dang /_rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba de nyid kyis/_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'das nas/_byang chub sems dpa'i skyon [{]myed [,]med [}]par 'jug go_/byang chub sems dpa'i

[\[300b\]]
[\[300b.1\]]'khor lo skor ro/_/chos kyi 'khor lo bskor nas/_sems can rnams theg pa gsum la so sor 'god cing /_'khor ba las yongs su grol bar byed do/_/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_
[\[300b.2\]]sbyin pas mthar kyis spyod pa yod pa yin te/_de thams cad kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar de la ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po 
[\[300b.3\]]bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/_bdag kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/_/gzhan yang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par skul lo/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i legs pa rjod do/_/gzhan

[\[300b.5\]]sems can rnams la nor byin zhing /_tshul khrims la rab tu 'god do/_/ting nge 'dzin la rab tu 'god do/_/shes rab la rab tu 'god do/_/rnam par grol ba la rab tu 'god do/_/rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba la rab tu 
[\[300b.6\]]'god do/_/de tshul khrims kyi phung po dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang /_shes rab kyi phung po dang /_rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang /_rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po des nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi sa 
[\[300b.7\]]las 'das nas/_tshul khrims kyi phung po dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang /_shes rab kyi phung po dang /_rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang /_rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po de nyid kyis/_byang chub sems 
[\[301a\]]
[\[301a.1\]]dpa'i skyon [{]myed [,]med [}]par 'jug go_/byang chub sems dpa'i skyon [{]myed [,]med [}]par zhugs nas/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byas/_sems can rnams yongs su smyin par byas nas/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa

[\[301a.3\]]rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyis mthar kyis spyod pa yod pa yin te/_de thams cad kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar de la ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/rab 'byor 
[\[301a.4\]]gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/_bdag kyang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/_/gzhan yang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par skul lo/_/bzod pa'i

[\[301a.7\]]tshul khrims kyi phung po dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang /_shes rab kyi phung po dang /_rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang /_rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po des/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'das nas/_
[\[301b\]]
[\[301b.1\]]tshul khrims kyi phung po dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang /_shes rab kyi phung po dang /_rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang /_rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po de nyid kyis/_byang chub sems dpa'i skyon [{]myed [,]med [}]par 'jug go/_/

[\[302a\]]
[\[302a.1\]]phung po dang /_rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang /_rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po des nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyis las 'das nas/_tshul khrims kyi phung po dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang /_

[\[302a.3\]]su dag par byas/_sems can rnams yongs su smin par byas nas/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas/_chos kyi 'khor lo skor ro/_/chos kyi 'khor lo bskor nas/_

[\[302a.6\]{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la mnyam par gzhog go_/gzhan yang tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la rab tu 'god do/_/tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa 
[\[302a.7\]]dang /_bsam gtan dang /_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi legs pa rjod do/_/gzhan tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la mnyam par gzhog pa de dag gi legs 
[\[302b\]]
[\[302b.1\]]pa rjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod do/_/de tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dag la gnas shing /_sems can rnams sbyin pas yongs su tshim par byed do/_/tshul khrims la rab tu 'god 
[\[302b.2\]]do/_/ting nge 'dzin la rab tu 'god do/_/shes rab la rab tu 'god do/_/rnam par grol ba la rab tu 'god do/_/rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba la rab tu 'god do/_/de tshul khrims kyi phung po dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang /_
[\[302b.3\]]shes rab kyi phung po dang /_rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang /_rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po des nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'das nas/_tshul khrims kyi phung po dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang /_shes 
[\[302b.4\]]rab kyi phung po dang /_rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang /_rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po de nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa'i skyon [{]myed [,]med [}]par 'jug go_/byang chub sems dpa'i skyon [{]myed [,]med [}]par zhugs nas/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs 
[\[302b.5\]]su dag par byas/_sems can rnams yongs su smin par byas nas/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas/_chos kyi 'khor lo skor ro/_/chos kyi 'khor lo bskor nas/_sems 
[\[302b.6\]]can rnams theg pa gsum la so sor 'god cing 'khor ba las yongs su grol bar byed do/_/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyis mthar kyis spyod pa yod pa yin te/_de thams cad kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]
[\[302b.7\]]su [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar de la ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_sems 
[\[303a\]]
[\[303a.1\]]can rnams sbyin pas yongs su tshim par byed do/_/tshul khrims la rab tu 'god do/_/ting nge 'dzin la rab tu 'god do/_/shes rab la rab tu 'god do/_/rnam par grol ba la rab tu 'god do/_/rnam par grol ba'i 
[\[303a.2\]]ye shes mthong ba la rab tu 'god do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_bdag kyang sbyin pa yongs su gtong ngo /_/tshul khrims srung ngo /_/bzod pa sgrub bo/_/brtson 'grus rtsom mo/_/bsam gtan la mnyam par gzhog go/_/
[\[303a.3\]]shes rab sgom mo/_/gzhan yang sbyin pa la rab tu gzhog go_/tshul khrims la rab tu gzhog go_/bzod pa la rab tu gzhog go_/brtson 'grus la rab tu gzhog go_/ting nge 'dzin la rab tu gzhog go_/shes rab la rab tu gzhog go/_sbyin 
[\[303a.4\]]pa'i legs pa rjod do/_/tshul khrims kyi legs pa rjod do/_/bzod pa'i legs pa rjod do/_/brtson 'grus kyi legs pa rjod do/_/bsam gtan gyi legs pa rjod do/_shes rab kyi legs pa rjod do/_/gang gzhan sbyin pa yongs su 
[\[303a.5\]]gtong ba dang /_tshul khrims srung ba dang /_bzod pa sgrub pa dang /_brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang /_bsam gtan la mnyam par gzhog pa dang /_shes rab sgom pa de dag gi yang legs pa rjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod do/_/de sbyin pa'i pha 
[\[303a.6\]]rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de dang thabs mkhas pas/_
[\[303a.7\]]nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'das nas/_byang chub sems dpa'i skyon [{]myed [,]med [}]par 'jug go_/byang chub sems dpa'i skyon [{]myed [,]med [}]par zhugs nas/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byas/_sems can rnams yongs su 
[\[303b\]]
[\[303b.1\]]smin par byas nas/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas/_chos kyi 'khor lo skor ro/_/chos kyi 'khor lo bskor nas/_sems can rnams theg pa gsum la so sor 'god cing 
[\[303b.2\]]'khor ba las yongs su grol bar byed do/_/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_/shes rab kyis mthar kyis spyod pa rtsom ste/_de thams cad kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar de la 
[\[303b.3\]]ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]do//_//shes rab kyi pha [{]rold [,]rol [}]tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa stong phrag brgya pa/_bam po [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad pa//_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_/mthar kyis spyad pa dang /_
[\[303b.4\]]mthar kyis bslab pa dang /_mthar kyis 'jug pa la slob ste/_de sems dang po bskyed pa nyid kyi tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/_chos thams cad dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid rtogs par byed de/_de 
[\[303b.5\]]sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa sgom mo/_/chos rjes su dran pa sgom mo/_/dge 'dun rjes su dran pa sgom mo/_/tshul khrims rjes su dran pa sgom mo/_/gtong ba rjes su dran pa sgom mo/_/lha rjes su dran pa sgom mo/_/rab 'byor ji ltar 
[\[303b.6\]]na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa sgom pa yin zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs 
[\[303b.7\]]rgyas gzugs su yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_tshor bar yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_'du shes su yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_'du byed du yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_rnam par shes par yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_/de ni 'di ltar gzugs la ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]de/_
[\[304a\]]
[\[304a.1\]]gang la ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa de ni/_dngos po med pa'o/_/tshor ba la ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]de/_gang la ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa de ni/_dngos po med pa'o/_/'du shes la ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]de/_gang la ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa de ni/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]
[\[304a.2\]]pa'o/_/'du byed la ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]de/_gang la ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa de ni/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/rnam par shes pa la ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]de/_gang la ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa de ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pas ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dran par [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[304a.3\]]nus te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_dran pa [{]myed [,]med [}]cing yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ni/_sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa sgom na/_de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[304a.4\]]dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas [{]myi [,]mi [}]chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_sku gser gyi kha dog gis yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_'od 'dom gang bas yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus yid la 
[\[304a.5\]{]myi [,]mi [}]byed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar [{]myi [,]mi [}]chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis la ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]de/_gang la ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa de ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/sku gser gyi kha dog la ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]de/_gang la ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa de ni 
[\[304a.6\]]dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/'od 'dam gang ba la ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]de/_gang la ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa de ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu la ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]de/_gang la ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa de ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pas 
[\[304a.7\]]ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dran par [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_dran pa [{]myed [,]med [}]cing yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ni sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa sgom 
[\[304b\]]
[\[304b.1\]]na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshul khrims kyi phung por yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_ting nge 'dzin kyi phung por yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_shes rab kyi phung por yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_rnam par grol ba'i phung 
[\[304b.2\]]por yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs par yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed de/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar tshul khrims kyi phung po la ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_gang la ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa de ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po 
[\[304b.3\]]la ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]de/_gang la ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa de ni dngos po med pa'o/_/shes rab kyi phung po la ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]de/_gang la ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa de ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/rnam par grol ba'i phung po la ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]de/_gang la ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa de 
[\[304b.4\]]ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa'i phung po la ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]de/_gang la ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa de ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pas ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dran par [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_dran pa 
[\[304b.5\]{]myed [,]med [}]cing yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ni sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa bsgom na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[304b.6\]]pa'i sangs rgyas de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcus yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhis yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhis yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_byams pa chen pos yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_snying rje chen pos yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_
[\[304b.7\]]sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad kyis yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed de/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]de/_gang la ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa de dag ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhi 
[\[305a\]]
[\[305a.1\]]la ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]de/_gang la ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa de dag ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]de/_gang la ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa de dag ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/byams pa chen po la ngo bo nyid

[\[305a.3\]]pa de dag ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pas ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dran par [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_dran pa [{]myed [,]med [}]cing yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ni/_sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'

[\[305a.7\]]ltar na mthar kyis spyad pa dang /_mthar kyis bslab pa dang /_mthar kyis 'jug pa'i lam yod pa yin te/_de mthar kyis spyad pa la slob cing /_mthar kyis bslab pa dang /_mthar kyis 'jug pa'i lam la slob pas/_dngos 
[\[305b\]]
[\[305b.1\]]po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi 
[\[305b.2\]]tshul gyis/_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_bsam 
[\[305b.3\]]gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_nang stong pa nyid yongs su 
[\[305b.4\]]rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_phyi stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo 
[\[305b.5\]]nyid kyi tshul gyis/_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_chen po stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_don dam pa stong pa nyid 
[\[305b.6\]]yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed

[\[306a\]]
[\[306a.1\]]dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po 
[\[306a.2\]{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi 
[\[306a.3\]]tshul gyis/[ {]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_ngo bo nyid stong

[\[306a.5\]]rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_yang dag par spong ba rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed 
[\[306a.6\]]do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_dbang po rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_stobs rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul 
[\[306a.7\]]gyis/_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul 
[\[306b\]]
[\[306b.1\]]gyis/_'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_bsam gtan rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams 
[\[306b.2\]]yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_rnam par thar pa brgyad 
[\[306b.3\]]yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 
[\[306b.4\]]'dzin yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ting nge 'dzin yongs su 
[\[306b.5\]]rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_ting nge 'dzin rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]
[\[306b.6\]]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis 
[\[306b.7\]{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_byams pa chen po yongs su 
[\[307a\]]
[\[307a.1\]]rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad yongs su 
[\[307a.2\]]rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_thams cad shes pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/
[\[307a.3\]]dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/de ni chos thams cad dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ste/_de la dngos po yod par 
[\[307a.4\]]'du shes pa'am/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]par 'du shes pa yang [{]myed [,]med [}]na/_dran pa'i las rdul tsam yang yod pa'am/_dran pa dang bral bar 'gyur ba lta ci zhig smos/_rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_chos rjes su dran pa sgom pa 
[\[307a.5\]]yin zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/_chos 
[\[307a.6\]]thams cad dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid du rtogs par byas nas/_chos rjes su dran pa sgom na/_dge ba'i chos yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]dge ba'i chos yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_'jig rten pa'i chos yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos 
[\[307a.7\]]yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_zang zing dang bcas pa'i chos yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_zang zing [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i chos yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_'phags pa'i chos yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_'phags pa ma yin pa'i chos yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed 
[\[307b\]]
[\[307b.1\]]zag pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i chos yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_'dod pa'i khams su gtogs pa'i chos yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_gzugs kyi khams su gtogs pa'i chos yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i khams su gtogs pa'i chos yid la mi byed/_'dus 
[\[307b.2\]]byas kyi chos yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_'dus ma byas kyi chos yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar chos de dag la ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]de/_gang la ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa de dag ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pas ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dran par [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[307b.3\]]nus te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar dran pa [{]myed [,]med [}]cing yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ni/_chos rjes su dran pa'o/_/rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_chos thams cad dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid la/_shes rab kyi 
[\[307b.4\]]pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/_chos rjes su dran pa bsgom par bya ste/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthar kyis spyad pa dang /_mthar kyis bslab pa dang /_mthar kyis 'jug pa'i lam yod pa yin te/_
[\[307b.5\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de mthar kyis spyad pa la slob cing /_mthar kyis bslab pa dang /_mthar kyis 'jug pa'i lam la slob pas/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 
[\[307b.6\]]rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/
[\[307b.7\]]dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po 
[\[308a\]]
[\[308a.1\]{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid

[\[308a.3\]]rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_chen po stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]

[\[308a.7\]]dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/[ {]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo 
[\[308b\]]
[\[308b.1\]]nyid kyi tshul gyis/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]

[\[308b.3\]]rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_dbang po rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed

[\[309a\]]
[\[309a.1\]]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_

[\[309a.6\]]rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_thams cad shes pa nyid 
[\[309a.7\]]yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su 
[\[309b\]]
[\[309b.1\]]rdzogs par byed do/_/de ni chos thams cad dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/_de la dngos po yod par 'du shes pa'am/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]par 'du shes pa yang [{]myed [,]med [}]na/_dran pa'i las rdul tsam yang 
[\[309b.2\]]yod pa'am/_dran pa dang bral bar 'gyur ba lta ci zhig smos/_rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_dge 'dun rjes su dran pa sgom pa yin zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[309b.3\]]chen po/_sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/_chos thams cad dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid du rtogs par byas nas/_
[\[309b.4\]]dge 'dun rjes su dran pa sgom ste/_bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos kyi dge 'dun tshul khrims dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_shes rab dang /_rnam par grol ba dang /_rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba phun sum tshogs pa'i skyes bu zung bzhi dang /_
[\[309b.5\]]skyes bu gang zag brgyad po de dag dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid du yid la byed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar de dag la ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]de/_gang la ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa de dag ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pas ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dran 
[\[309b.6\]]par [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar dran pa [{]myed [,]med [}]cing yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ni/_dge 'dun rjes su dran pa'o/_/rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_chos thams cad dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid la/_
[\[309b.7\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/_dge 'dun rjes su dran pa sgom par bya ste/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mthar kyis spyad pa yod pa yin/_mthar kyis bslab pa yod pa yin/_mthar 
[\[310a\]]
[\[310a.1\]]kyis 'jug pa'i lam yod pa yin te/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de mthar kyis spyod pa la slob cing /_mthar kyis bslab pa dang /_mthar kyis 'jug pa'i lam la slob pas/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]
[\[310a.2\]]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi 
[\[310a.3\]]tshul gyis/_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_

[\[310a.5\]]yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_phyi stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]
[\[310a.6\]]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_chen po stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_don dam 
[\[310a.7\]]pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 
[\[310b\]]
[\[310b.1\]]byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]
[\[310b.2\]]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_chos 
[\[310b.3\]]thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/[ {]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid yongs 
[\[310b.4\]]su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po 
[\[310b.5\]{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i
