[\[311a\]]
[\[311a.1\]]su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_'phags pa'i bden pa 
[\[311a.2\]]rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_bsam gtan rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/
[\[311a.3\]]dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_rnam par thar pa brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po 
[\[311a.4\]{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]
[\[311a.5\]]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul 
[\[311a.6\]]gyis/_mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_ting nge 'dzin rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_gzungs kyi sgo rnams 
[\[311a.7\]]yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs 
[\[311b\]]
[\[311b.1\]]par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_byams pa chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo 
[\[311b.2\]]bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_
[\[311b.3\]]thams cad shes pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs 
[\[311b.4\]]su rdzogs par byed do/_/de ni chos thams cad dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/_de la dngos po yod par 'du shes pa'am/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]par 'du shes pa yang [{]myed [,]med [}]na/_dran pa'i las rdul tsam 
[\[311b.5\]]yang yod pa'am/_dran pa dang bral bar 'gyur ba lta ci zhig smos/_rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_tshul khrims rjes su dran pa sgom pa yin zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[311b.6\]]dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa yid la bya bas/_chos thams cad dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid du rtogs par byas nas/_
[\[311b.7\]]tshul khrims rjes su dran pa sgom zhing /_ma ral ba/_ma zhig pa/_ma 'dres pa/_skyon [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_ma nyams pa/_mthu dang ldan pa/_mkhas pas bsngags pa/_shin tu rdzogs pa/_ting nge 'dzin yongs su sgrub pa'i tshul khrims la gnas pa 
[\[312a\]]
[\[312a.1\]]yin te/_de tshul khrims de dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid du yid la byed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar de la ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]de/_gang la ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa de ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pas ni dngos po med 
[\[312a.2\]]pa/_dran par [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar dran pa [{]myed [,]med [}]cing yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ni tshul khrims rjes su dran pa'o/_/rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_chos thams cad dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid 
[\[312a.3\]]la/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/_tshul khrims rjes su dran pa bsgom par bya ste/_rab 'byor de ltar na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mthar kyis spyad pa yod pa yin/_mthar kyis bslab pa yod 
[\[312a.4\]]pa yin/_mthar kyis slob pa'i lam yod pa yin te/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de mthar kyis spyad pa la slob cing /_mthar kyis bslab pa dang /_mthar kyis 'jug pa'i lam la slob pas/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i 
[\[312a.5\]]ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi 
[\[312a.6\]]tshul gyis/_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_
[\[312a.7\]]bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_nang stong pa 
[\[312b\]]
[\[312b.1\]]nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_phyi stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po 
[\[312b.2\]{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_chen po stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_don 
[\[312b.3\]]dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs 
[\[312b.4\]]su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs 
[\[312b.5\]]par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo 
[\[312b.6\]]nyid kyi tshul gyis/_chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[312b.7\]{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 
[\[313a\]]
[\[313a.1\]]yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_dran pa nye bar 
[\[313a.2\]]gzhag pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_yang dag par spong ba rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yongs 
[\[313a.3\]]su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_dbang po rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_stobs rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]
[\[313a.4\]]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i 
[\[313a.5\]]ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_bsam gtan rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_
[\[313a.6\]]tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_rnam par thar 
[\[313a.7\]]pa brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_stong pa nyid 
[\[313b\]]
[\[313b.1\]]kyi ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ting nge 'dzin yongs 
[\[313b.2\]]su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_ting nge 'dzin rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po 
[\[313b.3\]{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi 
[\[313b.4\]]tshul gyis/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_byams pa chen 
[\[313b.5\]]po yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad yongs su rdzogs 
[\[313b.6\]]par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_thams cad shes pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po 
[\[313b.7\]{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/de ni chos thams cad dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/_de la dngos po yod par 'du shes 
[\[314a\]]
[\[314a.1\]]pa 'am/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]par 'du shes pa yang [{]myed [,]med [}]na/_dran pa'i las rdul tsam yang yod pa 'am/_dran pa dang bral bar 'gyur ba lta ci zhig smos/_rab 'byor ji ltar na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gtong 
[\[314a.2\]]ba rjes su dran pa sgom pa yin zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i 
[\[314a.3\]]yid la bya bas/_chos thams cad dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid du rtogs par byas nas/_gtong ba rjes su dran pa sgom zhing /_gang zang zing gtong ba dang /_chos gtong ba yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed de/_de yan lag dang /_nying lag kyang yongs su gtong na/_
[\[314a.4\]]dngos po gzhan lta ci zhig smos/_de ltar sbyin pa yongs su gtong yang /_'di ltar bdag ni sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'o/_/dngos po 'di gtang ba'o/_/'di la gtang bar bya'o/_/snyam du mi sems so/_/
[\[314a.5\]]de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar dngos po de dag la ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]de/_gang la ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa de dag ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pas ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dran par [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar dran pa [{]myed [,]med [}]cing 
[\[314a.6\]]yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ni/_gtong ba rjes su dran pa'o/_/rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_chos thams cad dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid la/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/_gtong ba rjes su dran pa 
[\[314a.7\]]bsgom par bya ste/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mthar kyis spyad pa yod pa yin/_mthar kyis bslab pa yod pa yin/_mthar kyis 'jug pa'i lam yod pa yin te/_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[314b\]]
[\[314b.1\]]sems dpa' chen po/_de mthar kyis spyad pa la slob cing /_mthar kyis bslab pa dang /_mthar kyis 'jug pa'i lam la slob pas/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/
[\[314b.2\]]dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo 
[\[314b.3\]]nyid kyi tshul gyis/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo 
[\[314b.4\]]nyid kyi tshul gyis/_shes rab kyi pha [{]rold [,]rol [}]tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_phyi stong pa nyid yongs 
[\[314b.5\]]su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]
[\[314b.6\]]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_chen po stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_'dus 
[\[314b.7\]]byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa 
[\[315a\]]
[\[315a.1\]]nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa 
[\[315a.2\]]nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 
[\[315a.3\]]byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/[ {]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po 
[\[315a.4\]{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul 
[\[315a.5\]]gyis/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_
[\[315a.6\]]yang dag par spong ba rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_dbang po rnams yongs 
[\[315a.7\]]su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_stobs rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/
[\[315b\]]
[\[315b.1\]]dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po 
[\[315b.2\]{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_bsam gtan rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]
[\[315b.3\]]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_rnam par thar pa brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_mthar gyis gnas pa'i 
[\[315b.4\]]snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ting nge 
[\[315b.5\]]'dzin yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su 
[\[315b.6\]]rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_ting nge 'dzin rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po 
[\[315b.7\]{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo 
[\[316a\]]
[\[316a.1\]]nyid kyi tshul gyis/_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_byams pa chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi 
[\[316a.2\]]tshul gyis/_snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_thams 
[\[316a.3\]]cad shes pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 
[\[316a.4\]]yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/de ni chos thams cad dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/_de la dngos po yod par 'du shes pa 'am/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]par 'du shes pa yang [{]myed [,]med [}]na/_dran 
[\[316a.5\]]pa'i las rdul tsam yang yod pa 'am/_dran pa dang bral bar 'gyur ba lta ci zhig smos/_rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lha rjes su dran pa sgom pa yin zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[316a.6\]]sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/_chos thams cad dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid du 
[\[316a.7\]]rtogs par byas nas/_lha rjes su dran pa sgom ste/_rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lhar skyes pa dang /_sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lhar skyes pa dang /_mtshe ma'i lhar skyes pa dang /_dga' ldan gyi lhar skyes pa dang /_'phrul dga'i lhar skyes pa dang /_
[\[316b\]]
[\[316b.1\]]gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lhar skyes pa'i lha dag dang /_gzugs na spyod pa dang /_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa na spyod pa'i phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba de dag dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis yid la byed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar de dag la 
[\[316b.2\]]ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]de/_gang la ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa de dag ni/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pas ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dran par [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar dran pa [{]myed [,]med [}]cing /_yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ni/_lha rjes su dran pa'o/_/
[\[316b.3\]]rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_chos thams cad dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid la/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/_lha rjes su dran pa sgom par bya ste/_rab 'byor de ltar na/_byang chub sems 
[\[316b.4\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mthar kyis spyad pa yod pa yin/_mthar kyis bslab pa yod pa yin/_mthar kyis 'jug pa'i lam yod pa yin te/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de mthar kyis spyad pa la slob cing /_
[\[316b.5\]]mthar kyis bslab pa dang /_mthar kyis 'jug pa'i lam la slob pas/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_tshul khrims

[\[316b.7\]]tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[317a\]]
[\[317a.1\]]yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_phyi stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/

[\[317a.7\]]gyis/_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/[ {]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_dngos po 
[\[317b\]]
[\[317b.1\]]med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa 
[\[317b.2\]]nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_yang dag par spong ba rnams yongs su 
[\[317b.3\]]rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_dbang po rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po

[\[318a\]]
[\[318a.1\]]par 'jug pa dgu yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_mtshan

[\[318a.3\]]rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_ting nge 'dzin rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su rdzogs par 
[\[318a.4\]]byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/

[\[318b\]]
[\[318b.1\]]rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/de ni chos thams cad dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/_de la dngos po yod par 'du shes pa 'am/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]
[\[318b.2\]]par 'du shes pa yang [{]myed [,]med [}]na/_dran pa'i las rdul tsam yang yod pa 'am/_dran pa dang bral bar 'gyur ba lta ci zhig smos/_rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_/sems dang po bskyed pa nas 
[\[318b.3\]]nye bar bzung ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_mthar kyis spyad pa dang /_mthar kyis bslab pa dang /[ {]mthard [,]mthar [}]kyis 'jug pa'i lam yongs su rdzogs par bya bar 'dod pas/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 
[\[318b.4\]]dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par 
[\[318b.5\]]bya'o/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]

[\[318b.7\]]gyis/_nang stong pa nyid la bslab par bya'o/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_phyi stong pa nyid la bslab par bya'o/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_phyi nang stong pa nyid la bslab par bya'o/_/
[\[319a\]]
[\[319a.1\]]dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la bslab par bya'o/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_chen po stong pa nyid la bslab par bya'o/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_
[\[319a.2\]]don dam pa stong pa nyid la bslab par bya'o/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_'dus byas stong pa nyid la bslab par bya'o/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la 
[\[319a.3\]]bslab par bya'o/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la bslab par bya'o/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid la bslab par bya'o/_/
[\[319a.4\]]dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid la bslab par bya'o/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid la bslab par bya'o/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul 
[\[319a.5\]]gyis/_chos thams cad stong pa nyid la bslab par bya'o/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la bslab par bya'o/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/[ {]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa 
[\[319a.6\]]stong pa nyid la bslab par bya'o/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid la bslab par bya'o/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la bslab par bya'o/_/dngos 
[\[319a.7\]]po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la bslab par bya'o/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la bslab par bya'o/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo 
[\[319b\]]
[\[319b.1\]]nyid kyi tshul gyis/_yang dag par spong ba rnams la bslab par bya'o/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_rdzu 'phrul [(]gyi [,]kyi [)]rkang pa rnams la bslab par bya'o/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_/dbang 
[\[319b.2\]]po rnams la bslab par bya'o/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_stobs rnams la bslab par bya'o/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la bslab par bya'o/_/dngos 
[\[319b.3\]]po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_lam la bslab par bya'o/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la bslab par bya'o/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_bsam 
[\[319b.4\]]gtan rnams la bslab par bya'o/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams la bslab par bya'o/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la 
[\[319b.5\]]bslab par bya'o/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_rnam par thar pa rnams la bslab par bya'o/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la 
[\[319b.6\]]bslab par bya'o/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la bslab par bya'o/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ting nge 'dzin la bslab par bya'o/_/
[\[319b.7\]]dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ting nge 'dzin la bslab par bya'o/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_mngon par shes pa rnams la bslab par bya'o/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid 
[\[320a\]]
[\[320a.1\]]kyi tshul gyis/_ting nge 'dzin rnams la bslab par bya'o/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_gzungs kyi sgo rnams la bslab par bya'o/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_de bzhin 
[\[320a.2\]]gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la bslab par bya'o/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhi la bslab par bya'o/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la 
[\[320a.3\]]bslab par bya'o/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_byams pa chen po la bslab par bya'o/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_snying rje chen po la bslab par bya'o/_/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul 
[\[320a.4\]]gyis/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad la bslab par bya'o/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_thams cad shes pa nyid la bslab par bya'o/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_lam gyi 
[\[320a.5\]]rnam pa shes pa nyid la bslab par bya'o/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la bslab par bya'o/_/rab 'byor de ltar na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_
[\[320a.6\]]chos thams cad dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid la slob pa'i mthar kyis spyad pa yod pa yin/_mthar kyis bslab pa yod pa yin/_mthar kyis 'jug pa'i lam yod pa yin te/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[320a.7\]]chen po/_de mthar kyis spyad pa dang /_mthar kyis bslab pa dang /_mthar kyis 'jug pa'i lam la slob pas/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed 
[\[320b\]]
[\[320b.1\]]do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/
[\[320b.2\]]dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos 
[\[320b.3\]]po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul

[\[320b.5\]]yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_chen po stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 
[\[320b.6\]]byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/
[\[320b.7\]]dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/
[\[321a\]]
[\[321a.1\]]dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/

[\[321a.3\]]po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/[ {]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i 
[\[321a.4\]]ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid

[\[321a.7\]]stobs rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_'phags pa'i lam 
[\[321b\]]
[\[321b.1\]]yan lag brgyad pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_bsam gtan 
[\[321b.2\]]rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 
[\[321b.3\]]'jug pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_rnam par thar pa brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_mthar kyis gnas pa'i 
[\[321b.4\]]snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i 
[\[321b.5\]]ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_mngon par shes pa rnams 
[\[321b.6\]]yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_ting nge 'dzin rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/

[\[322a\]]
[\[322a.1\]]po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_byams pa chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po 
[\[322a.2\]{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]
[\[322a.3\]]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_thams cad shes pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo 
[\[322a.4\]]bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/de ni chos thams cad dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/_de la dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang [{]myed [,]med [}]
[\[322a.5\]]na/_gzugs sam/_tshor ba 'am/_'du shes sam/_'du byed dam/_rnam par shes pa 'am/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gam/_rna ba 'am/_sna 'am/_lce 'am/_lus sam/_yid dam/_gzugs sam/_sgra 'am/_dri 'am/_ro 'am/_reg 
[\[322a.6\]]gam/_chos sam/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi rnam par shes pa 'am/_rna ba'i rnam par shes pa 'am/_sna'i rnam par shes pa 'am/_lce'i rnam par shes pa 'am/_lus kyi rnam par shes pa 'am/_yid kyi rnam par shes pa 'am/_
[\[322a.7\]{]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa 'am/_rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa 'am/_sna'i 'dus te reg pa 'am/_lce'i 'dus te reg pa 'am/_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa 'am/_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa 'am/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis 
[\[322b\]]
[\[322b.1\]]tshor ba 'am/_rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba 'am/_sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba 'am/_lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba 'am/_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba 'am/_yid 
[\[322b.2\]]kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba 'am/_sa'i khams sam/_chu'i khams sam/[ {]mye'i [,]me'i [}]khams sam/_rlung gi khams sam/_nam mkha'i khams sam/_rnam par shes pa'i khams sam/_ma rig pa 'am/_'du byed 
[\[322b.3\]]dam/_rnam par shes pa'am/[ {]mying [,]ming [}]dang gzugs sam/_skye mched drug gam/_reg pa 'am/_tshor ba 'am/_sred pa 'am/_len pa 'am/_srid pa 'am/_skye ba 'am/_rga shi 'am/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa 'am/_tshul 
[\[322b.4\]]khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/_shes rab kyi pha [{]rold [,]rol [}]tu phyin pa 'am/_nang stong pa nyid dam/_phyi stong pa 
[\[322b.5\]]nyid dam/_phyi nang stong pa nyid dam/_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dam/_chen po stong pa nyid dam/_don dam pa stong pa nyid dam/_'dus byas stong pa nyid dam/_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dam/_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dam/_thog ma 
[\[322b.6\]]dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dam/_dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dam/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid dam/_chos thams cad stong pa nyid dam/_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dam/[ {]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid dam/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa 
[\[322b.7\]]nyid dam/_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dam/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dam/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sam/_yang dag par spong ba rnams sam/_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sam/_dbang po rnams 
[\[323a\]]
[\[323a.1\]]sam/_stobs rnams sam/_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sam/_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'am/_'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sam/_bsam gtan rnams sam/_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams sam/_
[\[323a.2\]]gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/_rnam par thar pa rnams sam/_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dam/_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa 'am/_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa 
[\[323a.3\]]'am/_mngon par shes pa rnams sam/_ting nge 'dzin rnams sam/_gzungs kyi sgo rnams sam/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sam/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa rnams sam/_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sam/_byams 
[\[323a.4\]]pa chen po 'am/_snying rje chen po 'am/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa 'am/_thams cad shes pa nyid dam/_lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dam/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod par 'gyur ba 'am/_rnam pa thams cad 
[\[323a.5\]]mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes yod par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod de/_de ni gnas [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te 
[\[323a.6\]]de ltar chos thams cad dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid lags na/_'o na ni gzugs kyang ma mchis/_tshor ba yang ma mchis/_'du shes kyang ma mchis/_'du byed kyang ma mchis/_rnam par shes pa yang ma mchis/_khams 
[\[323a.7\]]rnams kyang ma mchis/_skye mched rnams kyang ma mchis/_rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba yang ma mchis/_rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i yan lag rnams kyang ma mchis/_pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyang ma mchis/_stong pa nyid 
[\[323b\]]
[\[323b.1\]]thams cad kyang ma mchis/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyang ma mchis/_yang dag par spong ba rnams kyang ma mchis/_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyang ma mchis/_dbang po rnams kyang ma mchis/_stobs rnams kyang ma mchis/_
[\[323b.2\]]byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyang ma mchis/_lam yang ma mchis/_'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyang ma mchis/_bsam gtan rnams kyang ma mchis/_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams kyang ma mchis/_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 
[\[323b.3\]]'jug pa rnams kyang ma mchis/_rnam par thar pa rnams kyang ma mchis/_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang ma mchis/_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa 
[\[323b.4\]]yang ma mchis/_mngon par shes pa rnams kyang ma mchis/_ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang ma mchis/_gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang ma mchis/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyang ma mchis/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa rnams kyang ma 
[\[323b.5\]]mchis/_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyang ma mchis/_byams pa chen po yang ma mchis/_snying rje chen po yang ma mchis/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyang ma mchis/_thams cad shes pa nyid kyi ye shes 
[\[323b.6\]]kyang ma mchis/_lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi ye shes kyang ma mchis/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes kyang ma mchis/_sangs rgyas kyang ma mchis/_chos kyang ma mchis/_dge 'dun yang ma mchis/_lam yang 
[\[323b.7\]]ma mchis/_'bras bu yang ma mchis/_nyon mongs pa yang ma mchis/_rnam par byang ba yang ma mchis/_'thob pa yang ma mchis/_mngon par rtogs pa yang ma mchis/_chos thams cad kyang ma mchis pa lags sam/_bcom 
[\[324a\]]
[\[324a.1\]]ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_chos thams cad dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid la yod pa 'am/[ {]myed [,]med [}]pa zhig [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su yod snyam mam/_rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/_
[\[324a.2\]]bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags te/_chos thams cad dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid la mchis pa 'am/_ma mchis pa [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'o na ci'i phyir/_khyod de 
[\[324a.3\]]ltar gal te chos thams cad dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid yin na/_gzugs kyang [{]myed[,]med[}]/_tshor ba yang [{]myed[,]med[}]/_'du shes kyang [{]myed[,]med[}]/_'du byed kyang [{]myed[,]med[}]/_rnam par shes pa yang [{]myed[,]med[}]/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]kyang [{]myed[,]med[}]/_rna ba yang [{]myed[,]med[}]/_sna yang 
[\[324a.4\]{]myed[,]med[}]/_lce yang [{]myed[,]med[}]/_lus kyang [{]myed[,]med[}]/_yid kyang [{]myed[,]med[}]/_gzugs kyang [{]myed[,]med[}]/_sgra yang med/_dri yang [{]myed[,]med[}]/_ro yang [{]myed[,]med[}]/_reg kyang [{]myed[,]med[}]/_chos kyang [{]myed[,]med[}]/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi rnam par shes pa yang [{]myed[,]med[}]/_rna ba'i rnam par shes pa yang 
[\[324a.5\]{]myed[,]med[}]/_sna'i rnam par shes pa yang [{]myed[,]med[}]/_lce'i rnam par shes pa yang [{]myed[,]med[}]/_lus kyi rnam par shes pa yang [{]myed[,]med[}]/_yid kyi rnam par shes pa yang [{]myed[,]med[}]/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa yang [{]myed[,]med[}]/_rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa yang 
[\[324a.6\]{]myed[,]med[}]/_sna'i 'dus te reg pa yang [{]myed[,]med[}]/_lce'i 'dus te reg pa yang med/_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa yang [{]myed[,]med[}]/_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yang [{]myed[,]med[}]/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yang [{]myed[,]med[}]/_rna ba'i 'dus te 
[\[324a.7\]]reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yang [{]myed[,]med[}]/_sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yang [{]myed[,]med[}]/_lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yang [{]myed[,]med[}]/_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yang [{]myed[,]med[}]/_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i 
[\[324b\]]
[\[324b.1\]]rkyen gyis tshor ba yang [{]myed[,]med[}]/_sa'i khams kyang [{]myed[,]med[}]/_chu'i khams kyang [{]myed[,]med[}]/[ {]mye'i [,]me'i [}]khams kyang [{]myed[,]med[}]/_rlung gi khams kyang [{]myed[,]med[}]/_nam mkha'i khams kyang [{]myed[,]med[}]/_rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang [{]myed[,]med[}]/_ma rig pa yang [{]myed[,]med[}]/_'du byed kyang 
[\[324b.2\]{]myed[,]med[}]/_rnam par shes pa yang [{]myed[,]med[}]/[ {]mying [,]ming [}]dang gzugs kyang [{]myed[,]med[}]/_skye mched drug kyang [{]myed[,]med[}]/_reg pa yang [{]myed[,]med[}]/_tshor ba yang [{]myed[,]med[}]/_sred pa yang [{]myed[,]med[}]/_len pa yang [{]myed[,]med[}]/_srid pa yang [{]myed[,]med[}]/_skye ba yang [{]myed[,]med[}]/_rga shi yang [{]myed[,]med[}]/_sbyin pa'i pha 
[\[324b.3\]]rol tu phyin pa yang [{]myed[,]med[}]/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang [{]myed[,]med[}]/_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang [{]myed[,]med[}]/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang [{]myed[,]med[}]/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang [{]myed[,]med[}]/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]
[\[324b.4\]]pa yang [{]myed[,]med[}]/_nang stong pa nyid kyang [{]myed[,]med[}]/_phyi stong pa nyid kyang [{]myed[,]med[}]/_phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang [{]myed[,]med[}]/_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang [{]myed[,]med[}]/_chen po stong pa nyid kyang [{]myed[,]med[}]/_don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang [{]myed[,]med[}]/_'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang [{]myed[,]med[}]/_'dus ma

[\[325a\]]
[\[325a.1\]]bsam gtan rnams kyang [{]myed[,]med[}]/_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams kyang [{]myed[,]med[}]/_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang [{]myed[,]med[}]/_rnam par thar pa rnams kyang [{]myed[,]med[}]/_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams

[\[325a.5\]{]myed[,]med[}]/_nyon mongs pa yang [{]myed[,]med[}]/_rnam par byang ba yang [{]myed[,]med[}]/_'thob pa yang [{]myed[,]med[}]/_mngon par rtogs pa yang [{]myed[,]med[}]/_chos thams cad kyang [{]myed [,]med [}]do zhes bya bar sems par gyur/_rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[325a.6\]]bdag ni chos 'di dag la nem nur yang ma mchis/_the tsom yang ma mchis te/_'on kyang bcom ldan 'das ma byung ba'i dus na/_dge slong nyan thos kyi theg pa pa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa 'am/_byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa 
[\[325a.7\]]dag 'di skad du gal te chos thams cad dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid yin na/_chos thams cad ngo bo nyid dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa la su zhig kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am/_rnam par byang bar 'gyur zhes mchi zhing /_de dag kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /_
[\[325b\]]
[\[325b.1\]]rnam par byang ba ma 'tshal bas/_tshul khrims log par 'gyur/_lta ba log par 'gyur/_spyod pa log par 'gyur/_'tsho ba log par 'gyur te/_tshul khrims log par gyur pa dang /_lta ba log par gyur pa dang /_spyod pa log 
[\[325b.2\]]par gyur pa dang /_'tsho ba log par gyur pa de dag sems can dmyal ba 'am/_byol song gi skye gnas sam/_gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi ngan song gsum las gcig tu mchi bar 'gyur te/_bcom ldan 'das bdag gis ma byung ba'i 
[\[325b.3\]]'jigs pa de mthong nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la don de zhus pa lags kyi/_bcom ldan 'das bdag ni chos 'di la nem nur ram/_the tsom ma mchis so/_/bcom ldan 
[\[325b.4\]]'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de legs so legs so/_/de de bzhin te/_ji skad du smras pa de bzhin no/_/shes rab kyi pha [{]rold [,]rol [}]tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa stong phrag brgya pa las/_le'u drug cu'o//_//
[\[325b.5\]]shes rab kyi pha [{]rold [,]rol [}]tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa stong phrag brgya pa/_bam po bcu dgu pa/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab [{]'byord [,]'byor [}]kyis/_bcom ldan 'das la yang 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te chos thams cad 
[\[325b.6\]]dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid lags na/_don ci zhig mthong zhing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can rnams kyi don gyi slad du/_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'jug pa lags/_/
[\[325b.7\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor ji ltar chos thams cad dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pa de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'jug

[\[326a.1\]]ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa ni rgya chung ba ste/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i 'du shes can la thob pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/mngon par rtogs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/gsol

[\[326a.3\]]dbyings la rnam par 'khrug pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/[ {]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa nyid thob pa'o/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa nyid mngon par rtogs pa'o/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa nyid bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo/_/gang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa la

[\[326a.7\]]mchis/_sa bzhi pa yang ga la mchis/_sa lnga pa yang ga la mchis/_sa drug pa yang ga la mchis/_sa bdun pa yang ga la mchis/_sa brgyad pa yang ga la mchis/_sa dgu pa yang ga la mchis/_sa bcu pa yang ga la 
[\[326b\]]
[\[326b.1\]]mchis/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]skye ba'i chos la bzod pa yang ga la mchis/_rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i mngon par shes pa yang ga la mchis/_rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i sbyin pa yang ga la mchis/_rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i tshul 
[\[326b.2\]]khrims kyang ga la mchis/_rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i bzod pa yang ga la mchis/_rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i brtson 'grus kyang ga la mchis/_rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i bsam gtan yang ga la mchis/_rnam 
[\[326b.3\]]par smin pa las byung ba'i shes rab kyang ga la mchis/_rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyang ga la mchis te/_rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i chos de dag la gnas shing /_sems can rnams 
[\[326b.4\]]yongs su smin par bgyid pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bgyid pa dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la zhal zas dang /_btung ba dang /_na bza' dang /_gzims cha dang /_pho brang dang /_yo 
[\[326b.5\]]byad dang /_me tog dang /_bdug spos dang /_spos dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_chos gos dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dang /_mar [{]mye [,]me [}]dang /_lha dang [{]myi'i [,]mi'i [}]phun sum tshogs pa gzhan gang yang rung ba

[\[326b.7\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyi dbyings rnam par 'khrug par bgyid par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ram/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor gang gi phyir/[ {]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa de nyid kyi phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[327a\]]
[\[327a.1\]]sems dpa' chen po/_chos kyi dbyings rnam par 'khrug par [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed de/_de nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sa dang po'o/_/de nyid kyi phyir sa gnyis pa'o/_/de nyid kyi phyir sa

[\[327a.6\]]rnams te/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag gis/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed do/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 
[\[327a.7\]]la yang zhal zas dang /_btung ba dang /_na bza' dang /_gzims cha dang /_pho brang dang /_yo byad dang /_me tog dang /_bdug spos dang /_spos dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_chos gos dang /_gdugs dang /_
[\[327b\]]
[\[327b.1\]]rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dang /_mar me dang /_lha dang [{]myi'i [,]mi'i [}]phun sum tshogs pa gzhan gang yang rung ba dag gis/_rim gro byed cing de la de dag rgyun [{]myi [,]mi [}]'chad par yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyi bar du sku gdung dang /_nyan thos dag la

[\[327b.7\]]ltar tha dad du bgyi bar bstan/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_sbyin pa [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_gtang ba [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_gtong 
[\[328a\]]
[\[328a.1\]]ba po [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_len pa [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]par sbyin pa gtong ngo /_/tshul khrims [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]par tshul khrims srung ngo /_/bzod pa [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]par bzod pa sgrub bo/_/brtson 'grus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]par brtson 'grus rtsom mo/_/

[\[328b\]]
[\[328b.1\]]pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]par smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa la spyod do/_/mngon par shes pa rnams [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]par mngon par shes pa rnams la spyod do/_/ting nge 'dzin rnams [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]par ting nge 'dzin rnams la spyod do/_/gzungs kyi sgo rnams 
[\[328b.2\]{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]par gzungs kyi sgo rnams la spyod do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]par de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la spyod do/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa rnams [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa rnams la spyod do/_/so 
[\[328b.3\]]so yang dag par rig pa rnams [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]par so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la spyod do/_/byams pa chen po [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]par byams pa chen po la spyod do/_/snying rje chen po [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]par snying rje chen po la spyod do/_/sangs rgyas 
[\[328b.4\]]kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]par sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la spyod do/_/sems can rnams [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]par sems can rnams yongs su smyin par byed do/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]par sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs 
[\[328b.5\]]su dag par byed do/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]par byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin 
[\[328b.6\]]pa la spyod do/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod na/_de la bdud sdig to can rnams sam/_bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams kyis tshugs par dka' ba yin no/_/de skad ces bka' 
[\[328b.7\]]stsal pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa rab [{]'byord [,]'byor [}]kyis/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_ji ltar sems 
[\[329a\]]
[\[329a.1\]]bskyed pa gcig gis pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su 'dzin pa lags/_bsam gtan bzhi yongs su 'dzin pa lags/_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa bzhi yongs su 'dzin pa lags/_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi 
[\[329a.2\]]yongs su 'dzin pa lags/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi yongs su 'dzin pa lags/_yang dag par spong ba bzhi yongs su 'dzin pa lags/_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi yongs su 'dzin pa lags/_dbang po lnga yongs su 'dzin pa 
[\[329a.3\]]lags/_stobs lnga yongs su 'dzin pa lags/_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun yongs su 'dzin pa lags/_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su 'dzin pa lags/_rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum yongs su 'dzin pa 
[\[329a.4\]]lags/_'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi yongs su 'dzin pa lags/_rnam par thar pa brgyad yongs su 'dzin pa lags/_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yongs su 'dzin pa lags/_mngon par shes pa lnga 
[\[329a.5\]]yongs su 'dzin pa lags/_nang stong pa nyid yongs su 'dzin pa lags/_phyi stong pa nyid yongs su 'dzin pa lags/_phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su 'dzin pa lags/_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su 'dzin pa lags/_chen po stong 
[\[329a.6\]]pa nyid yongs su 'dzin pa lags/_don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su 'dzin pa lags/_'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su 'dzin pa lags/_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su 'dzin pa lags/_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa 
[\[329a.7\]]nyid yongs su 'dzin pa lags/_thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid yongs su 'dzin pa lags/_dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid yongs su 'dzin pa lags/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su 'dzin pa lags/_chos thams cad stong pa nyid 
[\[329b\]]
[\[329b.1\]]yongs su 'dzin pa lags/_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su 'dzin pa lags/[ {]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid yongs su 'dzin pa lags/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid yongs su 'dzin pa lags/_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su 
[\[329b.2\]]'dzin pa lags/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su 'dzin pa lags/_ting nge 'dzin rnams yongs su 'dzin pa lags/_gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su 'dzin pa lags/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu 
[\[329b.3\]]yongs su 'dzin pa lags/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhi yongs su 'dzin pa lags/_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yongs su 'dzin pa lags/_byams pa chen po yongs su 'dzin pa lags/_snying rje chen po yongs su 'dzin pa lags/_
[\[329b.4\]]sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad yongs su 'dzin pa lags/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis yongs su 'dzin pa lags/_dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu yongs su 'dzin pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal 
[\[329b.5\]]pa/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/_sbyin pa gang gtong ba de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin pa las gzhan du ma yin no/_/tshul khrims la gang srung ba de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas 
[\[329b.6\]]yongs su zin pa las gzhan du ma yin no/_/bzod pa la gang sgom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin pa las gzhan du ma yin no/_/brtson 'grus la gang rtsom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin pa 
[\[329b.7\]]las gzhan du ma yin no/_/ting nge 'dzin la gang snyoms par 'jug pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin pa las gzhan du ma yin no/_/shes rab la gang sgom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin 
[\[330a\]]
[\[330a.1\]]pa las gzhan du ma yin no/_/bsam gtan rnams la gang snyoms par 'jug pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin pa las gzhan du ma yin no/_/tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams la gang snyoms par 'jug 
[\[330a.2\]]pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin pa las gzhan du ma yin no/_/gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la gang snyoms par 'jug pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin pa las gzhan du ma yin 
[\[330a.3\]]no/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la gang sgom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin pa las gzhan du ma yin no/_/yang dag par spong ba rnams la gang sgom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin pa las gzhan 
[\[330a.4\]]du ma yin no/_/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la gang sgom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin pa las gzhan du ma yin no/_/dbang po rnams la gang sgom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin pa las gzhan 
[\[330a.5\]]du ma yin no/_/stobs rnams la gang sgom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin pa las gzhan du ma yin no/_/byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la gang sgom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin pa las gzhan du 
[\[330a.6\]]ma yin no/_/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la gang sgom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin pa las gzhan du ma yin no/_/rnam par thar pa'i sgo rnams la gang sgom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs 
[\[330a.7\]]su zin pa las gzhan du ma yin no/_/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la gang sgom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin pa las gzhan du ma yin no/_/rnam par thar pa rnams la gang sgom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]
[\[330b\]]
[\[330b.1\]]pas yongs su zin pa las gzhan du ma yin no/_/mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la gang sgom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin pa las gzhan du ma yin no/_/mngon par shes pa rnams la gang sgom 
[\[330b.2\]]pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin pa las gzhan du ma yin no/_/nang stong pa nyid la gang sgom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin pa las gzhan du ma yin no/_/phyi stong pa nyid la gang sgom pa de shes rab kyi 
[\[330b.3\]]pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin pa las gzhan du ma yin no/_/phyi nang stong pa nyid la gang sgom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin pa las gzhan du ma yin no/_/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la gang sgom pa de shes rab kyi pha 
[\[330b.4\]]rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin pa las gzhan du ma yin no/_/chen po stong pa nyid la gang sgom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin pa las gzhan du ma yin no/_/don dam pa stong pa nyid la gang sgom pa de shes rab kyi pha 
[\[330b.5\]]rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin pa las gzhan du ma yin no/_/'dus byas stong pa nyid la gang sgom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin pa las gzhan du ma yin no/_/'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la gang sgom pa de shes rab 
[\[330b.6\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin pa las gzhan du ma yin no/_/mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la gang sgom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin pa las gzhan du ma yin no/_/thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa 
[\[330b.7\]]nyid la gang sgom pa de shes rab kyi pha [{]rold [,]rol [}]tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pas yongs su zin pa las gzhan du ma yin no/_/dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid la gang sgom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin pa las gzhan du ma yin 
[\[331a\]]
[\[331a.1\]]no/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid la gang sgom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin pa las gzhan du ma yin no/_/chos thams cad stong pa nyid la gang sgom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su 
[\[331a.2\]]zin pa las gzhan du ma yin no/_/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la gang sgom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin pa las gzhan du ma yin no/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid la gang sgom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas 
[\[331a.3\]]yongs su zin pa las gzhan du ma yin no/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid la gang sgom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin pa las gzhan du ma yin no/_/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la gang sgom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin 
[\[331a.4\]]pas yongs su zin pa las gzhan du ma yin no/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la gang sgom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin pa las gzhan du ma yin no/_/ting nge 'dzin rnams la gang sgom pa de shes rab 
[\[331a.5\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin pa las gzhan du ma yin no/_/gzungs kyi sgo rnams la gang sgom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin pa las gzhan du ma yin no/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la 
[\[331a.6\]]gang sgom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin pa las gzhan du ma yin no/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa rnams la gang sgom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin pa las gzhan du ma yin no/_/so so yang dag par 
[\[331a.7\]]rig pa rnams la gang sgom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin pa las gzhan du ma yin no/_/byams pa chen po la gang sgom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin pa las gzhan du ma yin no/_/
[\[331b\]]
[\[331b.1\]]snying rje chen po la gang sgom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin pa las gzhan du ma yin no/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la gang sgom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin pa las gzhan du ma yin 
[\[331b.2\]]no/_/mtshan rnams gang mngon par sgrub pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin pa las gzhan du ma yin no/_/dpe byad bzang po rnams gang mngon par sgrub pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin pa las 
[\[331b.3\]]gzhan du ma yin no/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni/_sems bskyed pa gcig gis pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/bsam 
[\[331b.4\]]gtan rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yongs su 
[\[331b.5\]]rdzogs par byed do/_/yang dag par spong ba rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dbang po rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/stobs rnams yongs su 
[\[331b.6\]]rdzogs par byed do/_/byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/rnam par thar pa'i sgo rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/'phags 
[\[331b.7\]]pa'i bden pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/rnam par thar pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/mngon par shes pa rnams 
[\[332a\]]
[\[332a.1\]]yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/phyi stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid 
[\[332a.2\]]yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/chen po stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/'dus ma byas stong pa 
[\[332a.3\]]nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed 
[\[332a.4\]]do/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid yongs su 
[\[332a.5\]]rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/ting nge 'dzin rnams yongs su 
[\[332a.6\]]rdzogs par byed do/_/gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/so so yang dag par rig 
[\[332a.7\]]pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/byams pa chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]chen po'i 
[\[332b\]]
[\[332b.1\]]mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dpe byad bzang po rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas 
[\[332b.2\]]yongs su zin pa de/_sems bskyed pa gcig gis ji ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su 'dzin pa lags/_bsam gtan rnams yongs su 'dzin pa lags/_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams yongs su 'dzin pa lags/_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i 
[\[332b.3\]]snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yongs su 'dzin pa lags/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yongs su 'dzin pa lags/_yang dag par spong ba rnams yongs su 'dzin pa lags/_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yongs su 'dzin 
[\[332b.4\]]pa lags/_dbang po rnams yongs su 'dzin pa lags/_stobs rnams yongs su 'dzin pa lags/_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yongs su 'dzin pa lags/_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su 'dzin 
[\[332b.5\]]pa lags/_rnam par thar pa'i sgo rnams yongs su 'dzin pa lags/_'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yongs su 'dzin pa lags/_rnam par thar pa rnams yongs su 'dzin pa lags/_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms 
[\[332b.6\]]par 'jug pa rnams yongs su 'dzin pa lags/_mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su 'dzin pa lags/_nang stong pa nyid yongs su 'dzin pa lags/_phyi stong pa nyid yongs su 'dzin pa lags/_phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs 
[\[332b.7\]]su 'dzin pa lags/_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su 'dzin pa lags/_chen po stong pa nyid yongs su 'dzin pa lags/_don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su 'dzin pa lags/_'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su 
[\[333a\]]
[\[333a.1\]]'dzin pa lags/_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su 'dzin pa lags/_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su 'dzin pa lags/_thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid yongs su 'dzin pa lags/_dor 
[\[333a.2\]]ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid yongs su 'dzin pa lags/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su 'dzin pa lags/_chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su 'dzin pa lags/_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su 'dzin pa lags/[ {]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]
[\[333a.3\]]pa stong pa nyid yongs su 'dzin pa lags/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid yongs su 'dzin pa lags/_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su 'dzin pa lags/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su 'dzin pa lags/_ting nge 
[\[333a.4\]]'dzin rnams yongs su 'dzin pa lags/_gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su 'dzin pa lags/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yongs su 'dzin pa lags/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa rnams yongs su 'dzin pa lags/_so so 
[\[333a.5\]]yang dag par rig pa rnams yongs su 'dzin pa lags/_byams pa chen po yongs su 'dzin pa lags/_snying rje chen po yongs su 'dzin pa lags/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yongs su 'dzin pa lags/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]chen 
[\[333a.6\]]po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis yongs su 'dzin pa lags/_dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu yongs su 'dzin pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol 
[\[333a.7\]]tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_sbyin pa gang gtong ba de shes rab kyi pha [{]rold [,]rol [}]tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pas yongs su zin par gtong ste/_de la gnyis kyi 'du shes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/tshul khrims gang srung ba de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs 
[\[333b\]]
[\[333b.1\]]su zin par srung ste/_de la gnyis kyi 'du shes su mi 'gyur ro/_/bzod pa gang sgom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin par sgom ste/_de la gnyis kyi 'du shes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/brtson 'grus gang rtsom pa de 
[\[333b.2\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin par rtsom ste/_de la gnyis kyi 'du shes su mi 'gyur ro/_/ting nge 'dzin gang la snyoms par 'jug pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin par snyoms par 'jug ste/_
[\[333b.3\]]de la gnyis kyi 'du shes su mi 'gyur ro/_/shes rab gang sgom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin par sgom ste/_de la gnyis kyi 'du shes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/nang stong pa nyid gang sgom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu 
[\[333b.4\]]phyin pas yongs su zin par sgom ste/_de la gnyis kyi 'du shes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/phyi stong pa nyid gang sgom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin par sgom ste/_de la gnyis kyi 'du shes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/phyi nang 
[\[333b.5\]]stong pa nyid gang sgom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin par sgom ste/_de la gnyis kyi 'du shes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang sgom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin par sgom ste/_de la 
[\[333b.6\]]gnyis kyi 'du shes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/chen po stong pa nyid gang sgom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin par sgom ste/_de la gnyis kyi 'du shes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/don dam pa stong pa nyid gang sgom pa de shes rab kyi pha 
[\[333b.7\]]rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin par sgom ste/_de la gnyis kyi 'du shes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/'dus byas stong pa nyid gang sgom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin par sgom ste/_de la gnyis kyi 'du shes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[334a\]]
[\[334a.1\]]'gyur ro/_/'dus ma byas stong pa nyid gang sgom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin par sgom ste/_de la gnyis kyi 'du shes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid gang sgom pa de 
[\[334a.2\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin par sgom ste/_de la gnyis kyi 'du shes su mi 'gyur ro/_/thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid gang sgom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin par sgom ste/_de la

[\[338a\]]

[\[338b\]]
[\[338b.1\]]zag pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i sems la gnas shing /_sbyin pa yongs su gtong ste/_de zag pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i sems de la gnas pa'i mtshan ma dang /_gang sbyin pa dang /_gang la sbyin pa dang /_gang gis sbyin pa dang /_gang yongs su gtong ba yang dag par
