[\[348b.7\]]dang /_mngon par 'du bgyi ba ma mchis pa la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i/_ting nge 'dzin rnams yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba lags/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar chos thams cad mtshan ma ma mchis pa 
[\[349a\]]
[\[349a.1\]]dang /_bgyid pa ma mchis pa dang /[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su ma mchis pa dang /_mngon par 'du bgyi ba ma mchis pa la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i/_gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur 
[\[349a.2\]]ba lags/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar chos thams cad mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang /_bgyid pa ma mchis pa dang /[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su ma mchis pa dang /_mngon par 'du bgyi ba ma mchis pa la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i de 
[\[349a.3\]]bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba lags/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar chos thams cad mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang /_bgyid pa ma mchis pa dang /[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su ma mchis pa dang /_mngon par 'du bgyi 
[\[349a.4\]]ba ma mchis pa la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba lags/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar chos thams cad mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang /_bgyid pa ma mchis pa dang /_
[\[349a.5\]{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su ma mchis pa dang /_mngon par 'du bgyi ba ma mchis pa la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i/_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba lags/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar chos 
[\[349a.6\]]thams cad mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang /_bgyid pa ma mchis pa dang /[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su ma mchis pa dang /_mngon par 'du bgyi ba ma mchis pa la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i/_byams pa chen po yongs su rdzogs par 
[\[349a.7\]]'gyur ba lags/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar chos thams cad mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang /_bgyid pa ma mchis pa dang /[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su ma mchis pa dang /_mngon par 'du bgyi ba ma mchis pa la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[349b\]]
[\[349b.1\]]po'i snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba lags/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar chos thams cad mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang /_bgyid pa ma mchis pa dang /[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su ma mchis pa dang /_mngon par 'du bgyi ba ma mchis pa la byang 
[\[349b.2\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di la/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 
[\[349b.3\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_chos thams cad mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_byed pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_'byung ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_mngon par 'du bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa la mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis/_
[\[349b.4\]]sbyin pa gtong ba yin te/_bza' ba dang /_btung ba dang /_bgo ba dang /_bzhon pa dang /_mal cha dang /_gnas dang /_khyim dang /_nor dang /_'bru dang /_dbyig dang /_gser dang /_nor bu dang /_mu tig dang /_bai DUr+ya dang /_dung dang /_man shel dang /_
[\[349b.5\]]byi ru dang /_sa le sbram dang /_dngul dang /[ {]myi'i [,]mi'i [}]cha sta dang /_yo byad gang yang rung ba'i bar dag dang /_chung ma dang /_bu dang /_bu mo 'am/_phyi dang /_nang ngam/_yan lag dang /_nying lag dang /_rgyal srid kyang rung /_rgyan gyis brgyan cing /_slong 
[\[349b.6\]]ba rnams la yongs su gtong ste/_gal te de'i drung du la la zhig 'ongs shing /_'di skad du/_khyod kyi sbyin pa de lta bur de ltar phan pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]brtan pa yongs su btang ba des ci zhig bya zhes zer na/_de la byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[349b.7\]]dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de 'di snyam du bdag la sems can 'di dag khyod kyi sbyin pa de ltar phan pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]brtan pa yongs su btang ba des ci zhig bya zhes zer mod kyi/_'on kyang bdag gis sbyin pa yongs 
[\[350a\]]
[\[350a.1\]]su gtang bar bya'i bdag gis sbyin pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]sbyin par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bya'o snyam nas/_de sbyin pa de sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing /_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ste/_ci nas kyang yongs su 
[\[350a.2\]]bsngo ba'i tshe/_gang sbyin pa dang /_gang la sbyin pa dang /_gang gis sbyin pa dang /_su yongs su gtong ba dang /_ci yongs su gtong ba dang /_su ci yongs su gtong ba dang /_ci yongs su bsngo ba dang /_gang la yongs su bsngo ba dang /_gang gis 
[\[350a.3\]]yongs su bsngo ba dang /_su yongs su bsngo ba dang /_ci yongs su bsngo ba dang /_gang la yongs su bsngo ba'i mtshan ma yang yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ba de ltar yongs su sngo ste/_de gang gtong ba dang /_gang gi phyir btang ste/_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang 
[\[350a.4\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba de lta bu'i dngos po yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ngo /_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar dngos po thams cad ni nang stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo /_/phyi stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo /_/phyi nang stong pa 
[\[350a.5\]]nyid kyis stong ngo /_/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo /_/chen po stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo /_/don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo /_/'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo /_/'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo /_/mtha' las 'das pa stong 
[\[350a.6\]]pa nyid kyis stong ngo /_/thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo /_/dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo /_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo /_/chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo /_/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong 
[\[350a.7\]]ngo /_/[{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo /_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo /_/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo /_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo /_/des de ltar chos thams cad stong par yang dag 
[\[350b\]]
[\[350b.1\]]par rjes su mthong na/_ji zhig yongs su bsngo bar 'gyur/_gang la yongs su bsngo bar 'gyur/_gang gis yongs su bsngo bar 'gyur te/_de'i bsngo ba de lta bu ni bsngo ba'i dam pa yin/_dug [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i bsngo ba 
[\[350b.2\]]yin/_chos kyi dbyings kyi bsngo ba yin te/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni/_shes rab kyi pha [{]rold [,]rol [}]tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_chos thams cad mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_byed pa 
[\[350b.3\]{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_'byung ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_mngon par 'du bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa la sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed do/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su 'dzin to/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu 
[\[350b.4\]]phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs 
[\[350b.5\]]su rdzogs par byed do/_/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/phyi 
[\[350b.6\]]stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/chen po stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/don 
[\[350b.7\]]dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed de/_/'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs 
[\[351a\]]
[\[351a.1\]]su rdzogs par byed do/_/thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed 
[\[351a.2\]]do/_/chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong 
[\[351a.3\]]pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yongs su rdzogs 
[\[351a.4\]]par byed do/_/yang dag par spong ba rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dbang po rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/stobs rnams yongs su 
[\[351a.5\]]rdzogs par byed do/_/byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed 
[\[351a.6\]]do/_/bsam gtan rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/rnam par thar pa rnams 
[\[351a.7\]]yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yongs su rdzogs 
[\[351b\]]
[\[351b.1\]]par byed do/_/mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/ting nge 'dzin rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yongs 
[\[351b.2\]]su rdzogs par byed do/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/byams pa chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/snying rje chen po yongs su 
[\[351b.3\]]rdzogs par byed do/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/de thog ma nyid du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed kyang /_rnam par smin pa yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dzin te/_'on kyang 
[\[351b.4\]]de'i yo byad thams cad bsams pa tsam gyis 'grub bo/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyi yo byad phun sum tshogs pa thams cad ni bsams pa tsam gyis 'byung ngo /_/rab 'byor 
[\[351b.5\]]de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i yo byad phun sum tshogs pa thams cad kyang bsams pa tsam gyis 'byung ngo /_/de yo byad de dag gis/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la yang bsnyen bkur byed/_
[\[351b.6\]]lha dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]dang /_lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten yang tshim par byed do/_/des sems can de dag sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa des yang dag par bsdus te/_thabs mkhas pas theg pa gsum la rab tu 'jug go_/
[\[351b.7\]]rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_/shes rab kyi pha [{]rold [,]rol [}]tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_chos thams cad mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_byed pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_
[\[352a\]]
[\[352a.1\]]'byung ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_mngon par 'du bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/rab 'byor ci ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu 
[\[352a.2\]]phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_chos thams cad mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_byed pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_'byung ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_mngon par 'du bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa la mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis/_sems dang po bskyed pa 
[\[352a.3\]]nas nye bar bzung ste/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa yin zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_chos thams cad 
[\[352a.4\]]mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_byed pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_'byung ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_mngon par 'du bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa la mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/_tshul khrims kyi pha 
[\[352a.5\]]rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/de 'phags pa'i tshul khrims zag pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa lam gyi khongs su chud pa chos nyid kyis thob pa rab tu 'thob pa ste/_de'i tshul khrims de ni ma zhig pa yin/_ma god pa yin/_ma 'dres 
[\[352a.6\]]pa yin/_rnyog pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yin/_ma nyams pa yin/_rang dbang yod pa yin/_shin tu rdzogs pa yin/_mkhas pas bstod pa yin te/_tshul khrims des gzugs sam/_tshor ba 'am/_'du shes sam/_'du byed dam/_
[\[352a.7\]]rnam par shes pa 'am/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gam/_rna ba 'am/_sna 'am/_lce 'am/_lus sam/_yid dam/_gzugs sam/_sgra 'am/_dri 'am/_ro 'am/_reg gam/_chos sam/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi rnam par shes pa 'am/_rna ba'i rnam par 
[\[352b\]]
[\[352b.1\]]shes pa 'am/_sna'i rnam par shes pa 'am/_lce'i rnam par shes pa 'am/_lus kyi rnam par shes pa 'am/_yid kyi rnam par shes pa 'am/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa 'am/_rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa 'am/_sna'i 'dus te reg pa 
[\[352b.2\]]'am/_lce'i 'dus te reg pa 'am/_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa 'am/_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa 'am/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba 'am/_rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba 'am/_sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba 'am/_
[\[352b.3\]]lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba 'am/_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba 'am/_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba 'am/_sa'i khams sam/_chu'i khams sam/[ {]mye'i [,]me'i [}]khams sam/_rlung gi khams sam/_nam mkha'i khams 
[\[352b.4\]]sam/_rnam par shes pa'i khams sam/_ma rig pa 'am/_'du byed dam/_rnam par shes pa 'am/[ {]mying [,]ming [}]dang gzugs sam/_skye mched drug gam/_reg pa 'am/_tshor ba 'am/_sred pa 
[\[352b.5\]]'am/_len pa 'am/_srid pa 'am/_skye ba 'am/_rga shi 'am/_sbyin pa'i pha [{]rold [,]rol [}]tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa 'am/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/_
[\[352b.6\]]bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'a'am/_shes rab kyi pha [{]rold [,]rol [}]tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa 'am/_nang stong pa nyid dam/_phyi stong pa nyid dam/_phyi nang stong pa nyid dam/_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dam/_chen po stong pa nyid dam/_don dam pa 
[\[352b.7\]]stong pa nyid dam/_'dus byas stong pa nyid dam/_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dam/_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dam/_thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dam/_dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dam/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid dam/_chos 
[\[353a\]]
[\[353a.1\]]thams cad stong pa nyid dam/_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dam/[ {]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid dam/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dam/_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dam/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 
[\[353a.2\]]dam/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sam/_yang dag par spong ba rnams sam/_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sam/_dbang po rnams sam/_stobs rnams sam/_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sam/_'phags pa'i 
[\[353a.3\]]lam yan lag brgyad pa 'am/_'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sam/_bsam gtan rnams sam/_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams sam/_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/_rnam par thar pa rnams sam/_
[\[353a.4\]]mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa 'am/_mngon par shes pa rnams sam/_ting nge 'dzin rnams sam/_gzungs kyi sgo rnams 
[\[353a.5\]]sam/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sam/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa rnams sam/_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sam/_byams pa chen po 'am/_snying rje chen po 'am/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sam/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[353a.6\]]chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis sam/_dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu 'am/_rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba'i rigs sam/_bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba'i rigs sam/_khyim bdag che zhing mtho ba'i rigs sam/_rgyal chen bzhi'i 
[\[353a.7\]]ris kyi lha rnams sam/_sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams sam/_mtshe ma'i lha rnams sam/_dga' ldan gyi lha rnams sam/_'phrul dga'i lha rnams sam/_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams sam/_tshangs ris kyi lha rnams 
[\[353b\]]
[\[353b.1\]]sam/_tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams sam/_tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams sam/_tshangs chen gyi lha rnams sam/_snang ba'i lha rnams sam/_chung snang gi lha rnams sam/_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]snang ba'i lha rnams sam/_kun snang 
[\[353b.2\]]dang ba'i lha rnams sam/_dge ba'i lha rnams sam/_chung dge ba'i lha rnams sam/_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]dge ba'i lha rnams sam/_dge rgyas kyi lha rnams sam/_che ba'i lha rnams sam/_chung che'i lha rnams sam/_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]che 
[\[353b.3\]]ba'i lha rnams sam/_'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams sam/_'du shes [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i lha rnams sam/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]che ba'i lha rnams sam/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gdung ba'i lha rnams sam/_gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams sam/_shin tu mthong ba'i 
[\[353b.4\]]lha rnams sam/_'og [{]myin [,]min [}]gyi lha rnams sam/_nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams sam/_rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams sam/[ {]chung zad [,]cung zad [}{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams sam/_
[\[353b.5\]]'du shes [{]myed [,]med [}]'du shes [{]myed [,]med [}{]myin [,]min [}]skye mched kyi lha rnams sam/_rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'am/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/_phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/_dgra bcom pa nyid dam/_rang 
[\[353b.6\]]sangs rgyas sam/_'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i dbang tshul khrims 'dis thob par bya'o zhes chos gang la yang snyems pa [{]myed [,]med [}]de/_gzhan du na tshul khrims de sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing /_
[\[353b.7\]]rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i yongs su bsngo ba dang /[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i yongs su bsngo ba dang /_gnyis su [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i yongs su bsngo bas/_yongs su sngo ste/_de yang 'jig rten gyi 
[\[354a\]]
[\[354a.1\]]tha snyad du'i don dam par ni ma yin no/_/de tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par de dang /_thabs mkhas pas ro myong ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i tshul gyis bsam gtan bzhi sgrub bo/_/de lha'i [{]myig [,]mig [}]mngon 
[\[354a.2\]]par sgrub ste/_lha'i [{]myig [,]mig [}]rnam par smyin pa las byung ba des/_shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]grangs [{]myed [,]med [}]dpag tu [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dag na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho 
[\[354a.3\]]skyong ba dang /_chos ston pa de dag thams cad mthong ste/_de'i mthong ba de ni bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du chud za bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/lha'i [{]myig [,]mig [}]rnam par

[\[354b.1\]]tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]grangs [{]myed [,]med [}]dpag tu [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dag na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang /_chos ston pa de dag thams cad mthong ste/_de'i mthong ba de ni bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par

[\[354b.3\]{]myed [,]med [}]dpag tu [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dag na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang /_chos ston pa de dag thams cad mthong ste/_de'i mthong ba de ni bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang

[\[355a\]]
[\[355a.1\]]sangs rgyas kyi bar du chud za bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/lha'i [{]myig [,]mig [}]rnam par smin pa las byung ba des/_nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]grangs [{]myed [,]med [}]dpag tu 
[\[355a.2\]{]myed [,]med [}]pa dag na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang /_chos ston pa de dag thams cad mthong ste/_de'i mthong ba de ni bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub

[\[355a.7\]]rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du chud za bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/de lha'i rna ba'i khams rnam par dag pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]las 'das pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis gsungs pa'i sgra thos te/_de'i 
[\[355b\]]
[\[355b.1\]]thos pa de yang ji srid du thos pa des/_bdag dang gzhan gyi don byas par ma gyur gyi bar du chud za bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/sems kyi rnam pa shes pas/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi thugs sems 
[\[355b.2\]]kyis rab tu shes te/_des sems kyi rnam pa shes pa de yang /_ji srid du sems kyi rnam pa shes pa des/_sems can thams cad kyi don byas par ma gyur gyi bar du chud za bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/de sngon 
[\[355b.3\]]gyi gnas rjes su dran pa'i shes pas/_sems can de dag gi 'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams shes shing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag gis sems can de dag yang dag par ston to/_/

[\[355b.6\]]gzhog go_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rab tu gzhog go_/phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rab tu gzhog go/_/dgra bcom pa nyid la rab tu gzhog go_/rang byang chub la rab tu gzhog go_/
[\[355b.7\]]byang chub la rab tu gzhog go_/de bzhin du sems can rnams dge ba'i chos gang dang /_gang la mtha' yod pa de dang de la rab tu gzhog ste/_rab [{]'byord [,]'byor [}]de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[356a\]]
[\[356a.1\]]po shes rab kyi pha [{]rold [,]rol [}]tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_chos thams cad mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_byed pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_'byung ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_mngon par 'du

[\[356a.3\]]tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_chos thams cad mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_byed pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_'byung ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_mngon par 'du bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa la mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis/_bzod 
[\[356a.4\]]pa'i pha [{]rold [,]rol [}]tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa yin zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha [{]rold [,]rol [}]tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_chos thams cad mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_
[\[356a.5\]]byed pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_'byung ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_mngon par 'du bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa la mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis/_sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/_snying po byang chub 
[\[356a.6\]]la 'dug gi bar du 'di lta ste/_gnod pa la [{]myi [,]mi [}]mjed pa'i bzod pa dang /_mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa gnyis sgom ste/_de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i gnod pa la [{]myi [,]mi [}]mjed pa'i 
[\[356a.7\]]bzod pa ni/_de'i drung du sems can thams cad yang dang yang 'ongs te/_gshe zhing mi snyan par brjod de/_rdo ba dang /_dbyug pas brdegs shing mtshon gyis btab kyang de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[356b\]]
[\[356b.1\]]chen pos 'khrug pa dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa 'ga' tsam gyi skabs kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}]dbye'o/_/des 'di ltar brtag par bya ste/_de la gang spyo ba dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]snyan par bya ba dang /_gdab cing brdeg par bya ba gang yang 
[\[356b.2\]{]myed[,]med[}]/_gang gshe ba dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]snyan par brjod pa dang /_rdeg pa dang /_'debs pa de yang [{]myed [,]med [}]cing /[ {]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[356b.3\]]chen po'i [{]myi [,]mi [}]skye ba'i chos la bzod pa ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid la rtog na/_chos nyid kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na/_chos rnams kyi rang bzhin [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa lta ga 
[\[356b.4\]]la yod de/_des de ltar chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu 'thob bo/_/ci'i phyir bzod pa zhes bya zhe na/_nyon mongs pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]skye ba 
[\[356b.5\]]dang /_ye shes [{]myi [,]mi [}]chod pa'i phyir/_bzod pa ni [{]myi [,]mi [}]skye ba'i chos la bzod pa'o/_/de bzod pa de gnyis la gnas shing /_bsam gtan bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa bzhi 
[\[356b.6\]]yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/yang dag par spong ba bzhi 
[\[356b.7\]]yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dbang po lnga yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/stobs lnga yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/byang chub kyi yan lag bdun 
[\[357a\]]
[\[357a.1\]]yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/mngon par 
[\[357a.2\]]shes pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/ting nge 'dzin rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su 
[\[357a.3\]]rdzogs par byed do/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/byams pa chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/snying rje chen po 
[\[357a.4\]]yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/de 'phags pa'i chos zag pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa 'jig rten las 'das pa nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang 
[\[357a.5\]]thun mong ma yin pa de dag la gnas te/_'phags pa'i mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/mngon par shes pa de dag yongs su rdzogs nas pha [{]rold [,]rol [}]tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa drug dang /_mngon par 
[\[357a.6\]]shes pa lnga po de dag la gnas te/_lha'i [{]myig [,]mig [}]gis shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]grangs [{]myed [,]med [}]dpag tu [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dag na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ci snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba 
[\[357a.7\]]dang /_chos ston pa de dag thams cad mthong ste/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag mthong nas/_sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa 'thob bo/_/de'i sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa de yang nam bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par 
[\[357b\]]
[\[357b.1\]]rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du rgyun [{]myi [,]mi [}]'chad do/_/de 'phags pa'i chos zag pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa 'jig rten las 'das pa nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa de dag la gnas

[\[357b.6\]]tu phyin pa drug la gnas te/_lha'i [{]myig [,]mig [}]gis nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]grangs [{]myed [,]med [}]dpag tu [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dag na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang /_

[\[358a\]]
[\[358a.1\]]bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du rgyun [{]myi [,]mi [}]'chad do/_/de 'phags pa'i chos zag pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa 'jig rten las 'das pa nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun 
[\[358a.2\]]mong ma yin pa de dag la gnas te/_'phags pa'i mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/mngon par shes pa de dag yongs su rdzogs nas/_pha rol tu phyin pa drug la gnas te/_lha'i [{]myig [,]mig [}]gis byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams tshad 
[\[358a.3\]{]myed [,]med [}]grangs [{]myed [,]med [}]dpag tu [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dag na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang /_chos ston pa de dag thams cad mthong ste/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag mthong nas/_sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa 'thob bo/_/
[\[358a.4\]]de'i sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa de yang nam bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du rgyun [{]myi [,]mi [}]'chad do/_/de 'phags pa'i chos zag pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa 'jig rten las 'das pa/_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun 
[\[358a.5\]]mong ma yin pa de dag la gnas te/_'phags pa'i mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/mngon par shes pa de dag yongs su rdzogs nas/_pha rol tu phyin pa drug la gnas te/_lha'i [{]myig [,]mig [}]gis byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi 
[\[358a.6\]]khams tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]grangs [{]myed [,]med [}]dpag tu [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dag na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang /_chos ston pa de dag thams cad mthong ste/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag mthong nas/_sangs rgyas rjes su dran 
[\[358a.7\]]pa 'thob bo/_/de'i sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa de yang nam bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du rgyun [{]myi [,]mi [}]'chad do/_/de 'phags pa'i chos zag pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa 'jig rten las 'das pa nyan thos dang rang 
[\[358b\]]
[\[358b.1\]]sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa de dag la gnas te/_'phags pa'i mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/mngon par shes pa de dag yongs su rdzogs nas/_pha rol tu phyin pa drug la gnas te/_lha'i [{]myig [,]mig [}]gis shar lho'i phyogs 
[\[358b.2\]]mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]grangs [{]myed [,]med [}]dpag tu [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dag na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang /_chos ston pa de dag thams cad mthong ste/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag mthong nas/_/
[\[358b.3\]]sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa 'thob bo/_/de'i sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa de yang nam bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du rgyun [{]myi [,]mi [}]'chad do/_/de 'phags pa'i chos zag pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa 'jig rten las 'das pa nyan thos 
[\[358b.4\]]dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa de dag la gnas te/_'phags pa'i mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/mngon par shes pa de dag yongs su rdzogs nas/_pha rol tu phyin pa drug la gnas te/_lha'i [{]myig [,]mig [}]gis 
[\[358b.5\]]lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]grangs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dpag tu [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dag na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang /_chos ston pa de dag thams cad mthong ste/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[358b.6\]]de dag mthong nas/_sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa 'thob bo/_/de'i sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa de yang nam bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du rgyun [{]myi [,]mi [}]'chad do/_/de 'phags pa'i chos zag pa 
[\[358b.7\]{]myed [,]med [}]pa 'jig rten las 'das pa nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa de dag la gnas te/_'phags pa'i mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/mngon par shes pa de dag yongs su rdzogs nas/_
[\[359a\]]
[\[359a.1\]]pha rol tu phyin pa drug la gnas te/_lha'i [{]myig [,]mig [}]gis nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]grangs [{]myed [,]med [}]dpag tu [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dag na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong 
[\[359a.2\]]ba dang /_chos ston pa de dag thams cad mthong ste/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag mthong nas/_sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa 'thob bo/_/de'i sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa de yang nam bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 
[\[359a.3\]]rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du rgyun [{]myi [,]mi [}]'chad do/_/de 'phags pa'i chos zag pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa 'jig rten las 'das pa nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang /_thun mong ma yin pa de dag la gnas te/_'phags pa'i mngon par shes pa rnams

[\[359a.5\]]ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang /_chos ston pa de dag thams cad mthong ste/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag mthong nas/_sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa 'thob bo/_/de'i sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa de yang nam bla na med 
[\[359a.6\]]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du rgyun [{]myi [,]mi [}]'chad do/_/de 'phags pa'i chos zag pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa 'jig rten las 'das pa nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa de dag la gnas 
[\[359a.7\]]te/_'phags pa'i mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/mngon par shes pa de dag yongs su rdzogs nas/_pha rol tu phyin pa drug la gnas te/_lha'i [{]myig [,]mig [}]gis steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]grangs [{]myed [,]med [}]dpag 
[\[359b\]]
[\[359b.1\]]tu [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dag na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang /_chos ston pa de dag thams cad mthong ste/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag mthong nas/_sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa 'thob bo/_/de'i sangs rgyas

[\[359b.3\]]to/_/bzung nas de bzhin nyid du nan tan du byed do/_/de bzhin nyid du nan tan du byas nas kyang /_de bzhin nyid du sems can rnams la chos ston to/_/de sems kyi rnam grangs shes pas/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi thugs sems kyis 
[\[359b.4\]]rab tu shes so/_/'phags pa thams cad kyi sems kyang sems kyis rab tu shes so/_/nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sems kyang sems kyis rab tu shes so/_/sems can thams cad kyi sems kyang sems kyis rab tu shes so/_/de 
[\[359b.5\]]sems can thams cad kyi sems sems kyis yongs su shes par byas shing /_de bzhin nyid du chos ston to/_/de sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa shes pas sems can de dag gi sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongs su shes par byas shing /_yang sems can 
[\[359b.6\]]de dag la dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par ston to/_/yang dag par skul lo/_/yang dag par gzeng stod do/_/yang dag par dga' bar byed do/_/de zag pa zad pa shes te zag pa zad pa shes pa des/_sems can rnams theg pa gsum la rab tu 'god do/_/
[\[359b.7\]]rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_chos thams cad mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_byed pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_'byung ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_mngon par 'du bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa la de ltar bzod 
[\[360a\]]
[\[360a.1\]]pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /_thabs mkhas pas sems can rnams yongs su smyin par byed do/_/sangs rgyas 
[\[360a.2\]]kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do/_/de sems can rnams yongs su smyin par byas/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byas nas/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la spyad/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid/_yongs su rdzogs par byas

[\[360a.5\]{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_'byung ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_mngon par 'du bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa la mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa yin no/_/rab 'byor ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab

[\[360b\]]
[\[360b.1\]]mngon par 'du bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa la mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/_lus kyi brtson 'grus dang ldan pa yin/_sems kyi brtson 'grus dang ldan pa yin te/_de lus kyi brtson 'grus la gnas nas/_bsam 
[\[360b.2\]]gtan dang po nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/bsam gtan gnyis pa nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/bsam gtan gsum pa nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/bsam gtan bzhi pa nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/de bsam gtan bzhi pa la mnyam 
[\[360b.3\]]par gzhag cing /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam pa du ma nyams su myong bar byed do/_/sa chen po 'di yang rab tu g.yo bar byed do/_/gcig tu gyur cing mang por 'gyur ro/_/mang por gyur cing gcig tu 'gyur ro/_/snang ba dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]snang ba yang nyams su myong 
[\[360b.4\]]bar byed do/_/rtsig pa las thal ba dang /_ra ba las thal ba dang /_/ri las thal bar thogs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i lus kyis 'gro ste/_dper na nam mkha' la bya ba bzhin no/_/nam mkha' la yang skyil mo krung gis 'gro ste/_dper na 'dab chags bya bzhin

[\[360b.6\]]dang /_zla ba 'di dag 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che la 'di ltar mthu che zhing /_'di ltar dbang che ba dag kyang lag pas byugs shing /_tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du lus kyis dbang bsgyur te/_de lus kyi brtson 'grus de lta bu dang ldan pas rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam pa des 
[\[360b.7\]]phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]grangs [{]myed [,]med [}]dpag tu [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dag na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang /_chos ston pa de dag tu song zhing /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la na bza' dang /_
[\[361a\]]
[\[361a.1\]]bsod snyoms dang /_gzims cha dang /_snyun gyi rkyen sman dang /_yo byad mang pos bsnyen bkur byed de/_na bza' dang /_bsod snyoms dang /_gzims cha dang /_snyun gyi rkyen sman dang /_yo byad mang po de dag kyang nam bla na 
[\[361a.2\]{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar tu zad par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur te/_byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kyang /_gos dang bsod snyoms dang /_mal cha dang /_nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang /_

[\[361a.6\]]mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_byed pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_'byung ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_mngon par 'du bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa la lus kyi brtson 'grus dang ldan pas/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do//_//

[\[362a\]]
[\[362a.1\]]gsum pa 'am/_bsam gtan bzhi ba 'am/_byams pa 'am/_snying rje 'am/_dga' ba 'am/_btang snyoms sam/_nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dam/_rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dam/[ {]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]
[\[362a.2\]{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i skye mched dam/_'du shes [{]myed [,]med [}]'du shes [{]myed [,]med [}{]myin [,]min [}]skye mched dam/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/_bsam gtan 
[\[362a.3\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/_nang stong pa nyid dam/_phyi stong pa nyid dam/_phyi nang stong pa nyid dam/_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dam/_chen po stong pa nyid dam/_don dam pa stong pa nyid dam/_'dus byas stong pa nyid dam/_

[\[362a.7\]]gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/_rnam par thar pa rnams sam/_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/_stong pa nyid dam/_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa 'am/_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa 'am/_mngon par shes pa 
[\[362b\]]
[\[362b.1\]]rnams sam/_ting nge 'dzin rnams sam/_gzungs kyi sgo rnams sam/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sam/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa rnams sam/_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sam/_byams pa chen po 'am/_snying rje chen 
[\[362b.2\]]po 'am/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la yang rtag ces bya ba 'am/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bya ba 'am/_bde zhes bya ba 'am/_sdug bsngal zhes bya ba 'am/_bdag ces bya ba 'am/_bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya ba 'am/_zhi zhes bya ba 'am/_

[\[362b.7\]]bar yang snyems pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba zhes bya bar yang snyems pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/dgra bcom pa zhes bya bar yang snyems pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/rang sangs rgyas shes bya bar yang snyems pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya bar yang snyems pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/
[\[363a\]]
[\[363a.1\]]sangs rgyas shes bya bar yang snyems pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/sems can 'di dag ni mthong ba'i lam gyis brjod pa/_'di dag ni bsrabs pa'i sas brjod pa/_'di dag ni dam pa ma yin pa'i cha can gyis brjod pa/_'di dag ni 
[\[363a.2\]]bla ma'i cha can gyis brjod pa/_'di dag ni rang sangs rgyas nyid kyis brjod pa/_'di dag ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis brjod pa/_'di dag ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis brjod pa/_zhes bya bar yang snyems pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/de ci'i 
[\[363a.3\]]phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar de dag la ngo bo nyid gang gis brjod par bya ba'i ngo bo nyid de sems las byung ba'i brtson 'grus de lta bu dang ldan pas mngon du gyur kyang sems can rnams kyi don byed de/_sems can de dag kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/brtson 
[\[363a.4\]]'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang yongs su rdzogs par byed de/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de yang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang yongs su rdzogs par byed de/_sangs rgyas kyi chos de dag kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/sangs rgyas 
[\[363a.5\]]kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par byed de/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing de yang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/de sems kyi brtson 'grus de lta bu dang ldan pas/_dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su 'dzin kyang de la chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]de/_de chags pa med par sems can 
[\[363a.6\]]rnams kyi don byed cing /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro'o/_/'jig rten gyi khams nas 'jig rten gyi khams su 'gro ste/_rdzu 'phrul dang cho 'phrul gang dang gang gis rnam par 'phrul par 'dod pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang cho 'phrul de dang /_
[\[363a.7\]]des rnam par 'phrul te/_me tog gi char dbab pa 'am/_spos kyi ngad dgye ba 'am/_'brug gi sgra bsgrag pa 'am/_glu dang sil snyan gyi sgra bsgrag pa dang /_sa bskyod pa 'am/_snang ba bstan pa 'am/_rin po che sna bdun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[363b\]]
[\[363b.1\]]bstan pas rnam par 'phrul te/_gang dang gang du gang dang gang sems can rnams kyi don du 'gyur ba de dag kyang bdag gi lus las 'gyed de/_sems can rnams kyi don tu bar 'ga' bdag las 'gyed do/_/bar 'ga' dri zhim po 'gyed do/_/bar 'ga' 
[\[363b.2\]]srog gcod pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i mchod sbyin chen po byed do/_/bar 'ga' sems can mtha' yas pa lam ma yin pa nas/_'don te srog gcod pa las zlog go_/ma byin par len pa las zlog go_/'dod pas log par g.yem pa las zlog go_/phra ma smra ba 
[\[363b.3\]]las zlog go_/zhe gcod pa'i tshig las zlog go_/[{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba las zlog go_/tshig kyal ba las zlog go_/chags sems las zlog go_/gnod sems las zlog go_/log par lta ba las yongs su 'grel to/_/la la la ni sbyin pas phan 'dogs so/_/la la la ni tshul khrims 
[\[363b.4\]]kyis phan 'dogs so/_/la la'i don tu ni yan lag dang nying lag yongs su gtong ngo /_/la la'i don tu ni bu dang chung ma yongs su gtong ngo /_/la la'i don tu ni rgyal srid yongs su gtong ngo /_/la la'i don tu ni bdag yongs su gtong ste/_de ltar thabs gang dang gang gis sems 
[\[363b.5\]]can rnams kyi don tu 'gyur ba'i thabs de dang des sems can rnams kyi don byed do/_/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_chos thams cad mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_byed pa 
[\[363b.6\]{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_'byung ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_mngon par 'du bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa la sems kyi brtson 'grus dang ldan pas/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[363b.7\]]sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_chos thams cad mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_byed pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_'byung ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_mngon par 'du bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa la bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 
[\[364a\]]
[\[364a.1\]]rdzogs par byed pa yin zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_chos thams cad mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_byed pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su [{]myed [,]med [}]
[\[364a.2\]]pa dang /_'byung ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_mngon par 'du bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa la mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis/_sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin ma gtogs 
[\[364a.3\]]par ting nge 'dzin gzhan thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed de/_/de 'dod pas dben/_sdig to [{]myi [,]mi [}]dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa rtog pa dang bcas pa/_dpyod pa dang bcas pa dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang /_bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar 
[\[364a.4\]]bsgrubs te gnas so/_/de rnam par rtog pa dang /_rnam par dpyod pa nye bar zhi nas nang yongs su dang ste/_sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas/_rtog pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_dpyod pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang /_bde ba can bsam 
[\[364a.5\]]gtan gnyis pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/de dga' ba las 'dod chags dang bral bas/_dran pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin du btang snyoms la gnas te/_bde ba lus kyis myong la 'phags pa rnams kyis de la dran pa dang ldan pa bde ba 
[\[364a.6\]]la rnam par spyod pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/_dga' ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/de bde ba yang spangs sdug bsngal ba yang spangs shing yid bde ba dang /_/yid [{]myi [,]mi [}]bde ba snga nas kyang nub 
[\[364a.7\]]pas/_bde ba yang [{]myed [,]med [}]sdug bsngal ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa btang snyoms dang dran pas yongs su dag pa'i bsam gtan bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/de byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems dang /_snying rje dang ldan pa'i sems dang /_dga' ba dang 
[\[364b\]]
[\[364b.1\]]ldan pa'i sems dang /_btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/_'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/_nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa thams cad rnam pa thams cad du rgyas par bkang zhing nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/de nam 
[\[364b.2\]]mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/[{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/'du shes [{]myed [,]med [}]'du shes [{]myed [,]med [}{]myin [,]min [}]
[\[364b.3\]]skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/de ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu phyin pa de la gnas shing /_rnam par thar pa brgyad la lugs dang mthun pa dang lugs dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthun par snyoms par 'jug cing rnam par ldang ngo /_/mthar gyis gnas 
[\[364b.4\]]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la mnyam par bzhag ste gnas so/_/stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ting nge 'dzin la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ting nge 'dzin la nye bar 
[\[364b.5\]]bsgrubs te gnas so/_/bar chad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ting nge 'dzin la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/glog lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/rdo rje lta bu'i 
[\[364b.6\]]ting nge 'dzin la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/de ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la gnas nas/_lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi ye shes kyis lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi khongs su ting nge 'dzin thams cad chud par byas shing dkar po 
[\[364b.7\]]rnam par mthong ba'i sa las 'da'o/_/dkar po rnam par mthong ba'i sa las 'das nas/_rigs kyi sa las 'da'o/_/rigs kyis las 'das nas brgyad pa'i sa las 'da'o/_/brgyad pa'i sa las 'das nas mthong ba'i sa las 'da'o/_/
[\[365a\]]
[\[365a.1\]]mthong ba'i sa las 'das nas/_bsrabs pa'i sa las 'da'o/_/bsrabs pa'i sa las 'das nas/_'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa las 'da'o/_/'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa las 'das nas/_byas pa rtogs 
[\[365a.2\]]pa'i sa las 'da'o/_/byas pa rtogs pa'i sa las 'das nas/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'da'o/_/rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'das nas/_byang chub sems dpa'i skyon [{]myed [,]med [}]par 'jug go_/byang chub sems dpa'i skyon [{]myed [,]med [}]par zhugs 
[\[365a.3\]]nas/_sangs rgyas kyi sa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/des de dag la spyod cing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi/_ye shes ma thob kyi bar du/_'bras bu bar ma dor thob par mi byed de/_de ting nge 'dzin gyi pha [{]rold [,]rol [}]tu 
[\[365a.4\]{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa 'di la gnas shing /_mngon par shes pa rnams/_yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byas nas/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur byed cing /_sangs 
[\[365a.5\]]rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ste/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la bsnyen bkur byed do/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la yang dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par 'gyur ba dang /_sems can 
[\[365a.6\]]rnams yongs su smin par 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par byed de/_'jig rten gyi khams nas 'jig rten gyi khams su 'gro zhing /_sems can rnams kyi don byed do/_/de la sems can la la ni sbyin pas yongs su sdud do/_/la la ni tshul 
[\[365a.7\]]khrims kyis yongs su sdud do/_/la la ni ting nge 'dzin gyis yongs su sdud do/_/la la ni shes rab kyis yongs su sdud do/_/la la ni rnam par grol bas yongs su sdud do/_/la la ni rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong bas yongs su sdud do/_/la 
[\[365b\]]
[\[365b.1\]]la ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la rab tu gzhog go_/la la ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rab tu gzhog go_/la la ni phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rab tu gzhog go_/la la ni dgra bcom pa nyid la rab tu gzhog go_/la la ni rang byang chub la rab 
[\[365b.2\]]tu gzhog go_/la la ni bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la rab tu gzhog go_/de de ltar dge ba'i chos gang dang gang gis sems can rnams mtho bar 'gyur ba de dang de la sbyor te/_de ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la gnas shing 
[\[365b.3\]]gzungs kyi sgo thams cad mngon par sgrub bo/_/so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi rab tu 'thob bo/_/rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i mngon par shes pa rnams kyang thob pa yin te/_de nam yang las dang nyon mongs pa'i dbang gis ma'i mngal du 
[\[365b.4\]]skye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/nam yang 'dod pa la sten par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i don du skye ba yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dzin pa yang gang yang [{]myed [,]med [}]de/_skye ba'i nyes pas kyang gos par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar 
[\[365b.5\]]des sgyu ma lta bu'i chos thams cad rab tu mthong rab tu rig_/rab tu rtogs pas na de sgyu ma lta bu'i 'du byed thams cad rig par byas shing /_sems can thams cad kyi don byed do/_/des sgyu ma lta bu'i 'du byed thams cad rab tu reg pas sems 
[\[365b.6\]]can rnams la snying rje chen po skye ste/_kye ma sems can 'di dag ni chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bu la 'khor ba na/_sdug bsngal mang po nyams su myong bar gyur pa yin na/_bdag gis 'di dag nam zhig na/_sdug bsngal thams cad nye bar 
[\[365b.7\]]zhi ba'i mya ngan las 'das pa la dgod par 'gyur zhes snying rje chen po skye ste/_de la yang sems can nam sems can du gdags pa [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su [{]myed [,]med [}]de/_des chos thams cad ma [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]nas/_'jig rten gyi tha snyad nye bar bzung ste/_
[\[366a\]]
[\[366a.1\]{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su [{]myed [,]med [}]pa de nyid la/_sems can rnams rab tu 'god de/_don dam par ni ma yin no/_/de ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la gnas shing /_bsam gtan dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin 
[\[366a.2\]]dang /_snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la spyod de/_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du nam du yang ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/de ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol 
[\[366a.3\]]tu phyin pa 'di la gnas shing /_lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mngon par bsgrubs te/_de la gnas nas bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba thams cad rab tu spong ngo /_/bag chags kyi mtshams

[\[366b.1\]]'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_chos thams cad mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_byed pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_'byung ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_mngon par 'du bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]
[\[366b.2\]]pa la sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/_mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis yang dag pa'am/_yongs su grub pa'i chos gang yang yang dag par rjes su mthong ba [{]myed [,]med [}]de/_des gzugs kyi yang dag pa dang /_yongs su grub

[\[366b.7\]{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ste/_gsob nyid dang /_gsog nyid du yang dag par rjes su mthong ngo /_/des 'du shes kyi yang dag pa dang /_yongs su grub pa yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ste/_des 'du shes kyi yang dag pa dang /_yongs su grub pa yang 
[\[367a\]]
[\[367a.1\]]dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/_'du shes kyi skye ba yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ngo /_/des 'du shes kyi skye ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/_'du shes kyi skye ba'i sgo yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ngo /_/des

[\[367b\]]
[\[367b.1\]]grub pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi skye ba yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ngo /_/des [{]myig [,]mig [}]gi skye ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi skye ba'i sgo yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ngo /_/des [{]myig [,]mig [}]gi skye ba'i sgo yang dag par

[\[367b.5\]]yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ste/_des sna'i yang dag pa dang /_yongs su grub pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/_sna'i skye ba yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ngo /_/des sna'i skye ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/_sna'i skye ba'i sgo

[\[367b.7\]]pa dang /_yongs su grub pa yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ste/_des lce'i yang dag pa dang /_yongs su grub pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/_lce'i skye ba yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ngo /_/des lce'i skye ba yang dag par rjes su ma 
[\[368a\]]
[\[368a.1\]]mthong bas/_lce'i skye ba'i sgo yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ngo /_/des lce'i skye ba'i sgo yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/_lce'i tshogs yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ste/_gsob nyid dang /_gsog nyid du yang

[\[377b.3\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/_bam po nyi shu gnyis pa/_/des nang stong pa nyid kyi yang dag pa dang /_yongs su grub pa yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ste/_des nang stong pa nyid kyi yang dag pa

[\[382b.2\]]rjes su mthong ngo /_/des 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i yang dag pa dang /_yongs su grub pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/_des 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i yang dag pa dang /_yongs su grub 
[\[382b.3\]]pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i skye ba yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/des 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i skye ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/_/

[\[382b.5\]]pa'i tshogs yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/_gsob nyid dang /_gsog nyid du yang dag par rjes su mthong ngo /_/des 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi yang dag pa dang /_yongs su grub pa yang dag par rjes su

[\[388a\]]
[\[388a.1\]]yongs su grub pa yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ste/_des lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi yang dag pa dang /_yongs su grub pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/_lam gyi rnam pa 
[\[388a.2\]]shes pa nyid kyi skye ba yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ngo /_/des lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi skye ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/_lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi skye ba'i sgo yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ngo /_/
[\[388a.3\]]des lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi/_skye ba'i sgo yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/_lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi/_tshogs yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ste/_gsob nyid dang /_
[\[388a.4\]]gsog nyid du yang dag par rjes su mthong ngo /_/des rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi yang dag pa dang /_yongs su grub pa yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ste/_des rnam pa thams cad mkhyen 
[\[388a.5\]]pa nyid kyi yang dag pa dang /_yongs su grub pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi/_skye ba yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/des rnam pa 
[\[388a.6\]]thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi/_skye ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi/_skye ba'i sgo yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ngo /_/des rnam pa thams cad 
[\[388a.7\]]mkhyen pa nyid kyi/_skye ba'i sgo yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi/_tshogs yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ste/_gsob nyid dang /_gsog nyid du yang dag par 
[\[388b\]]
[\[388b.1\]]rjes su mthong ngo /_/de de ltar rtog pa'i tshe/_gzugs kyi rang bzhin [{]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs so/_/tshor ba'i rang bzhin [{]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs so/_/'du shes kyi rang bzhin mi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/'du byed kyi rang bzhin mi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/rnam par 
[\[388b.2\]]shes pa'i rang bzhin [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]gi rang bzhin [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/rna ba'i rang bzhin mi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/sna'i rang bzhin [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/lce'i rang bzhin mi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/lus kyi rang bzhin [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[388b.3\]{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/yid kyi rang bzhin [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/gzugs kyi rang bzhin [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/sgra'i rang bzhin [{]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs so/_/dri'i rang bzhin [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/ro'i rang bzhin [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/
[\[388b.4\]]reg gi rang bzhin [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/chos kyi rang bzhin [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]gi rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin [{]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs so/_/sna'i rnam par 
[\[388b.5\]]shes pa'i rang bzhin [{]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs so/_/lce'i rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin mi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin mi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin [{]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs so/_/
[\[388b.6\]{]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin mi dmigs so/_/sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin mi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]
[\[388b.7\]]so/_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/rna ba'i 'dus te 
[\[389a\]]
[\[389a.1\]]reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin mi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin [{]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs so/_/lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/
[\[389a.2\]]lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin [{]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs so/_/sa'i khams kyi rang bzhin [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/chu'i khams kyi rang bzhin 
[\[389a.3\]{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/me'i khams kyi rang bzhin [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/rlung gi khams kyi rang bzhin mi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/nam mkha'i khams kyi rang bzhin [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/
[\[389a.4\]]ma rig pa'i rang bzhin [{]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs so/_/'du byed kyi rang bzhin [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin mi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/ming dang gzugs kyi rang bzhin [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/skye mched drug gi rang bzhin mi dmigs 
[\[389a.5\]]so/_/reg pa'i rang bzhin [{]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs so/_/tshor ba'i rang bzhin [{]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs so/_/sred pa'i rang bzhin mi dmigs so/_/len pa'i rang bzhin mi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/srid pa'i rang bzhin [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/skye ba'i rang 
[\[389a.6\]]bzhin [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/rga shi'i rang bzhin [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin [{]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs so/_/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin 
[\[389a.7\]]pa'i rang bzhin [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin 
[\[389b\]]
[\[389b.1\]{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/nang stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/phyi stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin [{]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs 
[\[389b.2\]]so/_/chen po stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin [{]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs so/_/'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin mi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]
[\[389b.3\]]so/_/mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin mi dmigs so/_/dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin mi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/rang bzhin stong pa 
[\[389b.4\]]nyid kyi rang bzhin [{]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs so/_/chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin [{]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs so/_/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin mi 
[\[389b.5\]{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin [{]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs so/_/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/
[\[389b.6\]]dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi rang bzhin [{]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs so/_/yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi rang bzhin [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi rang bzhin [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/dbang po rnams 
[\[389b.7\]]kyi rang bzhin [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/stobs rnams kyi rang bzhin [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi rang bzhin [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i 
[\[390a\]]
[\[390a.1\]]rang bzhin [{]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs so/_/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi rang bzhin [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/bsam gtan rnams kyi rang bzhin [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/tshad med pa rnams kyi rang bzhin 
[\[390a.2\]{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi rang bzhin mi dmigs so/_/rnam par thar pa rnams kyi rang bzhin [{]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs so/_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa 
[\[390a.3\]]rnams kyi rang bzhin mi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi rang bzhin mi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rang bzhin [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rang 
[\[390a.4\]]bzhin [{]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs so/_/mngon par shes pa rnams kyi rang bzhin [{]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs so/_/ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi rang bzhin [{]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs so/_/gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi rang bzhin [{]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs so/_/
[\[390a.5\]]de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi rang bzhin mi dmigs so/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa rnams kyi rang bzhin mi dmigs so/_/so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi rang bzhin [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/byams 
[\[390a.6\]]pa chen po'i rang bzhin [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/snying rje chen po'i rang bzhin mi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi rang bzhin [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i rang 
[\[390a.7\]]bzhin [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/dgra bcom pa nyid kyi rang bzhin [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/
[\[390b\]]
[\[390b.1\]]rang byang chub kyi rang bzhin [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi rang bzhin mi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rang bzhin [{]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs so/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod 
[\[390b.2\]]pa'i tshe/_/chos thams cad dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i rang bzhin du rtogs par byed de/_de de ltar rtogs par byed cing /_nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /_phyi stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /_phyi nang stong pa nyid la 
[\[390b.3\]]spyod pa dang /_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /_chen po stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /_don dam pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /_'dus byas stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la spyod 
[\[390b.4\]]pa dang /_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /_thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /_dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /_rang bzhin stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /_chos thams cad stong 
[\[390b.5\]]pa nyid la spyod pa dang /_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /_dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo 
[\[390b.6\]]nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/_gzugs sam/_tshor ba 'am/_'du shes sam/_'du byed dam/_rnam par shes pa 'am/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gam/_rna ba 'am/_sna 'am/_lce 'am/_lus sam/_yid dam/_gzugs sam/_
[\[390b.7\]]sgra 'am/_dri 'am/_ro 'am/_reg gam/_chos sam/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi rnam par shes pa 'am/_rna ba'i rnam par shes pa 'am/_sna'i rnam par shes pa 'am/_lce'i rnam par shes pa 'am/_lus kyi rnam par shes pa 'am/_
[\[391a\]]
[\[391a.1\]]yid kyi rnam par shes pa 'am/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa 'am/_rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa 'am/_sna'i 'dus te reg pa 'am/_lce'i 'dus te reg pa 'am/_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa 'am/_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa 'am/_
[\[391a.2\]{]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba 'am/_rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba 'am/_sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba 'am/_lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba 'am/_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen 
[\[391a.3\]]kyis tshor ba 'am/_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba 'am/_sa'i khams sam/_chu'i khams sam/[ {]mye'i [,]me'i [}]khams sam/_rlung gi khams sam/_nam mkha'i khams sam/_rnam par shes pa'i khams sam/_ma rig pa 
[\[391a.4\]]'am/_'du byed dam/_rnam par shes pa 'am/[ {]mying [,]ming [}]dang gzugs sam/_skye mched drug gam/_reg pa 'am/_tshor ba 'am/_sred pa 'am/_len pa 'am/_srid pa 'am/_skye ba 'am/_rga shi 'am/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/_tshul khrims kyi 
[\[391a.5\]]pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/_nang stong pa nyid dam/_phyi stong pa nyid dam/_phyi nang stong pa nyid 
[\[391a.6\]]dam/_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dam/_chen po stong pa nyid dam/_don dam pa stong pa nyid dam/_'dus byas stong pa nyid dam/_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dam/_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dam/_thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dam/_
[\[391a.7\]]dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dam/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid dam/_chos thams cad stong pa nyid dam/_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dam/[ {]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid dam/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dam/_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dam/_dngos 
[\[391b\]]
[\[391b.1\]]po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dam/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sam/_yang dag par spong ba rnams sam/_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sam/_dbang po rnams sam/_stobs rnams sam/_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sam/_
[\[391b.2\]]'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'am/_'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sam/_bsam gtan rnams sam/_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams sam/_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/_rnam par thar pa rnams sam/_
[\[391b.3\]]mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams sam/_mngon par shes pa rnams sam/_ting nge 'dzin rnams sam/_gzungs kyi sgo rnams sam/_de bzhin gshegs 
[\[391b.4\]]pa'i stobs rnams sam/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa rnams sam/_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sam/_byams pa chen po 'am/_snying rje chen po 'am/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sam/_rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'am/_lan cig 
[\[391b.5\]]phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/_phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/_dgra bcom pa nyid dam/_rang byang chub bam/_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bam/_chos gang la yang mngon par chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/de dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi shes 
[\[391b.6\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_byang chub kyi lam yongs su rdzogs par byed de/_'di ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_
[\[391b.7\]]bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_nang stong pa nyid dang /_phyi stong pa nyid dang /_phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /_chen po stong pa nyid dang /_don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /_'dus byas stong 
[\[392a\]]
[\[392a.1\]]pa nyid dang /_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /_thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /_chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /_rang 
[\[392a.2\]]gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang /_yang dag par spong ba rnams dang /_
[\[392a.3\]]rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /_dbang po rnams dang /_stobs rnams dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /_bsam gtan rnams dang /_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa 
[\[392a.4\]]rnams dang /_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /_rnam par thar pa rnams dang /_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]
[\[392a.5\]]pa dang /_mngon par shes pa rnams dang /_ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa rnams dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_
[\[392a.6\]]snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byed de/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /_dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu yongs su 'dzin to/_/de byang chub kyi lam rnam par smin pa'i chos can la 
[\[392a.7\]]gnas pas/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa dang /_
[\[392b\]]
[\[392b.1\]]bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa dang /_nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs pa dang /_phyi stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs pa dang /_phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs pa dang /_
[\[392b.2\]]stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs pa dang /_chen po stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs pa dang /_don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs pa dang /_'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs pa dang /_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs pa dang 
[\[392b.3\]]mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs pa dang /_thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs pa dang /_dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs pa dang /_rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs pa dang /_chos 
[\[392b.4\]]thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs pa dang /_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs pa dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs pa dang /_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs pa dang /_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su 
[\[392b.5\]]rdzogs pa dang /_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs pa dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs pa dang /_yang dag par spong ba bzhi yongs su rdzogs pa dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs pa dang /_
[\[392b.6\]]dbang po lnga yongs su rdzogs pa dang /_stobs lnga yongs su rdzogs pa dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun yongs su rdzogs pa dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su rdzogs pa dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi yongs su 
[\[392b.7\]]rdzogs pa dang /_bsam gtan bzhi yongs su rdzogs pa dang /_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs pa dang /_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs pa dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad yongs su rdzogs pa dang /_mthar kyis gnas 
[\[393a\]]
[\[393a.1\]]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yongs su rdzogs pa dang /_rnam par thar pa rnams yongs su rdzogs pa dang /_rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i mngon par shes pa lnga yongs su rdzogs par gyur nas/_sems can gang la sbyin 
[\[393a.2\]]pas phan gdags par bya ba de dag la yang sbyin pas phan 'dogs so/_/gang la tshul khrims kyis phan gdags par bya ba de dag la yang tshul khrims kyis phan 'dogs so/_/gang la bzod pas phan gdags par bya ba de dag la yang 
[\[393a.3\]]bzod pas phan 'dogs so/_/gang la brtson 'grus kyis phan gdags par bya ba de dag la yang brtson 'grus kyis phan 'dogs so/_/gang la ting nge 'dzin gyis phan gdags par bya ba de dag la yang ting nge 'dzin gyis phan 'dogs 
[\[393a.4\]]so/_/gang la shes rab kyis phan gdags par bya ba de dag la yang shes rab kyis phan 'dogs so/_/gang la rnam par grol bas phan gdags par bya ba de dag la yang rnam par grol bas phan 'dogs so/_/gang la rnam par grol 
[\[393a.5\]]ba'i ye shes mthong bas phan gdags par bya ba de dag la yang rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong bas phan 'dogs so/_/gang rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la dgod par bya ba de dag kyang /_rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la rab tu 'god 
[\[393a.6\]]do/_/gang lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la dgod par bya ba de dag kyang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rab tu 'god do/_/gang phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu la dgod par bya ba de dag kyang /_phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rab tu 'god 
[\[393a.7\]]do/_/gang dgra bcom pa nyid la dgod par bya ba de dag kyang dgra bcom pa nyid la rab tu 'god do/_/gang rang byang chub la dgod par bya ba de dag kyang /_rang byang chub la rab tu 'god do/_/gang bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 
[\[393b\]]
[\[393b.1\]]la dgod par bya ba de dag kyang /_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la rab tu 'god do/_/de rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam pa du mas rnam par 'phrul zhing 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du 'gro ste/_de 'dod na 'jig rten 
[\[393b.2\]]gyi khams gang+ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag rin po che gang las 'dod pa'i rin po che de dag las grub par mngon par sgrub ste/_de sems can rnams kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byed cing /_'jig rten gyi khams nas 'jig rten gyi 
[\[393b.3\]]khams su 'gro ste/_des 'jig rten gyi khams de dag mthong nas/_ci 'dod par sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su 'dzin te/_'di ltar dper na gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i ris kyi longs spyod dang /_skyid pa lta bu dag dang /_sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[393b.4\]]zhing gzhan btsal ba dang bral ba dag na/_longs spyod dang /_skyid pa gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag der 'byung ste/_de rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin 
[\[393b.5\]]pa dang /_rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_rnam par smin pa las 
[\[393b.6\]]byung ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i mngon par shes pa rnams dang /_rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i byang chub kyi lam des lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la spyod cing /_chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs 
[\[393b.7\]]pa thob nas/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rjes su 'thob ste/_gal te ci tsam du gzugs yongs su bzung ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_tshor ba yongs su bzung ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_'du shes yongs su bzung ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_'du byed yongs su bzung ba [{]myed [,]med [}]

[\[394b.1\]]ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_chu'i khams yongs su bzung ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /[ {]mye'i [,]me'i [}]khams yongs su bzung ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_rlung gi khams yongs su bzung ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_nam mkha'i khams yongs su bzung ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_rnam par shes pa'i khams

[\[395a\]]
[\[395a.1\]{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir yang sems can rnams la chos ston to/_/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_chos thams cad mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_byed pa 
[\[395a.2\]]med pa dang /[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_'byung ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_mngon par 'du bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa yin te/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha 
[\[395a.3\]]rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_chos thams cad mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_byed pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_dmigs su [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_'byung ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_mngon par 'du bya ba med pa la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/tshul khrims kyi pha 
[\[395a.4\]]rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs 
[\[395a.5\]]par 'gyur ro/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/phyi stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[395a.6\]]stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/chen po stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[395a.7\]]'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid 
[\[395b\]]
[\[395b.1\]]yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]

[\[395b.3\]]'gyur ro/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/yang dag par spong ba yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/dbang po yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/

[\[395b.6\]]kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/mngon par shes pa yongs su rdzogs par
