[\[396a\]]
[\[396a.1\]]so so yang dag par rig pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/byams pa chen po yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa yongs su 
[\[396a.2\]]rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/shes rab kyi pha [{]rold [,]rol [}]tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa stong phrag brgya pa las/_le'u drug cu gcig go/_//shes rab kyi pha [{]rold [,]rol [}]tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa stong phrag brgya pa/_bam po nyi shu gsum pa/_/de nas 
[\[396a.3\]]tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das de ltar chos thams cad dbyer ma mchis shing /_mtshan ma ma mchis la rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid lags na/_ji ltar pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[396a.4\]]drug po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs 
[\[396a.5\]]su rdzogs par 'gyur/_zag pa dang bcas pa dang /_zag pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i chos de dag kyang ji ltar na tha dad du gyur par gda' ba lags/_ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'dus pa lags/_ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol 
[\[396a.6\]]tu phyin par tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dus pa lags/_ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'dus pa lags/_ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dus pa lags/_
[\[396a.7\]]ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dus pa lags/_ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dus pa lags/_ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par nang stong pa nyid 
[\[396b\]]
[\[396b.1\]]'dus pa lags/_ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par phyi stong pa nyid 'dus pa lags/_ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par phyi nang stong pa nyid 'dus pa lags/_ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par stong pa nyid stong pa nyid 'dus pa lags/_
[\[396b.2\]]ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par chen po stong pa nyid 'dus pa lags/_ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par don dam pa stong pa nyid 'dus pa lags/_ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par 'dus byas stong pa nyid 'dus pa lags/_
[\[396b.3\]]ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid 'dus pa lags/_ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid 'dus pa lags/_ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa 
[\[396b.4\]]stong pa nyid 'dus pa lags/_ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par dor ba med pa stong pa nyid 'dus pa lags/_ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par rang bzhin stong pa nyid 'dus pa lags/_ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par 
[\[396b.5\]]chos thams cad stong pa nyid 'dus pa lags/_ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid 'dus pa lags/_ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid 'dus pa lags/_ji ltar shes 
[\[396b.6\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid 'dus pa lags/_ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'dus pa lags/_ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'dus pa 
[\[396b.7\]]lags/_ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams 'dus pa lags/_ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par yang dag par spong ba rnams 'dus pa lags/_ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par rdzu 'phrul gyi 
[\[397a\]]
[\[397a.1\]]rkang pa rnams 'dus pa lags/_ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par dbang po rnams 'dus pa lags/_ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par stobs rnams 'dus pa lags/_ji ltar shes rab kyi pha 
[\[397a.2\]]rol tu phyin par byang chub kyi yan lag rnams 'dus pa lags/_ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'dus pa lags/_ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par 'phags pa'i bden pa 
[\[397a.3\]]rnams 'dus pa lags/_ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par bsam gtan rnams 'dus pa lags/_ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams 'dus pa lags/_ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin 
[\[397a.4\]]par gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams 'dus pa lags/_ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par rnam par thar pa rnams 'dus pa lags/_ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms 
[\[397a.5\]]par 'jug pa rnams 'dus pa lags/_ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa 'dus pa lags/_ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par mngon 
[\[397a.6\]]par shes pa rnams 'dus pa lags/_ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par ting nge 'dzin rnams 'dus pa lags/_ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par gzungs kyi sgo rnams 'dus pa lags/_ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin 
[\[397a.7\]]par de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams 'dus pa lags/_ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa rnams 'dus pa lags/_ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par so so yang dag par rig pa rnams 'dus pa 
[\[397b\]]
[\[397b.1\]]lags/_ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par byams pa chen po 'dus pa lags/_ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par snying rje chen po 'dus pa lags/_ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 
[\[397b.2\]]'dres pa rnams 'dus pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das de ltar mtshan nyid kyang tha dad la 'di lta ste/_mtshan nyid ma mchis par mtshan nyid gcig par gyur pa de dag rnam pa ji lta bur gdags par 'gyur/_de skad ces gsol 
[\[397b.3\]]pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/[ {]rmyi [,]rmi [}]lam lta 
[\[397b.4\]]bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la gnas shing /_sbyin pa yongs su gtong ngo /_/tshul khrims srung ngo /_/bzod pa sgom mo/_/brtson 'grus rtsom mo/_/ting nge 'dzin sgom mo/_/shes rab sgom mo/_/sgyu ma lta bu'i nye bar 
[\[397b.5\]]len pa'i phung po lnga la gnas shing /_sbyin pa yongs su gtong ngo /_/tshul khrims srung ngo /_/bzod pa sgom mo/_/brtson 'grus rtsom mo/_/ting nge 'dzin sgom mo/_/shes rab sgom mo/_/smyig rgyu lta bu'i nye bar len 
[\[397b.6\]]pa'i phung po lnga la gnas shing /_sbyin pa yongs su gtong ngo /_/tshul khrims srung ngo /_/bzod pa sgom mo/_/brtson 'grus rtsom mo/_/ting nge 'dzin sgom mo/_/shes rab sgom mo/_/chu zla lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po 
[\[397b.7\]]lnga la gnas shing /_sbyin pa yongs su gtong ngo /_/tshul khrims srung ngo /_/bzod pa sgom mo/_/brtson 'grus rtsom mo/_/ting nge 'dzin sgom mo/_/shes rab sgom mo/_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]yor lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la 
[\[398a\]]
[\[398a.1\]]gnas shing /_sbyin pa yongs su gtong ngo /_/tshul khrims srung ngo /_/bzod pa sgom mo/_/brtson 'grus rtsom mo/_/ting nge 'dzin sgom mo/_/shes rab sgom mo/_/sgra brnyan lta bu'i nye bar

[\[398b\]]
[\[398b.1\]]brnyan lta bu ste/_mtshan nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga ni/_dri za'i grong khyer lta bu ste/_mtshan nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga ni/_sprul pa lta bu ste/_mtshan nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/[ {]rmyi [,]rmi [}]

[\[398b.7\]]rol tu phyin pa las phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldog go/_de pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag la gnas shing /_bsam gtan bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 
[\[399a\]]
[\[399a.1\]]'jug pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/yang dag par spong ba bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par

[\[401b.7\]]mtshan nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]par shes pas/_rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu shes kyang de la [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas so/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu shes kyang de la [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas so/_/phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu shes kyang de la [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas so/_/dgra bcom pa nyid shes kyang de la [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas so/_/
[\[402a\]]
[\[402a.1\]]rang byang chub shes kyang de la mi gnas so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar des chos thams cad shes par bya ste/_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya ba'i phyir te/_rab 'byor 
[\[402a.2\]]de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni chos thams cad mtshan nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]par shes pas/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]par shes so/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan nyid med par shes so/_/bzod pa'i 
[\[402a.3\]]pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]par shes so/_/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]par shes so/_/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan nyid med par shes so/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]par

[\[402b\]]
[\[402b.1\]]nyid mtshan nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]par shes so/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mtshan nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]par shes so/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams mtshan nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]par shes so/_/yang dag par spong ba rnams mtshan nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]par shes so/_/

[\[403a\]]
[\[403a.1\]]nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]par shes so/_/phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu mtshan nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]par shes so/_/dgra bcom pa nyid mtshan nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]par shes so/_/rang byang chub mtshan nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]par shes so/_/lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid mtshan nyid 
[\[403a.2\]{]myed [,]med [}]par shes so/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mtshan nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]par shes so/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rmi lam lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung 
[\[403a.3\]]po lnga la gnas/_sgyu ma lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la gnas/_smig rgyu lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la gnas/_chu zla lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la gnas/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]yor lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la gnas/_sgra brnyan lta 
[\[403a.4\]]bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la gnas/_gzugs brnyan lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la gnas/_dri za'i grong khyer lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la gnas/_sprul pa lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la gnas shing /_tshul 
[\[403a.5\]]khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de yang nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga rmi lam lta bur shes/_nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga sgyu ma lta bur shes/_nye bar len pa'i 
[\[403a.6\]]phung po lnga smig rgyu lta bur shes/_nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga chu zla lta bur shes/_nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga [{]myig [,]mig [}]yor lta bur shes/_nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga sgra brnyan lta bur shes/_nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga gzugs brnyan lta bur shes/_
[\[403a.7\]]nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga dri za'i grong khyer lta bur shes/_nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga sprul pa lta bur shes nas/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_ma zhig pa/_ma ral ba/_skyon [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_rnyog pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_nyams pa 
[\[403b\]]
[\[403b.1\]{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_dbang du gyur pa/_mkhas pas bsngags pa/_shin tu rdzogs pa/_'phags par gyur pa/_zag pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_lam gyi khongs su chud pa/_'jig rten las 'das pa/_yongs su rdzogs par byed de/_de la gnas shing yang dag par blang ba'i 
[\[403b.2\]]brda dang ldan pa'i tshul khrims dang /_chos nyid kyis thob pa'i tshul khrims dang /_sdom pa'i tshul khrims dang /[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul khrims dang /_spyad pa'i tshul khrims dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]spyad pa'i tshul khrims srung ngo /_/de tshul khrims de lta bu dang 
[\[403b.3\]]ldan yang 'dis bdag rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba'i rigs dang skal ba mnyam pa 'am/_bram ze che zhing mtho ba'i rigs dang skal ba mnyam pa 'am/_khyim bdag che zhing mtho ba'i rigs dang skal ba mnyam par skye bar bya'o zhe 'am/_rgyal phran 
[\[403b.4\]]nam/_'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur bar bya'o zhe'am/_rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skye bar bya'o zhe ba'am/_sum cu rtsa gsum mam/_mtshe ma 'am/_dga' ldan nam/_'phrul dga' 'am/_gzhan 'phrul dbang 
[\[403b.5\]]byed kyi lha rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skye bar bya'o zhe 'am/_rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par bya'o zhe 'am/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/_phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/_dgra bcom pa nyid dam/_rang byang chub bam/_byang

[\[403b.7\]]mtshan nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i chos thob par [{]myi [,]mi [}]rung ngo /_/mtshan nyid tha dad pa'i chos kyis kyang mtshan nyid tha dad pa'i chos thob par [{]myi [,]mi [}]rung ngo /_/mtshan nyid tha dad pa 'am/_mtshan nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i chos kyis kyang /_mtshan nyid tha dad pa 'am/_mtshan nyid 
[\[404a\]]
[\[404a.1\]{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i chos thob par [{]myi [,]mi [}]rung ngo /_/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yongs su rdzogs par byas 
[\[404a.2\]]nas/_byang chub sems dpa'i skyon [{]myed [,]med [}]par 'jug go/_byang chub sems dpa'i skyon [{]myed [,]med [}]par 'jug pa'i tshe/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]skye ba'i chos la bzod pa 'thob ste/_lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i mngon par 
[\[404a.3\]]shes pa lnga rab tu thob nas/_gzungs kyi sgo lnga brgya dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo lnga brgya la gnas te/_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi thob nas/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur byed cing /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs 
[\[404a.4\]]rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ste/_sems can rnams kyang yongs su smin par byed do/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su 'dzin to/_/de 'gro ba lnga'i 'khor ba na 'khor yang /_'khor ba'i las rnam par smin pas gos par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur te/_'di ltar dper na/_
[\[404a.5\]]sprul pa ni 'gro ba 'am/_sdod pa 'am/_'dug pa 'am/_nyal ba byed kyang de la 'gro ba 'am/_'ong ba 'am/_sdod pa 'am/_'dug pa 'am/_nyal ba yang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_de sems can rnams kyi don kyang byed do/_/sems can dang sems can 
[\[404a.6\]]du btags pa yang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shin tu zhi ba zhes bya ba/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs 
[\[404a.7\]]par sangs rgyas nas/_chos kyi 'khor lo bskor te/_sems can tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa theg pa gnyis kyis yongs su mya ngan las bzlas kyang gang bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par bya ba'i byang chub sems dpa' de lta bu gang 
[\[404b\]]
[\[404b.1\]]yang ma gzigs nas/_des tshe'i 'du byed spangs nas sprul pa sprul pa mdzad de/_phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/_/rab 'byor de ltar sprul pa des bskal ba gcig lon nas byang chub 
[\[404b.2\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan te/_yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur to/_/yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur pa de'i gzugs sam/_tshor ba 'am/_'du shes sam/_'du byed dam/_
[\[404b.3\]]rnam par shes pa'am/_dngos po gang yang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang sems can nam sems can du gdags pa yang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_sems can rnams kyi don yang byed do/_rab 
[\[404b.4\]]'byor de ltar na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_mtshan nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed de/_de yongs su rdzogs pas mtshan nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i chos thams 
[\[404b.5\]]cad khong du chud par shes so/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/[ {]rmyi [,]rmi [}]lam lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la gnas/_sgra brnyan lta bu dang /_chu zla lta bu dang /[ {]myig [,]mig [}]yor 
[\[404b.6\]]lta bu dang /_sgyu ma lta bu dang /_smig rgyu lta bu dang /_dri za'i grong khyer lta bu dang /_sprul pa lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la gnas te/_mtshan nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/rab 'byor ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[404b.7\]]sems dpa' chen po mtshan nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i chos rnams la gnas shing /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa yin zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa gnyis kyis/_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[405a\]]
[\[405a.1\]]yongs su rdzogs par byed de/_gnyis gang zhe na/_nyams su len pa'i bzod pa dang /_chos khong du chud pa'i bzod pa'o/_/de la nyams su len pa'i bzod pa gang zhe na/_sems dang po bskyed pa nas 
[\[405a.2\]]nye bar bzung ste/_snying po byang chub la 'dug gi bar du/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du gal te sems can thams cad yang dang yang 'ongs shing gshe ba 'am/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]snyan par brjod cing ma klas pa'i tshig brlang 
[\[405a.3\]]ba zer bar gyur tam/_rdo dbyug dang /_mtshon chas brdegs sam/_btab kyang de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'dod pas/_sems bskyed pa 'ga' 
[\[405a.4\]]tsam yang 'khrug pa dang ldan pa 'am/_gnod sems dang ldan pa bskyed par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bya ste/_phyir sems can de dag la kye ma/_sems can 'di dag ni nyon mongs pa'i nad kyis mnar ba ste/_'di dag la bdag gis 
[\[405a.5\]]sdig to'i sems [{]myi [,]mi [}]skyed kyi/_'di ni bdag nyid kyis phung po dgrar gyur pa 'di rnams blangs pa'i lan to zhes de dag la lhag par snying rje bskyed par bya'o/_/byams pa dang ldan te/_snying rje bar gyur nas/_rnam pa de ltar 
[\[405a.6\]]rtog pa 'di ni nyams su len pa'i bzod pa zhes bya'o/_/de la chos khong du chud pa'i bzod pa gang zhe na/_sems can de dag kyang don dam par [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su [{]myed [,]med [}]na/_bdag la gshe ba 'am/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]snyan par brjod pa 'am/_
[\[405a.7\]]ma klas pa'i tshig brlang po zer ba 'am/_rdo dbyug gis brdeg cing mtshon 'debs pa lta su zhig yod de/_'du byed thams cad ni sgyu ma lta bu gsob gsog rag lus pa/_nam mkha' lta bu bdag dang sems can dang /_
[\[405b\]]
[\[405b.1\]]srog dang /_'gro ba dang /_gso ba dang /_skyes bu dang /_gang zag dang /_shed can dang /_shed bdag dang /_bral ba ste/_rnam par rtog pa de dag thams cad ni yongs su rtog pa las byung ba yin na/_bdag la 
[\[405b.2\]]gshe ba dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]snyan par brjod pa dang /_ma klas pa'i tshig brlang par zer pa dang /_rdo dbyug gis rdeg cing mtshon 'debs pa lta su zhig yod do/_bdag gis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /_don dam pa stong pa nyid nye bar 
[\[405b.3\]]bzung ste/_de ltar rnam par brtag par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bya'o zhes bya ba 'di ni chos khong du chud pa'i bzod pa zhes bya ste/_de de ltar yongs su rtog cing /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed de/_de bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin 
[\[405b.4\]]pa yongs su rdzogs pa des [{]myi [,]mi [}]skye ba'i chos la bzod pa 'thob bo/_/rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das [{]myi [,]mi [}]skye ba'i chos la bzod pa zhes bgyi ba ni gang lags/_de la spangs pa ni ci mchis/_ye shes ni ci mchis/_
[\[405b.5\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor chos gang la rdul tsam yang skye ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa de ni [{]myi [,]mi [}]skye ba'o/_/de gang gis shes pa de ni bzod pa zhes bya ste/_shes pa des [{]myi [,]mi [}]skye ba'i chos la bzod pa 'thob bo/_/gsol 
[\[405b.6\]]pa/_bcom ldan 'das nyan thos rnams dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi [{]myi [,]mi [}]skye ba'i chos la bzod pa gang lags pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i [{]myi [,]mi [}]skye ba'i chos la bzod pa gang lags pa'i 
[\[405b.7\]]bzod pa de dag la bye brag tu bgyi ba ci mchis/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor rgyun tu zhugs pa'i shes pa gang yin pa dang /_spang ba gang yin pa de ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 
[\[406a\]]
[\[406a.1\]]bzod pa'o/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i shes pa gang yin pa dang /_spang ba gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'o/_/phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i shes pa gang yin pa dang /_spang ba 
[\[406a.2\]]gang yin pa de ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'o/_/dgra bcom pa'i shes pa gang yin pa dang /_spang ba gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'o/_/rang sangs rgyas 
[\[406a.3\]]kyi shes pa gang yin pa dang /_spang ba gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa ste/_rab 'byor de ni nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi bzod pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa'i 
[\[406a.4\]]bye brag yin no/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni bzod pa de lta bu dang ldan pas nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad zil kyis gnon te/_de rnam par smin pa las byung pa'i [{]myi [,]mi [}]skye ba'i 
[\[406a.5\]]chos kyi bzod pa la gnas te/_byang chub sems dpa'i lam la spyod cing /_lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed de/_de yongs su rdzogs pas/_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /_
[\[406a.6\]]stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ting nge 'dzin rnams dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]'bral ba yin/_de mngon par shes pa lnga dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]'bral ba yin/_de mngon par shes pa rnams dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]'bral bas/_sems can rnams 
[\[406a.7\]]yongs su smin par byed pa yin/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed pa yin/_de sems can rnams yongs su smin par byas/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byas nas/_skad cig gcig dang ldan 
[\[406b\]]
[\[406b.1\]]pa'i shes rab kyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed de/_rab 'byor de ltar na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_mtshan nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i bzod 
[\[406b.2\]]pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rmi lam lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung 
[\[406b.3\]]po lnga la gnas/_sgra brnyan lta bu dang /_chu zla lta bu dang /[ {]myig [,]mig [}]yor lta bu dang /_sgyu ma lta bu dang /_smyig rgyu lta bu dang /_dri za'i grong khyer lta bu dang /_sprul pa lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la gnas shing /_lus 
[\[406b.4\]]dang sems kyi brtson 'grus rtsom mo/_/de lus kyi brtson 'grus kyis rdzu 'phrul/_mngon par sgrub ste/_phyogs dang phyogs mtshams thams cad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams dag tu song nas/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 
[\[406b.5\]]'das rnams la bsnyen bkur byed cing /_sems can rnams kyi don byed do/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do/_/de lus kyi brtson 'grus des sems can rnams yongs su smin par byas nas/_theg 
[\[406b.6\]]pa gsum la 'dzud cing rab tu 'god do/_/rab 'byor de ltar na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_mtshan nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs 
[\[406b.7\]]su rdzogs par byed do/_/de sems kyi brtson 'grus zag pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_lam gyi yan lag tu gyur pa/_lam gyi khongs su chud pas/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang du dge ba'i chos thams cad 'di lta ste/_dran pa nye 
[\[407a\]]
[\[407a.1\]]bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /_yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /_dbang po lnga dang /_stobs lnga dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag 
[\[407a.2\]]brgyad pa dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang /_bsam gtan bzhi dang /_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa bzhi dang /_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug 
[\[407a.3\]]pa dgu dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad yongs su 
[\[407a.4\]]'dus pa yongs su rdzogs par byed de/_de la spyod cing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_de yongs su rdzogs pas/_bag chags kyi 
[\[407a.5\]]mtshams sbyor ba thams cad spangs par 'gyur ro/_/bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba thams cad spangs nas/_mtshan phun sum tshogs pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/kun tu snang ba thob par byas nas/_chos kyi 
[\[407a.6\]]'khor lo rnam pa bcu gnyis rgyud gsum du bskor ba skor bar 'gyur ro/_de bskor bas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnam pa drug tu g.yo ba dang /_rab tu g.yo ba dang /_kun nas g.yo pa dang /_'gul ba 
[\[407a.7\]]dang /_rab tu 'gul ba dang /_kun nas 'gul ba dang /_ldeg pa dang /_rab tu ldeg pa dang /_kun nas ldeg par 'gyur te/_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyang snang ba chen pos rgyas par 
[\[407b\]]
[\[407b.1\]]gang bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de'i sgra gang du byung zhing dbyangs grag par gyur pa'i sgra de stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can gang ji snyed kyis thos pa de/_
[\[407b.2\]]thams cad theg pa gsum la nges par 'gyur te/_rab 'byor de ltar phan pa chen po dang ldan pa ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/_byang chub 
[\[407b.3\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_shes rab kyi 
[\[407b.4\]]pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/[ {]rmyi [,]rmi [}]lam lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la gnas/_sgra brnyan lta bu dang /[ {]myig [,]mig [}]yor lta bu dang /_sgyu ma lta bu dang /_smig rgyu lta bu dang /_chu zla lta bu dang /_sprul pa lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la gnas shing /_ting nge 
[\[407b.5\]]'dzin gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rmi lam lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la gnas/_sgra brnyan lta bu dang /[ {]myig [,]mig [}]
[\[407b.6\]]yor lta bu dang /_sgyu ma lta bu dang /_smig rgyu lta bu dang /_chu zla lta bu dang /_sprul pa lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la gnas shing /_ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa yin zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa'

[\[408a\]]
[\[408a.1\]]te gnas so/_/byams pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/snying rje chen po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/dga' ba la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/btang snyoms la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched

[\[408a.3\]]dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ting nge 'dzin sgom mo/_/glog lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin sgom mo/_/yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin sgom mo/_/rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas shing /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin ma gtogs par nyan thos dang thun mong 
[\[408a.4\]]ba'am/_rang sangs rgyas dang thun mong pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang ji snyed pa dang /_gzhan yang ting nge 'dzin dang /_snyoms par 'jug pa'i tshogs gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad lus kyis khyab par byas shing /_nye bar bsgrubs te gnas kyang /_ting nge 'dzin de dag dang /_
[\[408a.5\]]snyoms par 'jug pa'i 'bras bu'i ro myong bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des/_ting nge 'dzin de dag gi mtshan nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid du shes pas na/_mtshan nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i chos

[\[408b.1\]]gyi pha [{]rold [,]rol [}]tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu phyin pa des/_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyis las yongs su 'da'o/_/rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen

[\[408b.3\]]pa nyid la shin tu bslabs pa dang /_phyi stong pa nyid la shin tu bslabs pa dang /_phyi nang stong pa nyid la shin tu bslabs pa dang /_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la shin tu bslabs pa dang /_chen po stong pa nyid la shin tu bslabs pa dang /_don dam pa stong pa nyid la shin tu

[\[410a.7\]]pa ni [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'o/_/mngon par shes pa rnams ni [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'o/_/ting nge 'dzin rnams ni [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'o/_/gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ni [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'o/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhi ni [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'o/_/so so yang dag par 
[\[410b\]]
[\[410b.1\]]rig pa bzhi ni [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'o/_/byams pa chen po ni [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'o/_/snying rje chen po ni [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad ni [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'o/_/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'o/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'o/_/
[\[410b.2\]]phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'o/_/dgra bcom pa nyid ni [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'o/_/rang byang chub ni [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'o/_/lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'o/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa ste skyon no/_/rab 'byor skyon [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ni gang la gzugs 
[\[410b.3\]]dang /_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa dang /[ {]myig [,]mig [}]dang /_rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid dang /_gzugs dang /_sgra dang /_dri dang /_ro dang /_reg dang /_chos dang /[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi rnam par shes pa dang /_rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang /_sna'i rnam par 
[\[410b.4\]]shes pa dang /_lce'i rnam par shes pa dang /_lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang /_yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang /[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa dang /_rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang /_sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang /_lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang /_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang /_yid kyi 'dus 
[\[410b.5\]]te reg pa dang /[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dang /_rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dang /_sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dang /_lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dang /_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dang /_yid kyi 
[\[410b.6\]]'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dang /_sa'i khams dang /_chu'i khams dang /[ {]mye'i [,]me'i [}]khams dang /_rlung gi khams dang /_nam mkha'i khams dang /_rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /_ma rig pa dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa dang /[ {]mying [,]ming [}]dang gzugs dang /_
[\[410b.7\]]skye mched drug dang /_reg pa dang /_tshor ba dang /_sred pa dang /_len pa dang /_srid pa dang /_skye ba dang /_rga shi dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam 
[\[411a\]]
[\[411a.1\]]gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_nang stong pa nyid dang /_phyi stong pa nyid dang /_phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /_chen po stong pa nyid dang /_don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /_'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /_
[\[411a.2\]]'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /_thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /_chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa 
[\[411a.3\]]stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang /_yang dag par spong ba rnams dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /_dbang 
[\[411a.4\]]po rnams dang /_stobs rnams dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /_bsam gtan rnams dang /_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams dang /_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 
[\[411a.5\]]'jug pa rnams dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_mngon par shes pa rnams dang /_ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /_gzungs kyi sgo 
[\[411a.6\]]rnams dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa rnams dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad dang /_rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang /_lan cig 
[\[411a.7\]]phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid dang /_rang byang chub dang /_lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang /_chos de dag gi brjod pa yang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o//_//
